loc.en: Follow me! I know a good spot where we can make our way over to the <Lore>South Market</Lore>.
loc.ru: Follow me! I know a good spot where we can make our way over to the <Lore>South Market</Lore>.

loc.en: Keep looking! We'll need more than a few wood planks if we're gonna get to the <Lore>South Market</Lore> across the rooftops.
loc.ru: Keep looking! We'll need more than a few wood planks if we're gonna get to the <Lore>South Market</Lore> across the rooftops.

loc.ru: That should do it! Let's <Lore>build the walkway</Lore> and then see what's waiting for us on the other side.

loc.ru: I'll keep searching. Maybe I can <Lore>break a barrier to make a ramp</Lore> to get down somewhere.

loc.ru: Ya know, I actually missed running across the rooftops.

loc.ru: Anyway, let's keep going! We're almost at the <Lore>South Market</Lore>.

loc.ru: These stalls won't fix themselves! We'll need <ActivityItem>Fine Rope</ActivityItem>, <ActivityItem>Timber Stacks</ActivityItem>, and <ActivityItem>Bolts of Silk</ActivityItem>.

loc.ru: That's right! I was working on those <ActivityItem>Stall Repair Kits</ActivityItem> for us.

loc.ru: If you put the <ActivityItem>Rose Water</ActivityItem> in your Watering Can, I bet it'll clear out the smell from all the rotting fruit.

loc.ru: Looks like you've got everything. C'mon; let's get those broken stalls fixed up!

loc.ru: Hey Aladdin, I think I saw a Crafting Station in the South Market. Think I'm going to make my <ActivityItem>Stall Repair Kits</ActivityItem> there.

loc.ru: Hmm... What if we take it to Jasmine?

loc.ru: Aladdin, I managed to repair all the stalls!

loc.ru: One person's trash... is another person's <ActivityItem>Stall Repair Kit</ActivityItem>!

loc.en: Let's see... We'll need some <ActivityItem>Planks</ActivityItem> to make walkways between buildings... some <ActivityItem>Fine Ropes</ActivityItem> to lash things together or climb, and some <ActivityItem>Timber Stacks</ActivityItem> to make platforms.

loc.ru: Rats! I'd usually go through here, but there's so much wreckage in the way...

loc.ru: Okay. Well, you're welcome to try and find another route to the <Lore>South Market</Lore>, but I don't think you'll have much luck.

loc.ru: If you change your mind, I'll be here.

loc.ru: I trust that you know Agrabah...

loc.ru: We're pretty close to the <Lore>South Market</Lore> now!

loc.en: Hey there, monkeys! I know you like your gemstones, but maybe you'd like these shiny golden bananas instead?
loc.ru: Hey there, monkeys! I know you like your gemstones, but maybe you'd like these shiny golden bananas instead?

loc.en: Ooh! Ooh ah-ah!
loc.ru: Ooh! Ooh ah-ah!

loc.en: Well, that seems like a better response than before. Here you go!
loc.ru: Well, that seems like a better response than before. Here you go!

loc.en: Any ideas where else we should look?
loc.ru: Any ideas where else we should look?

loc.en: We haven't checked out <Lore>the Southern Rooftops</Lore> yet. There might be a gem there.
loc.ru: We haven't checked out <Lore>the Southern Rooftops</Lore> yet. There might be a gem there.

loc.en: Hmm, those monkeys don't seem like they're going to just give me those gemstones...
loc.ru: Hmm, those monkeys don't seem like they're going to just give me those gemstones...

loc.en: Yeah, we'll need to trade for them. One of the merchants around here used to make fantastic models out of gold. Little toys, models of buildings, replicas of fruit...
loc.ru: Yeah, we'll need to trade for them. One of the merchants around here used to make fantastic models out of gold. Little toys, models of buildings, replicas of fruit...

loc.ru: Golden fruit?! Hmm, maybe there's a <ActivityItem>Golden Banana</ActivityItem> around that the monkeys would accept in trade...

loc.en: Nice job trading with those monkeys! I'll have to remember to pay the merchant back for those golden bananas.
loc.ru: Nice job trading with those monkeys! I'll have to remember to pay the merchant back for those golden bananas.

loc.en: Ya know, now that I think about it, the monkeys might also like a friendly scratch. Try making friends with them. That might help.
loc.ru: Ya know, now that I think about it, the monkeys might also like a friendly scratch. Try making friends with them. That might help.

loc.ru: Only one way to see if this works â let's head over to the sandstorms.

loc.ru: Hey, the Amulet looks great now that the stones are in it. Why don't you try it on?

loc.en: Let's go talk to Jasmine! If anyone can figure out what that Amulet's for, it's her.
loc.ru: Let's go talk to Jasmine! If anyone can figure out what that Amulet's for, it's her.

loc.en: I know it sounds strange, but you could try talking to the monkeys. They're pretty smart. Not as smart as Abu but... smart!
loc.ru: I know it sounds strange, but you could try talking to the monkeys. They're pretty smart. Not as smart as Abu but... smart!

loc.en: Oh, I know that! I was justâ Ya know what? Never mind.
loc.ru: Oh, I know that! I was justâ Ya know what? Never mind.

loc.ru: Aladdin, I found something in the big sandstorm!

loc.en: Whoa! I hope it wasn't too tough to grab.
loc.ru: Whoa! I hope it wasn't too tough to grab.

loc.en: Great! Ya know, slipping in and out of dangerous areas like that, you'd make a pretty good thief.

loc.ru: Well, I'm glad that it protected you.

loc.ru: The visibility is rough. I nearly missed this old book!

loc.en: Well, let's bring it to Jasmine. Maybe she can translate for us.
loc.ru: Well, let's bring it to Jasmine. Maybe she can translate for us.

loc.ru: I'm not sure. I'm not familiar with the language it's written in.

loc.en: With the Amulet? It was a breeze.
loc.ru: With the Amulet? It was a breeze.

loc.en: That's some powerful magic.
loc.ru: That's some powerful magic.

loc.ru: I could have used some sunglasses too.

loc.en: None taken.
loc.ru: None taken.

loc.en: Oh, I understand the compliment.
loc.ru: Oh, I understand the compliment.

loc.en: I'm no thief!
loc.ru: I'm no thief!

loc.en: If Abu had the gemstones, how would you get him to hand them over?
loc.ru: If Abu had the gemstones, how would you get him to hand them over?

loc.en: Aladdin! I spotted the <Lore>gemstones from the Protection Amulet</Lore>! The monkeys up on the rooftops have them!
loc.ru: Aladdin! I spotted the <Lore>gemstones from the Protection Amulet</Lore>! The monkeys up on the rooftops have them!

loc.ru: Did... did Agrabah have troops of monkeys roaming the streets before?

loc.ru: No way! They must've moved in and claimed that area of the marketplace after everyone had to flee the sandstorms.

loc.ru: Oh, he'd probably be mad that they're taking food he wants to steal.

loc.en: Yeah. Maybe if we keep <Lore>cleaning up the marketplace, we'll find something they like better than the gemstones</Lore>.
loc.ru: Yeah. Maybe if we keep <Lore>cleaning up the marketplace, we'll find something they like better than the gemstones</Lore>.

loc.en: Oh, he'd never just hand them over. I'd have to trade for them.
loc.ru: Oh, he'd never just hand them over. I'd have to trade for them.

loc.en: Well, they seem to like the shiny gemstones. Maybe we should find something else shiny.
loc.ru: Well, they seem to like the shiny gemstones. Maybe we should find something else shiny.

loc.en: They are, aren't they? But if they're anything like Abu, they'd HATE being called cute.
loc.ru: They are, aren't they? But if they're anything like Abu, they'd HATE being called cute.

loc.en: No, I think we're gonna have to be clever here.
loc.ru: No, I think we're gonna have to be clever here.

loc.en: The monkeys are pretty cute!
loc.ru: The monkeys are pretty cute!

loc.en: What would Abu say about the monkeys?
loc.ru: What would Abu say about the monkeys?

loc.en: There are a lot of monkeys â wouldn't want to make them angry.
loc.ru: There are a lot of monkeys â wouldn't want to make them angry.

loc.en: Uhh, hey monkeys. Any chance you want to hand over the gemstones?
loc.ru: Uhh, hey monkeys. Any chance you want to hand over the gemstones?

loc.en: All right, I'll take that as a no! I'll see if there's something around that we can trade for...
loc.ru: All right, I'll take that as a no! I'll see if there's something around that we can trade for...

loc.en: Ooh? Ah!
loc.ru: Ooh? Ah!

loc.en: Blech!
loc.ru: Blech!

loc.en: Hmm, maybe I'm on the right track here...
loc.ru: Hmm, maybe I'm on the right track here...

loc.en: Whoa! Did you see that? After you cleaned up that last stall, I saw something shiny. Maybe we can use it!
loc.ru: Whoa! Did you see that? After you cleaned up that last stall, I saw something shiny. Maybe we can use it!

loc.en: You found four keys?! Incredible!
loc.ru: You found four keys?! Incredible!

loc.en: Why don't you <Lore>try them out on the vault</Lore>? Maybe there's something useful inside!
loc.ru: Why don't you <Lore>try them out on the vault</Lore>? Maybe there's something useful inside!

loc.en: You ready to go for a Magic Carpet ride?
loc.ru: You ready to go for a Magic Carpet ride?

loc.en: Absolutely!
loc.ru: Absolutely!

loc.en: Great! Hop on Carpet and we'll go!
loc.ru: Great! Hop on Carpet and we'll go!

loc.en: Wow, the Windcaller sure is intimidating up close. And it's covered with debris from all over Agrabah. It's gonna be a pretty big job to figure out how to stop it for good.
loc.ru: Wow, the Windcaller sure is intimidating up close. And it's covered with debris from all over Agrabah. It's gonna be a pretty big job to figure out how to stop it for good.

loc.en: Let me know when you're ready to try again, and we can hop on Carpet.
loc.ru: Let me know when you're ready to try again, and we can hop on Carpet.

loc.en: Ask Jasmine if she'd like to take a trip to Dreamlight Valley. I'll be there as soon as I can.
loc.ru: Ask Jasmine if she'd like to take a trip to Dreamlight Valley. I'll be there as soon as I can.

loc.en: Is Jasmine enjoying the Valley?
loc.ru: Is Jasmine enjoying the Valley?

loc.en: It already seems like there's a huge weight off of her shoulders. We're starting by getting your House ready!
loc.ru: It already seems like there's a huge weight off of her shoulders. We're starting by getting your House ready!

loc.en: I hope Jasmine's having a good time.
loc.ru: I hope Jasmine's having a good time.

loc.en: She is! We got the House all set up â now it's just waiting for you too.
loc.ru: She is! We got the House all set up â now it's just waiting for you too.

loc.en: I'm finally ready to head to the Valley.
loc.ru: I'm finally ready to head to the Valley.

loc.en: I keep remembering more and more about it!
loc.ru: I keep remembering more and more about it!

loc.en: {DoNotTranslate}InaccessibleOngoing.
loc.ru: {DoNotTranslate}InaccessibleOngoing.

loc.en: {PlayerName}... we did it! Let's go tell Jasmine the good news!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}... we did it! Let's go tell Jasmine the good news!

loc.en: Jasmine saw something about those crystals in the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>. If we break them, it should help disable the Windcaller.
loc.ru: Jasmine saw something about those crystals in the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>. If we break them, it should help disable the Windcaller.

loc.en: I think Carpet wants to have a moment with you! Why don't you spend some time with him as a companion?
loc.ru: I think Carpet wants to have a moment with you! Why don't you spend some time with him as a companion?

loc.en: And you should feel free to hang out with Carpet! After I explained how you helped rescue him, he's keen to spend some time with you.
loc.ru: And you should feel free to hang out with Carpet! After I explained how you helped rescue him, he's keen to spend some time with you.

loc.en: Whoa, now that I'm back here... I realize how much I missed this place!
loc.ru: Whoa, now that I'm back here... I realize how much I missed this place!

loc.en: I feel like I've got a lot to catch up on.
loc.ru: I feel like I've got a lot to catch up on.

loc.en: That's for sure. Thanks, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: That's for sure. Thanks, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: The food! Don't get me wrong; I love the food in Agrabah, but when you grow up scraping for just a loaf of bread, having so much amazing food to choose from is incredible!
loc.ru: The food! Don't get me wrong; I love the food in Agrabah, but when you grow up scraping for just a loaf of bread, having so much amazing food to choose from is incredible!

loc.en: I'm not sure...
loc.ru: I'm not sure...

loc.en: Hey, is my old friend Mr. McDuck still here?
loc.ru: Hey, is my old friend Mr. McDuck still here?

loc.en: Absolutely! His shop is open and stocked if you want to treat yourself to something.
loc.ru: Absolutely! His shop is open and stocked if you want to treat yourself to something.

loc.en: Great! I seem to remember discussing treasure hunting with him.
loc.ru: Great! I seem to remember discussing treasure hunting with him.

loc.en: Once I'm settled in, I'll have to go see him and catch up.
loc.ru: Once I'm settled in, I'll have to go see him and catch up.

loc.en: I'll leave you to get settled in, Aladdin. Just remember: If there's anything you need, just let me know.
loc.ru: I'll leave you to get settled in, Aladdin. Just remember: If there's anything you need, just let me know.

loc.en: Definitely! And again... thanks, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: Definitely! And again... thanks, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: Cool! I'll <Lore>take a picture with him</Lore> to give him a proper Dreamlight Valley welcome as well!
loc.ru: Cool! I'll <Lore>take a picture with him</Lore> to give him a proper Dreamlight Valley welcome as well!

loc.en: You've got the time now.
loc.ru: You've got the time now.

loc.en: Anything you missed in particular?
loc.ru: Anything you missed in particular?

loc.en: What do you want to do first?
loc.ru: What do you want to do first?

loc.en: {PlayerName}, thanks to your help, we did it!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, thanks to your help, we did it!

loc.en: It was definitely tricky up there, but now Agrabah can start getting back to normal.
loc.ru: It was definitely tricky up there, but now Agrabah can start getting back to normal.

loc.en: Not every visitor would have stuck around and helped like that. You're a real friend.
loc.ru: Not every visitor would have stuck around and helped like that. You're a real friend.

loc.en: And we couldn't have done it without you!
loc.ru: And we couldn't have done it without you!

loc.en: Well, we â and Carpet â are happy to be considered your friends.
loc.ru: Well, we â and Carpet â are happy to be considered your friends.

loc.en: So, what's next? Are you ready to visit Dreamlight Valley with me now?
loc.ru: So, what's next? Are you ready to visit Dreamlight Valley with me now?

loc.en: I better make sure everything's settled down here first.
loc.ru: I better make sure everything's settled down here first.

loc.en: But why don't you <Lore>talk to Jasmine</Lore>? She definitely deserves a break. She's been so worried since this whole mess started.
loc.ru: But why don't you <Lore>talk to Jasmine</Lore>? She definitely deserves a break. She's been so worried since this whole mess started.

loc.en: True! The fountain is done and the people of Agrabah are safe. She does deserve to relax.
loc.ru: True! The fountain is done and the people of Agrabah are safe. She does deserve to relax.

loc.en: Mission accomplished!
loc.ru: Mission accomplished!

loc.en: I couldn't have done it without you and Jasmine.
loc.ru: I couldn't have done it without you and Jasmine.

loc.en: No way am I letting weird ancient magical wind structures mess with my friends!
loc.ru: No way am I letting weird ancient magical wind structures mess with my friends!

loc.en: Don't worry â once a month, I clear out his favorite hiding spots and return everything.
loc.ru: Don't worry â once a month, I clear out his favorite hiding spots and return everything.

loc.en: And the Sultan will deal with the fractured stone around the Central Market.
loc.ru: And the Sultan will deal with the fractured stone around the Central Market.

loc.en: Wow, Agrabah looks almost as good as new.
loc.ru: Wow, Agrabah looks almost as good as new.

loc.en: Yeah! You really helped with all the sandstone deposits.
loc.ru: Yeah! You really helped with all the sandstone deposits.

loc.en: I buried what's left of the Windcaller crystals out in the desert, so hopefully nobody will stumble onto it again.
loc.ru: I buried what's left of the Windcaller crystals out in the desert, so hopefully nobody will stumble onto it again.

loc.en: Great! I know Carpet will be excited to spend some time with you after you helped save Agrabah.
loc.ru: Great! I know Carpet will be excited to spend some time with you after you helped save Agrabah.

loc.en: So you're ready to come and visit Dreamlight Valley?
loc.ru: So you're ready to come and visit Dreamlight Valley?

loc.en: Yes! Carpet and I are ready to head there now. Abu's gonna stay in Agrabah for a while and keep the Sultan company, but he might join us later.
loc.ru: Yes! Carpet and I are ready to head there now. Abu's gonna stay in Agrabah for a while and keep the Sultan company, but he might join us later.

loc.en: Abu is friends with the Sultan? That's a surprise!
loc.ru: Abu is friends with the Sultan? That's a surprise!

loc.en: Are you kidding? They're best pals now! The Sultan loves hiding treasures for Abu to find, and Abu loves pretending that he gives them back.
loc.ru: Are you kidding? They're best pals now! The Sultan loves hiding treasures for Abu to find, and Abu loves pretending that he gives them back.

loc.en: Well, the Valley will be waiting for him when he's ready, but let's get you and Carpet back for now.
loc.ru: Well, the Valley will be waiting for him when he's ready, but let's get you and Carpet back for now.

loc.en: And you'd better <Lore>keep that Protection Amulet on, in case some of the stuff's in the sandstorms</Lore>.
loc.ru: And you'd better <Lore>keep that Protection Amulet on, in case some of the stuff's in the sandstorms</Lore>.

loc.en: Given how strong those winds are, I wouldn't be surprised if some of the pieces <Lore>ended up outside the walls of Agrabah</Lore>.
loc.ru: Given how strong those winds are, I wouldn't be surprised if some of the pieces <Lore>ended up outside the walls of Agrabah</Lore>.

loc.en: Hey! How'd the talk with Jasmine go?
loc.ru: Hey! How'd the talk with Jasmine go?

loc.en: She's hard at work translating the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>, but she thought you could help me gather some stuff we'll need.
loc.ru: She's hard at work translating the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>, but she thought you could help me gather some stuff we'll need.

loc.en: Sure! What's on the list?
loc.ru: Sure! What's on the list?

loc.en: Well, we have to get an <ActivityItem>Alchemy Table</ActivityItem> set up for further crafting.
loc.ru: Well, we have to get an <ActivityItem>Alchemy Table</ActivityItem> set up for further crafting.

loc.en: And the table in the Artisans' District has definitely seen better days. Guess we're fixing it up!
loc.ru: And the table in the Artisans' District has definitely seen better days. Guess we're fixing it up!

loc.en: Wow, this brings me back...
loc.ru: Wow, this brings me back...

loc.en: Nah. I just kinda like the place.
loc.ru: Nah. I just kinda like the place.

loc.en: When you grow up on the street, you learn to keep your eyes open.
loc.ru: When you grow up on the street, you learn to keep your eyes open.

loc.en: I remember when the <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore> was really thriving. Every morning, there'd be plumes of colorful smoke and the strangest smells...
loc.ru: I remember when the <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore> was really thriving. Every morning, there'd be plumes of colorful smoke and the strangest smells...

loc.en: If we're gonna repair the table, we'll need to <Lore>find a Cauldron, a Crucible, and a base for an Alchemy Table</Lore>.
loc.ru: If we're gonna repair the table, we'll need to <Lore>find a Cauldron, a Crucible, and a base for an Alchemy Table</Lore>.

loc.en: Guess we'd better get to work! I may have some questions for you later, so let's meet back in the <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore>.
loc.ru: Guess we'd better get to work! I may have some questions for you later, so let's meet back in the <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore>.

loc.en: Exactly!
loc.ru: Exactly!

loc.en: ... Are you secretly an alchemist?
loc.ru: ... Are you secretly an alchemist?

loc.en: How do you know about Alchemy Tables?
loc.ru: How do you know about Alchemy Tables?

loc.en: Hold on, Carpet. I promise we're gonna rescue you!
loc.ru: Hold on, Carpet. I promise we're gonna rescue you!

loc.en: All right, the <ActivityItem>Alchemy Table</ActivityItem> is all built and the fires have been prepared!
loc.ru: All right, the <ActivityItem>Alchemy Table</ActivityItem> is all built and the fires have been prepared!

loc.en: What's next?
loc.ru: What's next?

loc.en: Ya know, I'm not sure.
loc.ru: Ya know, I'm not sure.

loc.en: Why don't we <Lore>go check in with Jasmine</Lore>? I bet she's translated more of that <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>. Hopefully, that'll point us in the right direction.
loc.ru: Why don't we <Lore>go check in with Jasmine</Lore>? I bet she's translated more of that <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>. Hopefully, that'll point us in the right direction.

loc.en: That table looks great! Reminds me of when I was a kid...
loc.ru: That table looks great! Reminds me of when I was a kid...

loc.en: Every morning the alchemists would hire the local kids to fetch the ingredients they'd need for the day's work.
loc.ru: Every morning the alchemists would hire the local kids to fetch the ingredients they'd need for the day's work.

loc.en: If you can <Lore>find some fuel and coal</Lore> from around the marketplace, we can light the braziers and get the Alchemy Table going.
loc.ru: If you can <Lore>find some fuel and coal</Lore> from around the marketplace, we can light the braziers and get the Alchemy Table going.

loc.en: If I remember right, the <Lore>stalls with yellow awnings</Lore> usually stocked the supplies that the alchemists used. Though they might be a little damaged now...
loc.ru: If I remember right, the <Lore>stalls with yellow awnings</Lore> usually stocked the supplies that the alchemists used. Though they might be a little damaged now...

loc.en: I bet by the time we're done, Jasmine will have translated more instructions on how to deal with the Windcaller.
loc.ru: I bet by the time we're done, Jasmine will have translated more instructions on how to deal with the Windcaller.

loc.en: You should be able to <Lore>grab some fuel from fire pits</Lore> as well, so keep an eye out!
loc.ru: You should be able to <Lore>grab some fuel from fire pits</Lore> as well, so keep an eye out!

loc.en: Our stall's almost ready to open for business. We just need to put on the finishing touches...
loc.ru: Our stall's almost ready to open for business. We just need to put on the finishing touches...

loc.en: Hey, look at that. It's ready!
loc.ru: Hey, look at that. It's ready!

loc.en: Seems like we need a little more coin to get this stall up and running...
loc.ru: Seems like we need a little more coin to get this stall up and running...

loc.en: You sure? All right, I'll be here when you're ready.
loc.ru: You sure? All right, I'll be here when you're ready.

loc.en: Let's finish the Gem Stall. (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>
loc.ru: Let's finish the Gem Stall. (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>

loc.en: Perhaps some other time.
loc.ru: Perhaps some other time.

loc.en: I was just thinking the stall could use a little upgrade. What do ya say?
loc.ru: I was just thinking the stall could use a little upgrade. What do ya say?

loc.en: Whoa, the stall looks incredible. You should be really proud.
loc.ru: Whoa, the stall looks incredible. You should be really proud.

loc.en: Looks like we need a little bit more coin to finish our stall improvements...
loc.ru: Looks like we need a little bit more coin to finish our stall improvements...

loc.en: Really? Hey, no problem. I'll be around if ya change your mind.
loc.ru: Really? Hey, no problem. I'll be around if ya change your mind.

loc.en: Let's improve the Gem Stall. (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>
loc.ru: Let's improve the Gem Stall. (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>

loc.en: Perhaps some other time.
loc.ru: Perhaps some other time.

loc.en: I think the stall could offer even more gems... What do you say?
loc.ru: I think the stall could offer even more gems... What do you say?

loc.en: It's perfect! Everyone in the Valley is going to love this.
loc.ru: It's perfect! Everyone in the Valley is going to love this.

loc.en: Looks like we're a little short on coin to finish the stall... Let's get some more and come back here quick.
loc.ru: Looks like we're a little short on coin to finish the stall... Let's get some more and come back here quick.

loc.en: No problem. I'll be nearby if you change your mind.
loc.ru: No problem. I'll be nearby if you change your mind.

loc.en: Let's improve the Stall. (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>
loc.ru: Let's improve the Stall. (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>

loc.en: Perhaps some other time.
loc.ru: Perhaps some other time.

loc.en: All right! These are the last of the coins that escaped the vault. Nice work, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: All right! These are the last of the coins that escaped the vault. Nice work, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: I'll add 'em to the pile.
loc.ru: I'll add 'em to the pile.

loc.en: There. Whoa! I haven't seen this much gold since the Cave of Wonders!
loc.ru: There. Whoa! I haven't seen this much gold since the Cave of Wonders!

loc.en: I guess Mr. McDuck's gonna have to look for a new way to protect his money.
loc.ru: I guess Mr. McDuck's gonna have to look for a new way to protect his money.

loc.en: Yeah. Wish I had some way to commemorate the moment. I had a great time working with you, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: Yeah. Wish I had some way to commemorate the moment. I had a great time working with you, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: The best! Wish we had some way to commemorate it.
loc.ru: The best! Wish we had some way to commemorate it.

loc.en: You do remember this was just a favor for Mr. McDuck, right? All the money's going back.
loc.ru: You do remember this was just a favor for Mr. McDuck, right? All the money's going back.

loc.en: But maybe we can find some way to commemorate the moment. I really did have a great time.
loc.ru: But maybe we can find some way to commemorate the moment. I really did have a great time.

loc.en: I've got technology for this! Smile!
loc.ru: I've got technology for this! Smile!

loc.en: At least we had a good time!
loc.ru: At least we had a good time!

loc.en: It's so. Much. Money.
loc.ru: It's so. Much. Money.

loc.en: No vault is safe from US! Mwa-ha-ha!
loc.ru: No vault is safe from US! Mwa-ha-ha!

loc.en: Hey {PlayerName}, feeling up to a challenge? My old friend Mr. McDuck just asked me to rob his shop.
loc.ru: Hey {PlayerName}, feeling up to a challenge? My old friend Mr. McDuck just asked me to rob his shop.

loc.en: No problem. Find me when you've got a minute 'cause I'm pretty sure you're gonna want in on this.
loc.ru: No problem. Find me when you've got a minute 'cause I'm pretty sure you're gonna want in on this.

loc.en: Well, he told me he got something called a "security system" to protect his vault when he's away, and he wants me to test it.
loc.ru: Well, he told me he got something called a "security system" to protect his vault when he's away, and he wants me to test it.

loc.en: So, I thought maybe you'd wanna join me. Could be fun!
loc.ru: So, I thought maybe you'd wanna join me. Could be fun!

loc.en: Yeah, I bet we will.
loc.ru: Yeah, I bet we will.

loc.en: Hold on. If we do manage to beat his security, we're giving everything back.
loc.ru: Hold on. If we do manage to beat his security, we're giving everything back.

loc.en: Yeah, Mr. McDuck did mention that you're one of his best customers. In fact, he's who suggested we team up.
loc.ru: Yeah, Mr. McDuck did mention that you're one of his best customers. In fact, he's who suggested we team up.

loc.en: He thinks pretty highly of you. 'Course, I'm not surprised.
loc.ru: He thinks pretty highly of you. 'Course, I'm not surprised.

loc.en: You know what? I'll take your word for it.
loc.ru: You know what? I'll take your word for it.

loc.en: Glad you asked!
loc.ru: Glad you asked!

loc.en: Whoa! Slow down, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: Whoa! Slow down, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: Are you kidding me?! He's got better recordkeeping than the palace treasury! Now...
loc.ru: Are you kidding me?! He's got better recordkeeping than the palace treasury! Now...

loc.en: Phew! Well...
loc.ru: Phew! Well...

loc.en: First things first: Could ya <Lore>talk to Mr. McDuck</Lore> and tell him we'll test his system? He said he'd give you the details.
loc.ru: First things first: Could ya <Lore>talk to Mr. McDuck</Lore> and tell him we'll test his system? He said he'd give you the details.

loc.en: I think I need to go do some stretches. I'm feeling a little rusty.
loc.ru: I think I need to go do some stretches. I'm feeling a little rusty.

loc.en: Rob his shop? Context please!
loc.ru: Rob his shop? Context please!

loc.en: Let's talk about this later.
loc.ru: Let's talk about this later.

loc.en: I spend a LOT of time in that shop!
loc.ru: I spend a LOT of time in that shop!

loc.en: We'll make a great team!
loc.ru: We'll make a great team!

loc.en: It'll be nice to GET something from Mr. McDuck for a change.
loc.ru: It'll be nice to GET something from Mr. McDuck for a change.

loc.en: I'll help you out...
loc.ru: I'll help you out...

loc.en: I'll have to thank him!
loc.ru: I'll have to thank him!

loc.en: How dare he? I'm his best BEST customer.
loc.ru: How dare he? I'm his best BEST customer.

loc.en: What's the next step?
loc.ru: What's the next step?

loc.en: Let's go try the security system now!
loc.ru: Let's go try the security system now!

loc.en: Of course! I was joking.
loc.ru: Of course! I was joking.

loc.en: He wouldn't miss a few gemstones...
loc.ru: He wouldn't miss a few gemstones...

loc.en: Aladdin, lad! You and {PlayerName} have bested my system.
loc.ru: Aladdin, lad! You and {PlayerName} have bested my system.

loc.en: Thank ya kindly! I'll have to keep lookin' for ways to protect my shop.
loc.ru: Thank ya kindly! I'll have to keep lookin' for ways to protect my shop.

loc.en: Hey, anytime!
loc.ru: Hey, anytime!

loc.en: I'm just happy to help a friend. Also...
loc.ru: I'm just happy to help a friend. Also...

loc.en: There's a huge pile of gold coins in my House. You're gonna have to come get 'em.
loc.ru: There's a huge pile of gold coins in my House. You're gonna have to come get 'em.

loc.en: Could ya go talk to Mr. McDuck and get the details for how he wants us to test the security system in his shop?
loc.ru: Could ya go talk to Mr. McDuck and get the details for how he wants us to test the security system in his shop?

loc.en: You said Mr. McDuck wanted us to go into his shop and have a look around, right?
loc.ru: You said Mr. McDuck wanted us to go into his shop and have a look around, right?

loc.en: Let's take a close look around the shop. Maybe we'll find something to help us.
loc.ru: Let's take a close look around the shop. Maybe we'll find something to help us.

loc.en: We need to get ready for our heist. You might wanna <Lore>change your clothing</Lore>.
loc.ru: We need to get ready for our heist. You might wanna <Lore>change your clothing</Lore>.

loc.en: Let me get this straight: Whenever we're ready to test the security system in Mr. McDuck's shop, I just need to <Lore>press the big red button on the wall beside the counter</Lore>?
loc.ru: Let me get this straight: Whenever we're ready to test the security system in Mr. McDuck's shop, I just need to <Lore>press the big red button on the wall beside the counter</Lore>?

loc.en: That's what he said. Ready when you are.
loc.ru: That's what he said. Ready when you are.

loc.en: Seems like that one button turns off the lights. Guess we need to <Lore>press more buttons to turn off more lights</Lore> so we can keep moving towards the button.
loc.ru: Seems like that one button turns off the lights. Guess we need to <Lore>press more buttons to turn off more lights</Lore> so we can keep moving towards the button.

loc.en: All right! We made it all the way to the vault!
loc.ru: All right! We made it all the way to the vault!

loc.en: What now?
loc.ru: What now?

loc.en: Did you see that? A bunch of coins just flew away!
loc.ru: Did you see that? A bunch of coins just flew away!

loc.en: Mr. McDuck must have had them enchanted to keep them safe from thieves.
loc.ru: Mr. McDuck must have had them enchanted to keep them safe from thieves.

loc.en: Huh... Well, guess we better <Lore>catch those coins<Lore>!
loc.ru: Huh... Well, guess we better <Lore>catch those coins<Lore>!

loc.en: We need to <Lore>catch all the enchanted coins from Mr. McDuck's vault</Lore>.
loc.ru: We need to <Lore>catch all the enchanted coins from Mr. McDuck's vault</Lore>.

loc.en: They could be anywhere in the Valley.
loc.ru: They could be anywhere in the Valley.

loc.en: Let's split up and look for the missing coins. We gotta <Lore>search all over the Valley</Lore>.
loc.ru: Let's split up and look for the missing coins. We gotta <Lore>search all over the Valley</Lore>.

loc.en: You got a bunch of the coins? I got some too! Let's gather 'em all together <Lore>in my House</Lore>.
loc.ru: You got a bunch of the coins? I got some too! Let's gather 'em all together <Lore>in my House</Lore>.

loc.en: Hey, {PlayerName}! Do you have those coins you collected?
loc.ru: Hey, {PlayerName}! Do you have those coins you collected?

loc.en: You said you have some sort of technology that'll let us capture the moment?
loc.ru: You said you have some sort of technology that'll let us capture the moment?

loc.en: Oh, that's right! My Phone! ... I'll explain that later. Say cheese! ... I'll explain THAT later too.
loc.ru: Oh, that's right! My Phone! ... I'll explain that later. Say cheese! ... I'll explain THAT later too.

loc.en: We better let Mr. McDuck know his money isn't safe.
loc.ru: We better let Mr. McDuck know his money isn't safe.

loc.en: When all the loose coins in the shop are caught, bring yours to me.
loc.ru: When all the loose coins in the shop are caught, bring yours to me.

loc.en: Are ya ready to put Mr. McDuck's new security to the test?
loc.ru: Are ya ready to put Mr. McDuck's new security to the test?

loc.en: We might wanna <Lore>wait for nightfall</Lore> to try and test Mr. McDuck's security system.
loc.ru: We might wanna <Lore>wait for nightfall</Lore> to try and test Mr. McDuck's security system.

loc.en: In the meantime, you could <Lore>put on some clothes that won't slow ya down</Lore> if we need to make a quick escape.
loc.ru: In the meantime, you could <Lore>put on some clothes that won't slow ya down</Lore> if we need to make a quick escape.

loc.en: We need to figure out how this system works to get past it. Let's start slow... Why don't ya <Lore>push the button on the table upstairs in Mr. McDuck's shop</Lore>?
loc.ru: We need to figure out how this system works to get past it. Let's start slow... Why don't ya <Lore>push the button on the table upstairs in Mr. McDuck's shop</Lore>?

loc.en: Seems like that one button turns off the lights. Guess we need to <Lore>press more buttons to turn off more lights</Lore> so we can get downstairs in the shop.
loc.ru: Seems like that one button turns off the lights. Guess we need to <Lore>press more buttons to turn off more lights</Lore> so we can get downstairs in the shop.

loc.en: That was a blast!
loc.ru: That was a blast!

loc.en: And hey, maybe when Mr. McDuck finds some new security, he'll ask us to test his NEXT system.
loc.ru: And hey, maybe when Mr. McDuck finds some new security, he'll ask us to test his NEXT system.

loc.en: Me too. It's great to be doing stuff together again.
loc.ru: Me too. It's great to be doing stuff together again.

loc.en: It'll make for a good story, that's for sure. Even Mr. McDuck thought it was impressive!
loc.ru: It'll make for a good story, that's for sure. Even Mr. McDuck thought it was impressive!

loc.en: Well, you did great!
loc.ru: Well, you did great!

loc.en: I loved every minute.
loc.ru: I loved every minute.

loc.en: I'm glad it's over; that was stressful!
loc.ru: I'm glad it's over; that was stressful!

loc.en: At least we get to brag that we broke into the vault!
loc.ru: At least we get to brag that we broke into the vault!

loc.en: Whoa, {PlayerName}! You're a really good scout.
loc.ru: Whoa, {PlayerName}! You're a really good scout.

loc.en: Are ya ready for the next part of the plan?
loc.ru: Are ya ready for the next part of the plan?

loc.en: Don't worry; I'll be with you the whole time. And remember: This is to help Mr. McDuck. Okay now...
loc.ru: Don't worry; I'll be with you the whole time. And remember: This is to help Mr. McDuck. Okay now...

loc.en: Okay, I've been thinking about this...
loc.ru: Okay, I've been thinking about this...

loc.en: Hold on! Rushing in isn't a great idea.
loc.ru: Hold on! Rushing in isn't a great idea.

loc.en: We need to be able to move quickly and quietly. You never know when you'll have to make a quick getaway.
loc.ru: We need to be able to move quickly and quietly. You never know when you'll have to make a quick getaway.

loc.en: Sounds like I should <Lore>put on some sporty clothes</Lore>.
loc.ru: Sounds like I should <Lore>put on some sporty clothes</Lore>.

loc.en: Great idea. And remember: Master thieves usually work at night. We might wanna consider that.
loc.ru: Great idea. And remember: Master thieves usually work at night. We might wanna consider that.

loc.en: Bring it on!
loc.ru: Bring it on!

loc.en: I'm getting nervous...
loc.ru: I'm getting nervous...

loc.en: Let's break into that vault!
loc.ru: Let's break into that vault!

loc.en: Why don't ya try <Lore>pushing that button on the table over there</Lore> to see what it does? I'll keep watch. I don't want any surprises.
loc.ru: Why don't ya try <Lore>pushing that button on the table over there</Lore> to see what it does? I'll keep watch. I don't want any surprises.

loc.en: Whoa. That's different. And a little intense.
loc.ru: Whoa. That's different. And a little intense.

loc.en: Don't panic, {PlayerName}. We just need to stay alert, and we'll get through this.
loc.ru: Don't panic, {PlayerName}. We just need to stay alert, and we'll get through this.

loc.en: Yeah. Sure. You're right.
loc.ru: Yeah. Sure. You're right.

loc.en: That's right. I know we can figure this out.
loc.ru: That's right. I know we can figure this out.

loc.en: Let's look around and see what we're dealing with. What jumps out at you?
loc.ru: Let's look around and see what we're dealing with. What jumps out at you?

loc.en: Right. Buttons like the one on the wall beside the counter.
loc.ru: Right. Buttons like the one on the wall beside the counter.

loc.en: You're right. There are new <Lore>lights shining in big pools</Lore>.
loc.ru: You're right. There are new <Lore>lights shining in big pools</Lore>.

loc.en: Something tells me we <Lore>need to stay out of those</Lore>.
loc.ru: Something tells me we <Lore>need to stay out of those</Lore>.

loc.en: That button started the system. Wonder <Lore>what these ones will start... or stop</Lore>.
loc.ru: That button started the system. Wonder <Lore>what these ones will start... or stop</Lore>.

loc.en: Okay, let's jump in!
loc.ru: Okay, let's jump in!

loc.en: We have to <Lore>make it to the vault without getting caught</Lore>.
loc.ru: We have to <Lore>make it to the vault without getting caught</Lore>.

loc.en: Just need to be careful, go slow, and take our time.
loc.ru: Just need to be careful, go slow, and take our time.

loc.en: We can figure this out together!
loc.ru: We can figure this out together!

loc.en: What did we get ourselves into?!
loc.ru: What did we get ourselves into?!

loc.en: Mr. McDuck's security isn't ready for us.
loc.ru: Mr. McDuck's security isn't ready for us.

loc.en: Lights.
loc.ru: Lights.

loc.en: Buttons.
loc.ru: Buttons.

loc.en: I'll figure it out as we go!
loc.ru: I'll figure it out as we go!

loc.en: All right! We made it all the way to the vault!
loc.ru: All right! We made it all the way to the vault!

loc.en: Yeah, but not tougher than us!
loc.ru: Yeah, but not tougher than us!

loc.en: You think THAT was easy?! Guess I picked the right partner for this.
loc.ru: You think THAT was easy?! Guess I picked the right partner for this.

loc.en: Well, we're almost there!
loc.ru: Well, we're almost there!

loc.en: Now all we need to do is open the vault. I've got this part...
loc.ru: Now all we need to do is open the vault. I've got this part...

loc.en: No sweat; that was easy!
loc.ru: No sweat; that was easy!

loc.en: That was tough!
loc.ru: That was tough!

loc.en: Let's get that GOLD!
loc.ru: Let's get that GOLD!

loc.en: I think we got all of the flying coins in the shop.
loc.ru: I think we got all of the flying coins in the shop.

loc.en: Great! Now we just need to get the ones that escaped out into the Valley.
loc.ru: Great! Now we just need to get the ones that escaped out into the Valley.

loc.en: That's not a thing coins normally do here, right? At least I don't remember that from before.
loc.ru: That's not a thing coins normally do here, right? At least I don't remember that from before.

loc.en: I'd say so. I've seen carpets fly, but not coins!
loc.ru: I'd say so. I've seen carpets fly, but not coins!

loc.en: He did say he had a "last resort" if we reached the vault.
loc.ru: He did say he had a "last resort" if we reached the vault.

loc.en: Ya know, I'm starting to see that.
loc.ru: Ya know, I'm starting to see that.

loc.en: {PlayerName}, if we wanna REALLY test this, we need to <Lore>catch all of the coins<Lore>. Ready when you are!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, if we wanna REALLY test this, we need to <Lore>catch all of the coins<Lore>. Ready when you are!

loc.en: Mr. McDuck must have had the coins enchanted!
loc.ru: Mr. McDuck must have had the coins enchanted!

loc.en: No. This security system is next level!
loc.ru: No. This security system is next level!

loc.en: No such thing as normal in the Valley!
loc.ru: No such thing as normal in the Valley!

loc.en: Okay... We're here.
loc.ru: Okay... We're here.

loc.en: Yeah, that's because things haven't started yet.
loc.ru: Yeah, that's because things haven't started yet.

loc.en: Not sure what any of that means, but don't worry, {PlayerName}. We haven't started yet.
loc.ru: Not sure what any of that means, but don't worry, {PlayerName}. We haven't started yet.

loc.en: Mr. McDuck said he was getting something called a "trial version" of the security system until he's sure the protection's worth the money.
loc.ru: Mr. McDuck said he was getting something called a "trial version" of the security system until he's sure the protection's worth the money.

loc.en: He told me with this version, we have to start the challenge ourselves by pressing a big red button.
loc.ru: He told me with this version, we have to start the challenge ourselves by pressing a big red button.

loc.en: Like that <Lore>big red button beside you on the wall right there</Lore>?
loc.ru: Like that <Lore>big red button beside you on the wall right there</Lore>?

loc.en: Yeah, guess that's the one.
loc.ru: Yeah, guess that's the one.

loc.en: He said to <Lore>press the button when we're ready to start<Lore>.
loc.ru: He said to <Lore>press the button when we're ready to start<Lore>.

loc.en: Not sure.
loc.ru: Not sure.

loc.en: I'll hold you to that. Let's keep going.
loc.ru: I'll hold you to that. Let's keep going.

loc.en: Seems... kinda normal in here.
loc.ru: Seems... kinda normal in here.

loc.en: ... Nothing looks different.
loc.ru: ... Nothing looks different.

loc.en: No laser beams? No robot dogs?
loc.ru: No laser beams? No robot dogs?

loc.en: Smart!
loc.ru: Smart!

loc.en: Classic.
loc.ru: Classic.

loc.en: Let me guess: It's only good for 14 days?
loc.ru: Let me guess: It's only good for 14 days?

loc.en: Don't worry about it. Moving on!
loc.ru: Don't worry about it. Moving on!

loc.en: I'll explain that joke some other time.
loc.ru: I'll explain that joke some other time.

loc.en: Hey, Aladdin! I got a bunch of books from the Dreamlight Library to help us make a magic carpet!
loc.ru: Hey, Aladdin! I got a bunch of books from the Dreamlight Library to help us make a magic carpet!

loc.en: Great! Let's check 'em out... Okay, looks like we need to make our carpet from scratch â that works! We wanted to do that anyway.
loc.ru: Great! Let's check 'em out... Okay, looks like we need to make our carpet from scratch â that works! We wanted to do that anyway.

loc.en: That's actually why I asked Minnie to help us. She's really skilled with fabrics for clothing and decorating.
loc.ru: That's actually why I asked Minnie to help us. She's really skilled with fabrics for clothing and decorating.

loc.en: Could ya <Lore>talk to her</Lore> while I read these books more closely?
loc.ru: Could ya <Lore>talk to her</Lore> while I read these books more closely?

loc.en: Hey, this is great! You got everything we need. Thanks, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: Hey, this is great! You got everything we need. Thanks, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: Next step is you sit back and relax while I get to work. This might take a while.
loc.ru: Next step is you sit back and relax while I get to work. This might take a while.

loc.en: Well, now you can get some rest while I go to work.
loc.ru: Well, now you can get some rest while I go to work.

loc.en: Here it is! What do you think?
loc.ru: Here it is! What do you think?

loc.en: Always nice to know I can impress someone as impressive as you.
loc.ru: Always nice to know I can impress someone as impressive as you.

loc.en: Heh. Yeah, it was harder than I thought. Hey, maybe the magic will fix it!
loc.ru: Heh. Yeah, it was harder than I thought. Hey, maybe the magic will fix it!

loc.en: Thanks! I'm pretty proud of it.
loc.ru: Thanks! I'm pretty proud of it.

loc.en: Now all we have to do is use this <Lore>Magic Scroll</Lore> that was stored inside the Fabric Enchantment book. Care to do the honors?
loc.ru: Now all we have to do is use this <Lore>Magic Scroll</Lore> that was stored inside the Fabric Enchantment book. Care to do the honors?

loc.en: Once this carpet's enchanted, I have a surprise for ya!
loc.ru: Once this carpet's enchanted, I have a surprise for ya!

loc.en: What's the next step?
loc.ru: What's the next step?

loc.en: You're welcome!
loc.ru: You're welcome!

loc.en: I'm pretty used to it.
loc.ru: I'm pretty used to it.

loc.en: It's really beautiful.
loc.ru: It's really beautiful.

loc.en: I'm really impressed!
loc.ru: I'm really impressed!

loc.en: Your weaving needs a little work.
loc.ru: Your weaving needs a little work.

loc.en: Hey {PlayerName}, I've been thinking... How'd you like to get around the Valley with your own <Lore>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</Lore>?
loc.ru: Hey {PlayerName}, I've been thinking... How'd you like to get around the Valley with your own <Lore>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</Lore>?

loc.en: Sure, no problem. Come talk to me when you've got some time.
loc.ru: Sure, no problem. Come talk to me when you've got some time.

loc.en: Oh, okay. Well, we'll make this one low-flying.
loc.ru: Oh, okay. Well, we'll make this one low-flying.

loc.en: Ha-ha! I thought you might say that!
loc.ru: Ha-ha! I thought you might say that!

loc.en: After chasing all those enchanted coins from Mr. McDuck's vault around the Valley, I bet you could really use a carpet to get around quick.
loc.ru: After chasing all those enchanted coins from Mr. McDuck's vault around the Valley, I bet you could really use a carpet to get around quick.

loc.en: I mean, it won't be exactly like my friend Carpet, but I think you could have a lot of fun getting around the Valley on it.
loc.ru: I mean, it won't be exactly like my friend Carpet, but I think you could have a lot of fun getting around the Valley on it.

loc.en: Well, I guess there's really only one place to start: We gotta figure out how to make a carpet fly.
loc.ru: Well, I guess there's really only one place to start: We gotta figure out how to make a carpet fly.

loc.en: Hey, you deserve it!
loc.ru: Hey, you deserve it!

loc.en: That's okay. We won't be doing this alone.
loc.ru: That's okay. We won't be doing this alone.

loc.en: Would you <Lore>talk to Merlin</Lore> and ask him if he knows anything about enchanting carpets?
loc.ru: Would you <Lore>talk to Merlin</Lore> and ask him if he knows anything about enchanting carpets?

loc.en: That's what I was thinking!
loc.ru: That's what I was thinking!

loc.en: "Step count"? You'll have to explain that later. But glad you're interested!
loc.ru: "Step count"? You'll have to explain that later. But glad you're interested!

loc.en: Trust me: Some kind of <ActivityItem>Dreamlight Carpet</ActivityItem> will change your life.
loc.ru: Trust me: Some kind of <ActivityItem>Dreamlight Carpet</ActivityItem> will change your life.

loc.en: While you do that, I'm gonna ask around about carpet weaving.
loc.ru: While you do that, I'm gonna ask around about carpet weaving.

loc.en: First things first...
loc.ru: First things first...

loc.en: My own flying carpet? Let's make it happen!
loc.ru: My own flying carpet? Let's make it happen!

loc.en: Maybe later!
loc.ru: Maybe later!

loc.en: It would be nice to glide around in style!
loc.ru: It would be nice to glide around in style!

loc.en: I'm kind of afraid of heights...
loc.ru: I'm kind of afraid of heights...

loc.en: Well, most days I'm way over my step count, so sure!
loc.ru: Well, most days I'm way over my step count, so sure!

loc.en: I'm in â what do we need?
loc.ru: I'm in â what do we need?

loc.en: That's so thoughtful of you!
loc.ru: That's so thoughtful of you!

loc.en: Not sure I'm good at carpet weaving...
loc.ru: Not sure I'm good at carpet weaving...

loc.en: Did you ask Merlin for advice on making your magic carpet? Let me guess: He recommended some good <Lore>books</Lore>?
loc.ru: Did you ask Merlin for advice on making your magic carpet? Let me guess: He recommended some good <Lore>books</Lore>?

loc.en: Did you get those supplies for the carpet Minnie suggested?
loc.ru: Did you get those supplies for the carpet Minnie suggested?

loc.en: Have you gotten the supplies for the <ActivityItem>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</ActivityItem> yet?
loc.ru: Have you gotten the supplies for the <ActivityItem>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</ActivityItem> yet?

loc.en: Yep, working on it!
loc.ru: Yep, working on it!

loc.en: You collected all the supplies we need for the carpet, right? Could you bring 'em to me?
loc.ru: You collected all the supplies we need for the carpet, right? Could you bring 'em to me?

loc.en: The book said you need to use that <Lore>Magic Scroll</Lore> on the carpet. You can do that, right? You're the magic one here!
loc.ru: The book said you need to use that <Lore>Magic Scroll</Lore> on the carpet. You can do that, right? You're the magic one here!

loc.en: You ready to go on your Dreamlight Magic Carpet Valley tour? You'll have to get the carpet ready first.
loc.ru: You ready to go on your Dreamlight Magic Carpet Valley tour? You'll have to get the carpet ready first.

loc.en: Have you got your carpet ready to go?
loc.ru: Have you got your carpet ready to go?

loc.en: Yep! It's equipped and I'm ready to go on my Valley tour!
loc.ru: Yep! It's equipped and I'm ready to go on my Valley tour!

loc.en: Did ya get lost? Glide under the banner in the Plaza, and then head left towards the Forest of Valor.
loc.ru: Did ya get lost? Glide under the banner in the Plaza, and then head left towards the Forest of Valor.

loc.en: Did you get off course? Head into the Forest of Valor from the Plaza.
loc.ru: Did you get off course? Head into the Forest of Valor from the Plaza.

loc.en: How's the flying tour going? Next you should head under the banner where the Forest of Valor leads to Dazzle Beach.
loc.ru: How's the flying tour going? Next you should head under the banner where the Forest of Valor leads to Dazzle Beach.

loc.en: Next stop on your tour â head from Dazzle Beach into the Peaceful Meadow. You want the entrance closest to the Cursed Cave.
loc.ru: Next stop on your tour â head from Dazzle Beach into the Peaceful Meadow. You want the entrance closest to the Cursed Cave.

loc.en: Pass under the banner on the stairs from the Peaceful Meadow down to Dazzle Beach.
loc.ru: Pass under the banner on the stairs from the Peaceful Meadow down to Dazzle Beach.

loc.en: You're almost done! Just fly under the banner I set up over the bridge on Dazzle Beach.
loc.ru: You're almost done! Just fly under the banner I set up over the bridge on Dazzle Beach.

loc.en: Last stop on your Dreamlight Magic Carpet tour is to fly under the banner at the dock near Skull Rock.
loc.ru: Last stop on your Dreamlight Magic Carpet tour is to fly under the banner at the dock near Skull Rock.

loc.en: Hey, {PlayerName}! Did ya ask Merlin about how to enchant a carpet to fly?
loc.ru: Hey, {PlayerName}! Did ya ask Merlin about how to enchant a carpet to fly?

loc.en: Oh, no... I still need to talk to him.
loc.ru: Oh, no... I still need to talk to him.

loc.en: Follow me. I have a surprise for you and your new Dreamlight Magic Carpet.
loc.ru: Follow me. I have a surprise for you and your new Dreamlight Magic Carpet.

loc.en: Did you talk to Minnie about what we need for our carpet?
loc.ru: Did you talk to Minnie about what we need for our carpet?

loc.en: You finished!
loc.ru: You finished!

loc.en: How'd you enjoy your flying carpet tour of the Valley?
loc.ru: How'd you enjoy your flying carpet tour of the Valley?

loc.en: You make it look easy. I think you're a natural.
loc.ru: You make it look easy. I think you're a natural.

loc.en: Right? Something about it just gives you a fresh point of view.
loc.ru: Right? Something about it just gives you a fresh point of view.

loc.en: Sorry about that. Next time, maybe Genie will be here so I can ask him to mark the course with big flashing lights.
loc.ru: Sorry about that. Next time, maybe Genie will be here so I can ask him to mark the course with big flashing lights.

loc.en: Take it from me, {PlayerName}: Flying carpets are pretty useful on all kinds of adventures.
loc.ru: Take it from me, {PlayerName}: Flying carpets are pretty useful on all kinds of adventures.

loc.en: I hope this one helps you on yours!
loc.ru: I hope this one helps you on yours!

loc.en: It made everything feel brand-new!
loc.ru: It made everything feel brand-new!

loc.en: Gliding was super fun!
loc.ru: Gliding was super fun!

loc.en: I got a little lost...
loc.ru: I got a little lost...

loc.en: Hey, I think it's working! You did it, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: Hey, I think it's working! You did it, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: I was just getting to that.
loc.ru: I was just getting to that.

loc.en: I think your new carpet's ready to fly. Here...
loc.ru: I think your new carpet's ready to fly. Here...

loc.en: <Lore>Follow me</Lore>.
loc.ru: <Lore>Follow me</Lore>.

loc.en: Good, because I've set up something special for ya.
loc.ru: Good, because I've set up something special for ya.

loc.en: I can't wait to fly it!
loc.ru: I can't wait to fly it!

loc.en: You mentioned something about a surprise?
loc.ru: You mentioned something about a surprise?

loc.en: Okay, here's the surprise...
loc.ru: Okay, here's the surprise...

loc.en: Flying's actually kind of tiring. This'll help keep your energy up.
loc.ru: Flying's actually kind of tiring. This'll help keep your energy up.

loc.en: One of my favorite memories with Carpet was taking Jasmine on this amazing nighttime tour. We saw things we'd never seen before... And even the things we already knew looked different. More magical, somehow.
loc.ru: One of my favorite memories with Carpet was taking Jasmine on this amazing nighttime tour. We saw things we'd never seen before... And even the things we already knew looked different. More magical, somehow.

loc.en: So I set up a tour for you to take around the Valley on your new <Lore>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</Lore>!
loc.ru: So I set up a tour for you to take around the Valley on your new <Lore>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</Lore>!

loc.en: No way; this is just for you. Go as slow or as fast as you want.
loc.ru: No way; this is just for you. Go as slow or as fast as you want.

loc.en: I'm glad you think so!
loc.ru: I'm glad you think so!

loc.en: In my experience, flying carpets are usually pretty smooth. So hopefully, it won't be a problem.
loc.ru: In my experience, flying carpets are usually pretty smooth. So hopefully, it won't be a problem.

loc.en: But before you do, I have some fresh-baked treats from Minnie for you. She was so excited about this, she was baking while I was weaving.
loc.ru: But before you do, I have some fresh-baked treats from Minnie for you. She was so excited about this, she was baking while I was weaving.

loc.en: While you're out there, keep an eye out for the <Lore>banners I set up</Lore>. They'll show you where to go.
loc.ru: While you're out there, keep an eye out for the <Lore>banners I set up</Lore>. They'll show you where to go.

loc.en: That's the perfect way to test it out!
loc.ru: That's the perfect way to test it out!

loc.en: It's not a race, is it?
loc.ru: It's not a race, is it?

loc.en: What if I get carpet-sick?
loc.ru: What if I get carpet-sick?

loc.en: You did it! And look at this!
loc.ru: You did it! And look at this!

loc.en: A serving set made of gold! Just like all the ones Jasmine has at the palace... *sigh*
loc.ru: A serving set made of gold! Just like all the ones Jasmine has at the palace... *sigh*

loc.en: Can ya give me a minute? I have to <Lore>show this to Jasmine</Lore>.
loc.ru: Can ya give me a minute? I have to <Lore>show this to Jasmine</Lore>.

loc.en: These are just what I need to finish the bouquet.
loc.ru: These are just what I need to finish the bouquet.

loc.en: Thanks, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: Thanks, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: You gotta come with me to bring these flowers to Jasmine!
loc.ru: You gotta come with me to bring these flowers to Jasmine!

loc.en: {PlayerName}, am I glad to see you! I could really use your help making an unforgettable gift for Jasmine.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, am I glad to see you! I could really use your help making an unforgettable gift for Jasmine.

loc.en: I get it. But hey, let's talk when you have a moment, okay?
loc.ru: I get it. But hey, let's talk when you have a moment, okay?

loc.en: Well, I'm making Jasmine a bouquet.
loc.ru: Well, I'm making Jasmine a bouquet.

loc.en: Ha. You and Abu would definitely get along. Plus, gems are pretty valuable.
loc.ru: Ha. You and Abu would definitely get along. Plus, gems are pretty valuable.

loc.en: More than you think. Lots of Villagers use gems for plenty of things. Magic, arts and crafts, decorating...
loc.ru: More than you think. Lots of Villagers use gems for plenty of things. Magic, arts and crafts, decorating...

loc.en: Really? Do ya think the Village would like it if they could get their hands on gems more easily?
loc.ru: Really? Do ya think the Village would like it if they could get their hands on gems more easily?

loc.en: Well, then I say we make it happen.
loc.ru: Well, then I say we make it happen.

loc.en: You sure?
loc.ru: You sure?

loc.en: Whoa, I can tell!
loc.ru: Whoa, I can tell!

loc.en: I love the stalls in the Agrabah marketplace.
loc.ru: I love the stalls in the Agrabah marketplace.

loc.en: The vendors from far-off lands, the fruits, the breads...
loc.ru: The vendors from far-off lands, the fruits, the breads...

loc.en: Ya know, I'd like to bring some of that here. {PlayerName}, could you <Lore>head back to the marketplace in Agrabah and get building supplies for our stall</Lore>?
loc.ru: Ya know, I'd like to bring some of that here. {PlayerName}, could you <Lore>head back to the marketplace in Agrabah and get building supplies for our stall</Lore>?

loc.en: He was so excited!
loc.ru: He was so excited!

loc.en: I'd be pretty happy if someone brought ME gems.
loc.ru: I'd be pretty happy if someone brought ME gems.

loc.en: Gems are shiny. Shiny good.
loc.ru: Gems are shiny. Shiny good.

loc.en: I think so too.
loc.ru: I think so too.

loc.en: Everyone would love it!
loc.ru: Everyone would love it!

loc.en: That's a great idea!
loc.ru: That's a great idea!

loc.en: I NEED IT.
loc.ru: I NEED IT.

loc.en: You mean like a gem stall?
loc.ru: You mean like a gem stall?

loc.en: I've been waiting for a gem stall forever!
loc.ru: I've been waiting for a gem stall forever!

loc.en: Very sure!
loc.ru: Very sure!

loc.en: This is not joke time; this is SERIOUS!
loc.ru: This is not joke time; this is SERIOUS!

loc.en: Okay! I spoke to everyone and they seem REALLY excited about the marketplace!
loc.ru: Okay! I spoke to everyone and they seem REALLY excited about the marketplace!

loc.en: Hey, that's great news. AND you're just in time... Everything's ready!
loc.ru: Hey, that's great news. AND you're just in time... Everything's ready!

loc.en: All ya have to do is <Lore>set up the Gem Stall</Lore>, and the other <Lore>Valley stalls</Lore> you want to add, and decorate!
loc.ru: All ya have to do is <Lore>set up the Gem Stall</Lore>, and the other <Lore>Valley stalls</Lore> you want to add, and decorate!

loc.en: I tried to take care of everything we need... Here!
loc.ru: I tried to take care of everything we need... Here!

loc.en: The Gem Stall's ready, the marketplace looks great... You sure you don't have a little genie magic, {PlayerName}?
loc.ru: The Gem Stall's ready, the marketplace looks great... You sure you don't have a little genie magic, {PlayerName}?

loc.en: I'm not. I'm serious!
loc.ru: I'm not. I'm serious!

loc.en: You should be. It's pretty impressive.
loc.ru: You should be. It's pretty impressive.

loc.en: Seems to me like you don't need wishes. You're making amazing things happen all on your own.
loc.ru: Seems to me like you don't need wishes. You're making amazing things happen all on your own.

loc.en: For example...
loc.ru: For example...

loc.en: I'll prove it.
loc.ru: I'll prove it.

loc.en: Oh, one last thing...
loc.ru: Oh, one last thing...

loc.en: When I told Mr. McDuck that we wanted to open up a new marketplace, he was as excited as if I'd brought him a treasure map.
loc.ru: When I told Mr. McDuck that we wanted to open up a new marketplace, he was as excited as if I'd brought him a treasure map.

loc.en: All you have to do is <Lore>put it close to the new Gem Stall</Lore>, and we can celebrate!
loc.ru: All you have to do is <Lore>put it close to the new Gem Stall</Lore>, and we can celebrate!

loc.en: He even gave me this <ActivityItem>Grand Opening Balloon Arch</ActivityItem> to help celebrate the opening of our new market.
loc.ru: He even gave me this <ActivityItem>Grand Opening Balloon Arch</ActivityItem> to help celebrate the opening of our new market.

loc.en: Thanks! I'm proud of my decorating!
loc.ru: Thanks! I'm proud of my decorating!

loc.en: You're just being nice.
loc.ru: You're just being nice.

loc.en: I wish!
loc.ru: I wish!

loc.en: Here you go! It's all of the chocolate I found around your House.

loc.en: Oh... no, no, I can't even LOOK at more chocolate right now! Please, can you get rid of it for me?
loc.ru: Oh... no, no, I can't even LOOK at more chocolate right now! Please, can you get rid of it for me?

loc.en: I suppose I COULD eat it for you... if you insist.
loc.ru: I suppose I COULD eat it for you... if you insist.

loc.en: Yes! Please! Just get rid of it!
loc.ru: Yes! Please! Just get rid of it!

loc.en: Oh {PlayerName}, I'm so glad you're here! I could really use some help.
loc.ru: Oh {PlayerName}, I'm so glad you're here! I could really use some help.

loc.en: What happened?
loc.ru: What happened?

loc.en: I don't know... One second, I'm wishing I could eat chocolate every day, and the next... well...
loc.ru: I don't know... One second, I'm wishing I could eat chocolate every day, and the next... well...

loc.en: Not exactly, though you aren't far off.
loc.ru: Not exactly, though you aren't far off.

loc.en: Kind of, actually.
loc.ru: Kind of, actually.

loc.en: Oh, if only!
loc.ru: Oh, if only!

loc.en: Suddenly, everything I touch turns to chocolate!
loc.ru: Suddenly, everything I touch turns to chocolate!

loc.en: It's so weird! I wish for chocolate at LEAST once a day. But this time, something actually happened!
loc.ru: It's so weird! I wish for chocolate at LEAST once a day. But this time, something actually happened!

loc.en: I know what happened. There's some wish magic loose in the Valley. I haven't quite gotten to the bottom of it yet, but I'm working on it.
loc.ru: I know what happened. There's some wish magic loose in the Valley. I haven't quite gotten to the bottom of it yet, but I'm working on it.

loc.en: Wish magic? That sounds like it could get dangerous.
loc.ru: Wish magic? That sounds like it could get dangerous.

loc.en: She'll let me know if anything bad can come of this.

loc.ru: Hmm, now if I remember correctly, this phrasing signifies "protection" of some sort. But from what?

loc.ru: There are also mentions of caravans, and the "bite of the desert's rage"... Do you think that could be a reference to sandstorms?

loc.ru: Protection against sandstorms?! That's perfect! There are those giant whirling veils of sand around Agrabah that are blocking me from exploring!

loc.en: Oh, but there are three indentations here that look like settings for gemstones.
loc.ru: Oh, but there are three indentations here that look like settings for gemstones.

loc.ru: If we <Lore>find the three missing stones</Lore>, that might activate the power of the Amulet!

loc.ru: Great, we've got our next objective then!

loc.ru: Thank you so much for your help. Here's the Amulet back. Once the stones are found, Aladdin should be able to set them properly.

loc.en: From evil viziers?

loc.en: From ancient wind structures?
loc.ru: From ancient wind structures?

loc.en: There are a lot of people that miss you and haven't seen you since the Forgetting. I promise, you'll start to remember once you get there.
loc.ru: There are a lot of people that miss you and haven't seen you since the Forgetting. I promise, you'll start to remember once you get there.

loc.en: Jasmine! How are you feeling?
loc.ru: Jasmine! How are you feeling?

loc.en: I'm so relieved it's finally over!
loc.ru: I'm so relieved it's finally over!

loc.en: I keep running over a list in my mind of what the people of Agrabah need to be safe and... I think it's finally completed!
loc.ru: I keep running over a list in my mind of what the people of Agrabah need to be safe and... I think it's finally completed!

loc.en: Yeah! And now I think you deserve a well-earned vacation. Why don't you come visit Dreamlight Valley with me?
loc.ru: Yeah! And now I think you deserve a well-earned vacation. Why don't you come visit Dreamlight Valley with me?

loc.ru: It's strange, but I feel like everything you're saying is... true. And right. Is there somewhere for Aladdin and I to stay?

loc.en: Not right now, but that can be the first thing we do when we arrive!
loc.ru: Not right now, but that can be the first thing we do when we arrive!

loc.en: Then I'd be happy to go. Thank you. I just need to say goodbye to my father and Rajah first.
loc.ru: Then I'd be happy to go. Thank you. I just need to say goodbye to my father and Rajah first.

loc.ru: Oh, {PlayerName}... I'm starting to remember all the marvelous times I had here with my friends!

loc.en: Do you think they remember me?
loc.ru: Do you think they remember me?

loc.en: If they were affected by the Forgetting, that doesn't mean they can't regain lost memories!
loc.ru: If they were affected by the Forgetting, that doesn't mean they can't regain lost memories!

loc.en: But we'll be there to help bring those memories back.
loc.ru: But we'll be there to help bring those memories back.

loc.ru: That's the great thing about the Valley â we have all the time we need to make new memories together.

loc.en: Thank you, {PlayerName}... This is such a gift.
loc.ru: Thank you, {PlayerName}... This is such a gift.

loc.en: Having you and Aladdin back is a gift too!
loc.ru: Having you and Aladdin back is a gift too!

loc.en: Now you relax, make yourself at home, and I'll have <Lore>Aladdin here with you shortly</Lore>.
loc.ru: Now you relax, make yourself at home, and I'll have <Lore>Aladdin here with you shortly</Lore>.

loc.en: Definitely!
loc.ru: Definitely!

loc.en: Maybe the memories are hazy.
loc.ru: Maybe the memories are hazy.

loc.en: If they don't, I'll reintroduce you.
loc.ru: If they don't, I'll reintroduce you.

loc.ru: Follow me! The <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore> isn't far.

loc.ru: We still can't get through. Did you see anything from the rooftops?

loc.ru: Where could those other ingots of <ActivityItem>Artisans' Alloy</ActivityItem> be?

loc.en: I'll keep looking!
loc.ru: I'll keep looking!

loc.ru: I'm glad you know how to make the adjustments to your Pickaxe yourself. Our metalworker is safely sheltering in the palace.

loc.en: Oh yeah â crafting Tool upgrades? I've got this.
loc.ru: Oh yeah â crafting Tool upgrades? I've got this.

loc.ru: Hmm, it's pretty tricky navigating around here...

loc.ru: Look, it's Aladdin!

loc.en: Oh, it has been so long â I must speak with him!
loc.ru: Oh, it has been so long â I must speak with him!

loc.ru: Thank you, {PlayerName}, for helping me find Aladdin.

loc.ru: How come he's not helping you with all this?

loc.en: Thank you so much for helping me free Aladdin!
loc.ru: Thank you so much for helping me free Aladdin!

loc.ru: There's still a lot of work to do in Agrabah, but now that there's three of us, I feel much better about our chances.

loc.ru: I'm not going to stop until Agrabah is back to normal and you two feel safe leaving the city as-is.

loc.en: So what's next?
loc.ru: So what's next?

loc.en: Well, we have to rescue the Magic Carpet as quickly as we can, then there are repairs needed in the marketplace, and of course, we need to figure out how to disable the Windcaller.
loc.ru: Well, we have to rescue the Magic Carpet as quickly as we can, then there are repairs needed in the marketplace, and of course, we need to figure out how to disable the Windcaller.

loc.ru: Oh, he got stuck in a flurry of winds surrounding the Windcaller.

loc.en: The winds there are so intense that poor Carpet hasn't been able to get free.
loc.ru: The winds there are so intense that poor Carpet hasn't been able to get free.

loc.en: Unfortunately, he's still traveling. And we have no way to get in touch with him.
loc.ru: Unfortunately, he's still traveling. And we have no way to get in touch with him.

loc.en: We need to figure out a way to quell the winds and get him out.
loc.ru: We need to figure out a way to quell the winds and get him out.

loc.ru: To put it simply, it's a mess.

loc.ru: Most of the market stalls are broken, and some are covered in ruined produce.

loc.ru: Well, hopefully I can help a little in his place.

loc.ru: Then there's the fountain. We never got to finish it.

loc.ru: As I said, we found it locked away in a vault under the city.

loc.ru: I suppose that means that people in the past had to deal with it too. We just need to figure out how!

loc.ru: Hopefully, one of us can find a lead.

loc.ru: Yes! Now why don't you <Lore>talk to Aladdin</Lore>? I am sure he has some ideas about what we need to do to rescue Carpet.

loc.ru: Sounds tricky, but we can do this!

loc.ru: Oh, that's wonderful! I hope the adjustments you make to your Pickaxe work.

loc.ru: I won't be stopped!

loc.en: I'll do my best.

loc.ru: It's me, {PlayerName}. I came to see if you and Jasmine want to visit Dreamlight Valley with me.

loc.en: Well, get ready to head back into the marketplace to fix things up!
loc.ru: Well, get ready to head back into the marketplace to fix things up!

loc.ru: Aladdin! It's really you!

loc.ru: Huh, you seem familiar. Like we met a long time ago...

loc.ru: I'm here to find you! I got to Agrabah and found the Windcaller just looming over everything and whipping the winds into a frenzy...

loc.ru: I was able to make my way over to Jasmine and she explained what was going on.

loc.en: Heh. Yeah, I guess I've been stuck here for a while now. I was trying to fly up to the Windcaller to figure things out, but Carpet and I got hit by a nasty downdraft.
loc.ru: Heh. Yeah, I guess I've been stuck here for a while now. I was trying to fly up to the Windcaller to figure things out, but Carpet and I got hit by a nasty downdraft.

loc.ru: I fell here, and Carpet's been caught up in the winds ever since.

loc.ru: And then maybe you and Jasmine will be able to take a break and visit Dreamlight Valley with me.

loc.ru: Ya know, that place sounds more and more familiar... But Jasmine'll want to make sure that everyone in Agrabah's safe before we go anywhere.

loc.en: Are you all right?
loc.ru: Are you all right?

loc.en: Well, let's go rescue Carpet!
loc.ru: Well, let's go rescue Carpet!

loc.en: Now we can work together to save Agrabah!
loc.ru: Now we can work together to save Agrabah!

loc.en: Wonderful! Don't forget to <Lore>check chests in the area</Lore> â the alloy is a valuable metal so would have been placed somewhere secure for safekeeping.
loc.ru: Wonderful! Don't forget to <Lore>check chests in the area</Lore> â the alloy is a valuable metal so would have been placed somewhere secure for safekeeping.

loc.ru: Finally! We've made it. This is the <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore>.

loc.ru: You're right. I suppose being so close to the Windcaller, it was especially affected by the sandstorms.

loc.ru: I wanted to come here because the artisans in Agrabah make special tools to work the extremely hard stone found in the area.

loc.en: We should be able to find ingots of a substance called <ActivityItem>Artisans' Alloy</ActivityItem> that's far harder and more durable than regular metals.
loc.ru: We should be able to find ingots of a substance called <ActivityItem>Artisans' Alloy</ActivityItem> that's far harder and more durable than regular metals.

loc.en: That's great! If I find enough of that, I bet I can <Lore>upgrade my Royal Pickaxe</Lore> so it'll break down the sandstone barriers! Then, we'll really have a shot at finding Aladdin!
loc.ru: That's great! If I find enough of that, I bet I can <Lore>upgrade my Royal Pickaxe</Lore> so it'll break down the sandstone barriers! Then, we'll really have a shot at finding Aladdin!

loc.en: I'm afraid he's at the palace with everyone else.
loc.ru: I'm afraid he's at the palace with everyone else.

loc.ru: It looks a little worse for wear.

loc.en: Is there a metalworker nearby?
loc.ru: Is there a metalworker nearby?

loc.en: What will we do here?
loc.ru: What will we do here?

loc.en: Jasmine!
loc.ru: Jasmine!

loc.en: Hello? Do I know you? If you're a visitor to Agrabah, I'm afraid you've come at a rather difficult time.
loc.ru: Hello? Do I know you? If you're a visitor to Agrabah, I'm afraid you've come at a rather difficult time.

loc.en: We met before, but it was a long time ago.
loc.ru: We met before, but it was a long time ago.

loc.en: You can. I promise. So... what's been going on here?! Everything is all... windy and sandy.
loc.ru: You can. I promise. So... what's been going on here?! Everything is all... windy and sandy.

loc.en: Oh, I'm {PlayerName}. I come from a faraway place called Dreamlight Valley.
loc.ru: Oh, I'm {PlayerName}. I come from a faraway place called Dreamlight Valley.

loc.en: Dreamlight Valley... That does sound familiar, but I can't recall exactly where it is. And you... You seem familiar too.
loc.ru: Dreamlight Valley... That does sound familiar, but I can't recall exactly where it is. And you... You seem familiar too.

loc.en: It's funny... For some reason, I know I can trust you.
loc.ru: It's funny... For some reason, I know I can trust you.

loc.en: That's an understatement. When you came into town, did you see that <Lore>floating stone structure</Lore>?
loc.ru: That's an understatement. When you came into town, did you see that <Lore>floating stone structure</Lore>?

loc.en: Do you think there's something around here that I could use to make it stronger?
loc.ru: Do you think there's something around here that I could use to make it stronger?

loc.en: Agrabah is unfortunately a dangerous place right now â I had not expected to see anyone here.
loc.ru: Agrabah is unfortunately a dangerous place right now â I had not expected to see anyone here.

loc.en: Well, the problems began when we started some recent construction in the marketplace.
loc.ru: Well, the problems began when we started some recent construction in the marketplace.

loc.en: I wanted to build a new fountain so that everyone in Agrabah could have an additional source of fresh water.
loc.ru: I wanted to build a new fountain so that everyone in Agrabah could have an additional source of fresh water.

loc.en: Sounds like a great idea!
loc.ru: Sounds like a great idea!

loc.en: I thought so, but it turns out I should've done more research before choosing a location.
loc.ru: I thought so, but it turns out I should've done more research before choosing a location.

loc.en: When the construction crew was excavating to place some pipes, they stumbled onto a buried vault with that stone structure inside.
loc.ru: When the construction crew was excavating to place some pipes, they stumbled onto a buried vault with that stone structure inside.

loc.en: As soon as it was exposed to the air, these winds began to stir! The structure floated into the air, and the winds just got stronger and stronger.
loc.ru: As soon as it was exposed to the air, these winds began to stir! The structure floated into the air, and the winds just got stronger and stronger.

loc.en: In moments, it was hovering over the marketplace and the winds were depositing sand all over Agrabah!
loc.ru: In moments, it was hovering over the marketplace and the winds were depositing sand all over Agrabah!

loc.en: No. But it must be older than Agrabah itself! Or it's from a version of the city that's been lost to history.
loc.ru: No. But it must be older than Agrabah itself! Or it's from a version of the city that's been lost to history.

loc.en: We've been referring to it as <Lore>the Windcaller</Lore>.
loc.ru: We've been referring to it as <Lore>the Windcaller</Lore>.

loc.en: I'm not sure. He and the Magic Carpet were trying to find a way to stop the winds, but Carpet got trapped in a vortex.
loc.ru: I'm not sure. He and the Magic Carpet were trying to find a way to stop the winds, but Carpet got trapped in a vortex.
