loc.ru: Aladdin must have been trapped somewhere as well, otherwise he would have certainly returned to me.

loc.en: For now, yes. They're sheltering in the palace where they're safe.
loc.ru: For now, yes. They're sheltering in the palace where they're safe.

loc.en: Thank you! I can't tell you how much I appreciate that. Now then, I think we should <Lore>find Aladdin</Lore> first. He was looking for a way to stop the winds from the rooftops, but I'm afraid he's been trapped somewhere.

loc.ru: Okay â what's our next step then? I'm here to help.

loc.ru: But that's not a permanent solution. We need to stop these winds.

loc.ru: I've been trying too, but most of Agrabah's streets are blocked by a strange, incredibly tough sandstone formed by the storm deposits.

loc.en: Hmm... Well, <Lore>the Artisans' District</Lore> is nearby. With any luck, we'll find something there that will help.
loc.ru: Hmm... Well, <Lore>the Artisans' District</Lore> is nearby. With any luck, we'll find something there that will help.

loc.ru: It's kinda hard to miss.

loc.en: I was wondering about that.
loc.ru: I was wondering about that.

loc.en: Oh wow, no â guess I was focusing on the market.
loc.ru: Oh wow, no â guess I was focusing on the market.

loc.en: Do you know where it came from?
loc.ru: Do you know where it came from?

loc.en: Where's Aladdin?
loc.ru: Where's Aladdin?

loc.en: Are the people of Agrabah all right?
loc.ru: Are the people of Agrabah all right?

loc.ru: Let's get to work!

loc.en: Maybe if we talk more, your memories will come back.
loc.ru: Maybe if we talk more, your memories will come back.

loc.en: All you need to know is that I'm here to help.

loc.ru: There's got to be another way in. Let me think...

loc.en: Thank you!
loc.ru: Thank you!

loc.en: If you <Lore>break down those sandstone barriers</Lore>, the path should be clear.
loc.ru: If you <Lore>break down those sandstone barriers</Lore>, the path should be clear.

loc.en: Good luck, {PlayerName}. I hope Aladdin's where I think he is.
loc.ru: Good luck, {PlayerName}. I hope Aladdin's where I think he is.

loc.en: I'll do my best to <Lore>find Aladdin</Lore>. Once I clear the way you should be able to follow after me safely.
loc.ru: I'll do my best to <Lore>find Aladdin</Lore>. Once I clear the way you should be able to follow after me safely.

loc.en: Did you have something you wanted to show me, {PlayerName}?
loc.ru: Did you have something you wanted to show me, {PlayerName}?

loc.en: Yeah, Aladdin and I found this <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>, but... Oh, now where did I leave it?
loc.ru: Yeah, Aladdin and I found this <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>, but... Oh, now where did I leave it?

loc.en: You got us an Alchemy Table? That's marvelous!
loc.ru: You got us an Alchemy Table? That's marvelous!

loc.en: I'm sure if you <Lore>speak to Aladdin again</Lore>, he'll have an idea for how to get it working.
loc.ru: I'm sure if you <Lore>speak to Aladdin again</Lore>, he'll have an idea for how to get it working.

loc.en: You're gathering supplies for the Alchemy Tables? Hmm, I seem to remember that they need <Lore>a source of fuel and coal</Lore>.
loc.ru: You're gathering supplies for the Alchemy Tables? Hmm, I seem to remember that they need <Lore>a source of fuel and coal</Lore>.

loc.en: Keep <Lore>searching around the marketplace</Lore>. <Lore>Stalls with yellow awnings</Lore> will likely have what you need, and don't be afraid to <Lore>check out the fire pits</Lore>.
loc.ru: Keep <Lore>searching around the marketplace</Lore>. <Lore>Stalls with yellow awnings</Lore> will likely have what you need, and don't be afraid to <Lore>check out the fire pits</Lore>.

loc.en: I think we're nearly ready to try some alchemy! Please let me know when you have the Alchemy Table ready.
loc.ru: I think we're nearly ready to try some alchemy! Please let me know when you have the Alchemy Table ready.

loc.en: You're searching for pieces of an Alchemy Table? Well, that's something that could've been blown pretty far. Maybe even outside the walls of Agrabah.
loc.ru: You're searching for pieces of an Alchemy Table? Well, that's something that could've been blown pretty far. Maybe even outside the walls of Agrabah.

loc.en: How are you doing with the Alchemy Table?
loc.ru: How are you doing with the Alchemy Table?

loc.en: Getting there! I found the pieces; just need to put them together now.
loc.ru: Getting there! I found the pieces; just need to put them together now.

loc.en: I'm almost done translating another portion of the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>. Why don't you see if Aladdin needs a hand with anything?
loc.ru: I'm almost done translating another portion of the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>. Why don't you see if Aladdin needs a hand with anything?

loc.en: You should be able to find pieces of gold by <Lore>breaking up the sandstone deposits</Lore>.
loc.ru: You should be able to find pieces of gold by <Lore>breaking up the sandstone deposits</Lore>.

loc.en: Then, try looking around the Artisans' District for the mold. That's where lamps were made before the Windcaller started this mess.
loc.ru: Then, try looking around the Artisans' District for the mold. That's where lamps were made before the Windcaller started this mess.

loc.en: You found it all, {PlayerName}! Thank you!
loc.ru: You found it all, {PlayerName}! Thank you!

loc.en: Would you take the <ActivityItem>Gold Shards</ActivityItem> and the <ActivityItem>Lamp Mold</ActivityItem> and make a lamp that we can enchant?
loc.ru: Would you take the <ActivityItem>Gold Shards</ActivityItem> and the <ActivityItem>Lamp Mold</ActivityItem> and make a lamp that we can enchant?

loc.en: I still need some time to translate this book. Why don't you see if Aladdin needs help with anything?
loc.ru: I still need some time to translate this book. Why don't you see if Aladdin needs help with anything?

loc.en: Sure, on my way!
loc.ru: Sure, on my way!

loc.en: The dialect in this book is new to me. I'll need more time to properly translate it.
loc.ru: The dialect in this book is new to me. I'll need more time to properly translate it.

loc.en: But I'm sure Aladdin could use your help.
loc.ru: But I'm sure Aladdin could use your help.

loc.en: Okay Jasmine, I have the lamp, all ready to be enchanted!
loc.ru: Okay Jasmine, I have the lamp, all ready to be enchanted!

loc.en: Marvelous!
loc.ru: Marvelous!

loc.en: Are you sure you aren't a genie, {PlayerName}? You're certainly making all our wishes come true!
loc.ru: Are you sure you aren't a genie, {PlayerName}? You're certainly making all our wishes come true!

loc.en: Hmm... Sounds familiar.
loc.ru: Hmm... Sounds familiar.

loc.en: Well, I am glad for your powers â without them, this would be far more difficult.
loc.ru: Well, I am glad for your powers â without them, this would be far more difficult.

loc.en: Hmm... Perhaps you can explain more later.
loc.ru: Hmm... Perhaps you can explain more later.

loc.en: It turns out genie magic is going to help us. I've translated more of the Tome!
loc.ru: It turns out genie magic is going to help us. I've translated more of the Tome!

loc.en: If we can find remnants of the wishes that Aladdin made, we can use them to enchant the <ActivityItem>Golden Lamp</ActivityItem>!
loc.ru: If we can find remnants of the wishes that Aladdin made, we can use them to enchant the <ActivityItem>Golden Lamp</ActivityItem>!

loc.en: Why don't you <Lore>talk to Aladdin</Lore>? He can tell you more about the wishes he made.
loc.ru: Why don't you <Lore>talk to Aladdin</Lore>? He can tell you more about the wishes he made.

loc.en: The question is â how do we do that?
loc.ru: The question is â how do we do that?

loc.en: Hmm, sounds like it might be a job for some Dreamlight Magic!
loc.ru: Hmm, sounds like it might be a job for some Dreamlight Magic!

loc.en: Oh, I didn't know you had that sort of power, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: Oh, I didn't know you had that sort of power, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: It says we need wish magic, and it explains that every time a genie grants a wish, there's a chance of a magical remnant or "echo."
loc.ru: It says we need wish magic, and it explains that every time a genie grants a wish, there's a chance of a magical remnant or "echo."

loc.en: Nah, I don't do well with itty-bitty living spaces.
loc.ru: Nah, I don't do well with itty-bitty living spaces.

loc.en: Phenomenal cosmic powers? More like Dreamlight powers.
loc.ru: Phenomenal cosmic powers? More like Dreamlight powers.

loc.en: Kind of. But not exactly. Let's say genie-adjacent.
loc.ru: Kind of. But not exactly. Let's say genie-adjacent.

loc.en: I'm sure there's a <ActivityItem>Lamp Mold</ActivityItem> in the <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore>... though it may be buried under the sand.
loc.ru: I'm sure there's a <ActivityItem>Lamp Mold</ActivityItem> in the <Lore>Artisans' District</Lore>... though it may be buried under the sand.

loc.en: Jasmine! We've got the <ActivityItem>Alchemy Table</ActivityItem> all set up!
loc.ru: Jasmine! We've got the <ActivityItem>Alchemy Table</ActivityItem> all set up!

loc.en: Wonderful! I've been examining the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>, and I think I know what we need to do to stop the Windcaller.
loc.ru: Wonderful! I've been examining the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>, and I think I know what we need to do to stop the Windcaller.

loc.en: The first thing we need is a <ActivityItem>Lamp</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: The first thing we need is a <ActivityItem>Lamp</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: Well, something similar.
loc.ru: Well, something similar.

loc.en: Fabulous!
loc.ru: Fabulous!

loc.en: Fortunately not!
loc.ru: Fortunately not!

loc.en: If I'm right, we can create a lamp that will house the energy surrounding the Windcaller in the same way that a lamp contains a bound genie.
loc.ru: If I'm right, we can create a lamp that will house the energy surrounding the Windcaller in the same way that a lamp contains a bound genie.

loc.en: All right, how do we craft it?
loc.ru: All right, how do we craft it?

loc.en: Well, we'll need <ActivityItem>Gold Shards</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: Well, we'll need <ActivityItem>Gold Shards</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: There was some that was going to be used to decorate the fountain, but the ingots got pulled into the winds and set down with the sandstone deposits.
loc.ru: There was some that was going to be used to decorate the fountain, but the ingots got pulled into the winds and set down with the sandstone deposits.

loc.en: If you can find <ActivityItem>Gold Shards</ActivityItem> and a mold we can pour the gold into, that should do the trick.
loc.ru: If you can find <ActivityItem>Gold Shards</ActivityItem> and a mold we can pour the gold into, that should do the trick.

loc.en: All right, I can handle that â especially with the <ActivityItem>Protection Amulet</ActivityItem> that I made with Aladdin. And once I have the <ActivityItem>Lamp</ActivityItem> forged?
loc.ru: All right, I can handle that â especially with the <ActivityItem>Protection Amulet</ActivityItem> that I made with Aladdin. And once I have the <ActivityItem>Lamp</ActivityItem> forged?

loc.en: I'm still not sure. Why don't you come see me once you've made the Lamp, and I'll keep studying the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: I'm still not sure. Why don't you come see me once you've made the Lamp, and I'll keep studying the <ActivityItem>Ancient Tome</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: Like... a magic genie lamp?
loc.ru: Like... a magic genie lamp?

loc.en: Shouldn't be a problem!
loc.ru: Shouldn't be a problem!

loc.en: Please tell me this doesn't involve Jafar.
loc.ru: Please tell me this doesn't involve Jafar.

loc.en: Okay, Jasmine, I hope this works...
loc.ru: Okay, Jasmine, I hope this works...

loc.en: So do I! Now, let me see, the Tome said to combine the enchantment and the new lamp in a very particular way...
loc.ru: So do I! Now, let me see, the Tome said to combine the enchantment and the new lamp in a very particular way...

loc.en: There!
loc.ru: There!

loc.en: We did it, {PlayerName}! With this new lamp, you should be able to remove the barrier blocking the way to the Windcaller and rescue the Magic Carpet!
loc.ru: We did it, {PlayerName}! With this new lamp, you should be able to remove the barrier blocking the way to the Windcaller and rescue the Magic Carpet!

loc.en: Well, no time like the present. Let's go find our missing textile friend!
loc.ru: Well, no time like the present. Let's go find our missing textile friend!

loc.en: What sort of work was left on the fountain?
loc.ru: What sort of work was left on the fountain?

loc.en: We still need to <Lore>make a spout</Lore> for the top, as well as put the finishing touches on the pipes.
loc.ru: We still need to <Lore>make a spout</Lore> for the top, as well as put the finishing touches on the pipes.

loc.en: You should be able to find the resources you need around Agrabah. One benefit of the Windcaller is that we have no shortage of raw materials.
loc.ru: You should be able to find the resources you need around Agrabah. One benefit of the Windcaller is that we have no shortage of raw materials.

loc.en: Okay, I think I have everything I need to craft new pipes for the fountain.
loc.ru: Okay, I think I have everything I need to craft new pipes for the fountain.

loc.en: Thank you! Now, once you've made it, it shouldn't be difficult to install. The final layout of the pipes may prove difficult, though.
loc.ru: Thank you! Now, once you've made it, it shouldn't be difficult to install. The final layout of the pipes may prove difficult, though.

loc.en: I think I'm ready to put the new pipes on the fountain!
loc.ru: I think I'm ready to put the new pipes on the fountain!

loc.en: That's fabulous!
loc.ru: That's fabulous!

loc.en: Hmm, unfortunately, I am not an expert in plumbing.
loc.ru: Hmm, unfortunately, I am not an expert in plumbing.

loc.en: Have you tried working through different configurations of the pipes? One of them will surely connect the reservoir to the fountain.
loc.ru: Have you tried working through different configurations of the pipes? One of them will surely connect the reservoir to the fountain.

loc.en: {PlayerName}, we're so close to shutting down the Windcaller and saving Agrabah! We just need to finish enchanting the lamp.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, we're so close to shutting down the Windcaller and saving Agrabah! We just need to finish enchanting the lamp.

loc.en: Could you <Lore>talk to Aladdin about his three wishes</Lore>? That might help us track down some of the wish magic we need for the lamp.
loc.ru: Could you <Lore>talk to Aladdin about his three wishes</Lore>? That might help us track down some of the wish magic we need for the lamp.

loc.en: Jasmine, any suggestions as to where I might find some of the remnants of Aladdin's first wish?
loc.ru: Jasmine, any suggestions as to where I might find some of the remnants of Aladdin's first wish?

loc.en: Hmm, have you looked outside Agrabah? Maybe the desert winds brought some of the sand from the oasis here.
loc.ru: Hmm, have you looked outside Agrabah? Maybe the desert winds brought some of the sand from the oasis here.

loc.en: Oh, look at that water â it's beautiful!
loc.ru: Oh, look at that water â it's beautiful!

loc.en: And hopefully, if you collect some of the water, you'll find a remnant of Aladdin's second wish.
loc.ru: And hopefully, if you collect some of the water, you'll find a remnant of Aladdin's second wish.

loc.en: You should be able to find some of <ActivityItem>Genie's Joy</ActivityItem> around the higher spots of Agrabah.
loc.ru: You should be able to find some of <ActivityItem>Genie's Joy</ActivityItem> around the higher spots of Agrabah.

loc.en: You found all of the wish remnants? Wonderful! Now we can begin to craft the enchantment for the lamp!
loc.ru: You found all of the wish remnants? Wonderful! Now we can begin to craft the enchantment for the lamp!

loc.en: You still have the lamp, don't you? Then go to the big whirlwind under the Windcaller and let the lamp's magic take effect!
loc.ru: You still have the lamp, don't you? Then go to the big whirlwind under the Windcaller and let the lamp's magic take effect!

loc.en: You found all of the wish remnants? Wonderful! Now we can begin to craft the enchantment for the lamp!
loc.ru: You found all of the wish remnants? Wonderful! Now we can begin to craft the enchantment for the lamp!

loc.en: {PlayerName}, you did it! I'm so happy the Magic Carpet's safe again. Thank you!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, you did it! I'm so happy the Magic Carpet's safe again. Thank you!

loc.en: Perhaps for you. I know it was a difficult task.
loc.ru: Perhaps for you. I know it was a difficult task.

loc.en: You're right. Things are always easier when you have friends to help out.
loc.ru: You're right. Things are always easier when you have friends to help out.

loc.en: And I can't wait to tell the residents of Agrabah that it's safe to return to their homes.
loc.ru: And I can't wait to tell the residents of Agrabah that it's safe to return to their homes.

loc.en: Now we only have the Windcaller to deal with.
loc.ru: Now we only have the Windcaller to deal with.

loc.en: I think you should work with Aladdin on that. Though the way's been cleared, I'm sure the winds up high are intense, and Aladdin's a much more experienced flyer than I am.
loc.ru: I think you should work with Aladdin on that. Though the way's been cleared, I'm sure the winds up high are intense, and Aladdin's a much more experienced flyer than I am.

loc.en: The three of you will have to <Lore>head up to the top of the wind swirl</Lore>, and then hopefully we can put an end to this whole mess.
loc.ru: The three of you will have to <Lore>head up to the top of the wind swirl</Lore>, and then hopefully we can put an end to this whole mess.

loc.en: Easy as pie.
loc.ru: Easy as pie.

loc.en: We all did it â together!
loc.ru: We all did it â together!

loc.en: Agrabah will be back to normal soon!
loc.ru: Agrabah will be back to normal soon!

loc.en: Sure! What do you want to know?
loc.ru: Sure! What do you want to know?

loc.en: Any details you can share would be good. You never know what might lead us to some of the wish magic.
loc.ru: Any details you can share would be good. You never know what might lead us to some of the wish magic.

loc.en: Oh, that one... Not exactly my smartest idea, but I wished to be a prince.
loc.ru: Oh, that one... Not exactly my smartest idea, but I wished to be a prince.

loc.en: I was in an oasis not too far from Agrabah, and Abu and I had managed to trick Genie into getting us out of the Cave of Wonders.
loc.ru: I was in an oasis not too far from Agrabah, and Abu and I had managed to trick Genie into getting us out of the Cave of Wonders.

loc.en: He was kinda annoyed that we pulled one over on him, so I had to be pretty clear that this was my first wish.
loc.ru: He was kinda annoyed that we pulled one over on him, so I had to be pretty clear that this was my first wish.

loc.en: My second wish was a real emergency.
loc.ru: My second wish was a real emergency.

loc.en: I was caught by the guards loyal to Jafar, and they slapped some manacles on me and threw me into the sea!
loc.ru: I was caught by the guards loyal to Jafar, and they slapped some manacles on me and threw me into the sea!

loc.en: I never would've made it without Genie's help. To be honest, I barely even remember making the wish, but I'm sure glad Genie saved me.
loc.ru: I never would've made it without Genie's help. To be honest, I barely even remember making the wish, but I'm sure glad Genie saved me.

loc.en: That was definitely my best wish!
loc.ru: That was definitely my best wish!

loc.en: We were on a balcony overlooking the city, and I wished for Genie's freedom.
loc.ru: We were on a balcony overlooking the city, and I wished for Genie's freedom.

loc.en: Genie didn't believe me at first. I think I was halfway to being a prince again before he really heard what I'd wished.
loc.ru: Genie didn't believe me at first. I think I was halfway to being a prince again before he really heard what I'd wished.

loc.en: Well, let's get started. Those remnants of Genie's wishes won't find themselves!
loc.ru: Well, let's get started. Those remnants of Genie's wishes won't find themselves!

loc.en: Hey Aladdin, can we talk about your experience with wishes?
loc.ru: Hey Aladdin, can we talk about your experience with wishes?

loc.en: ...your first wish.
loc.ru: ...your first wish.

loc.en: ...your second wish.
loc.ru: ...your second wish.

loc.en: ...your third wish.
loc.ru: ...your third wish.

loc.en: No, I know all about those wishes already.
loc.ru: No, I know all about those wishes already.

loc.en: Tell me about...
loc.ru: Tell me about...

loc.en: Jasmine, I'm trying to track down remnants of Aladdin's second wish.
loc.ru: Jasmine, I'm trying to track down remnants of Aladdin's second wish.

loc.en: He was underwater when he made it, so I don't think I can really find any of the wish magic hanging around here. But, can you tell me any more about this fountain that you were building?
loc.ru: He was underwater when he made it, so I don't think I can really find any of the wish magic hanging around here. But, can you tell me any more about this fountain that you were building?

loc.en: Of course! There aren't many sources of fresh water nearby, so Genie used his magic to enchant a reservoir to change sea water to fresh water.
loc.ru: Of course! There aren't many sources of fresh water nearby, so Genie used his magic to enchant a reservoir to change sea water to fresh water.

loc.en: The reservoir is almost full, but with the work on the fountain halted, we were never able to pump any water into Agrabah.
loc.ru: The reservoir is almost full, but with the work on the fountain halted, we were never able to pump any water into Agrabah.

loc.en: Well, we have some very talented engineers here. And Genie, of course.
loc.ru: Well, we have some very talented engineers here. And Genie, of course.

loc.en: It's just a short distance outside of Agrabah.
loc.ru: It's just a short distance outside of Agrabah.

loc.en: It's nearly done!
loc.ru: It's nearly done!

loc.en: We just have to <Lore>hook up the pipes</Lore>.
loc.ru: We just have to <Lore>hook up the pipes</Lore>.

loc.en: If you can help us finish the work on the fountain, the water you need can be piped right to you!
loc.ru: If you can help us finish the work on the fountain, the water you need can be piped right to you!

loc.en: That's quite the infrastructure project!
loc.ru: That's quite the infrastructure project!

loc.en: Can you direct me to the reservoir?
loc.ru: Can you direct me to the reservoir?

loc.en: What work is left on the fountain?
loc.ru: What work is left on the fountain?

loc.en: There's just one wish left to track down, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: There's just one wish left to track down, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: Yeah! What can you tell me about Aladdin's last wish?
loc.ru: Yeah! What can you tell me about Aladdin's last wish?

loc.en: The wish that freed Genie...
loc.ru: The wish that freed Genie...

loc.en: You know if I hadn't already fallen in love with Aladdin, such a selfless act would have made me do so immediately.
loc.ru: You know if I hadn't already fallen in love with Aladdin, such a selfless act would have made me do so immediately.

loc.en: He did! After waiting for so long...
loc.ru: He did! After waiting for so long...

loc.en: Yes. Thousands of years.
loc.ru: Yes. Thousands of years.

loc.en: I suspect someplace far away. The clothes he conjured for himself were unlike any I'd ever seen.
loc.ru: I suspect someplace far away. The clothes he conjured for himself were unlike any I'd ever seen.

loc.en: He was so happy that as he flew around, he created these lovely lights â almost like the fireworks I saw with Aladdin when we went on our magic carpet ride.
loc.ru: He was so happy that as he flew around, he created these lovely lights â almost like the fireworks I saw with Aladdin when we went on our magic carpet ride.

loc.en: Then the lights became these amazing sparks that we used to make our own fireworks â they made the most fabulous colors in the sky!
loc.ru: Then the lights became these amazing sparks that we used to make our own fireworks â they made the most fabulous colors in the sky!

loc.en: We called it <ActivityItem>Genie's Joy</ActivityItem>. I know we didn't use them all. If you can find some, I'm sure we can use them to enchant the lamp.
loc.ru: We called it <ActivityItem>Genie's Joy</ActivityItem>. I know we didn't use them all. If you can find some, I'm sure we can use them to enchant the lamp.

loc.en: Genie deserved his freedom!
loc.ru: Genie deserved his freedom!

loc.en: Poor Genie had to have been waiting for so long...
loc.ru: Poor Genie had to have been waiting for so long...

loc.en: I wonder where Genie is vacationing now.
loc.ru: I wonder where Genie is vacationing now.

loc.en: I'm sure they'll <Lore>complete a story</Lore> from bottom to top. We should look around for clues that will tell us the correct order of symbols.
loc.ru: I'm sure they'll <Lore>complete a story</Lore> from bottom to top. We should look around for clues that will tell us the correct order of symbols.

loc.en: I can't believe I didn't think of this before... I'm really glad you're here, Jasmine.
loc.ru: I can't believe I didn't think of this before... I'm really glad you're here, Jasmine.

loc.en: Jasmine! What are you doing here?
loc.ru: Jasmine! What are you doing here?

loc.en: I heard you were asking around the Village about some sort of pillar, covered in art. So I thought, perhaps, you could use my help.
loc.ru: I heard you were asking around the Village about some sort of pillar, covered in art. So I thought, perhaps, you could use my help.

loc.en: I studied a lot of ancient art in the library at the palace.
loc.ru: I studied a lot of ancient art in the library at the palace.

loc.en: I don't know if I'm an expert, but I might be able to help.
loc.ru: I don't know if I'm an expert, but I might be able to help.

loc.en: I'd love to join you.
loc.ru: I'd love to join you.

loc.en: So, tell me... What combinations have you tried?
loc.ru: So, tell me... What combinations have you tried?

loc.en: Well, I'm here now.
loc.ru: Well, I'm here now.

loc.en: Combinations?
loc.ru: Combinations?

loc.en: Yes. Combinations of symbols on this pillar. The <Lore>pieces rotate</Lore>, don't they?
loc.ru: Yes. Combinations of symbols on this pillar. The <Lore>pieces rotate</Lore>, don't they?

loc.en: Now we can search as a team!
loc.ru: Now we can search as a team!

loc.en: Sounds like you're the expert we need!
loc.ru: Sounds like you're the expert we need!

loc.en: I knew we should have invited you...
loc.ru: I knew we should have invited you...

loc.en: We think this pillar leads to treasure...
loc.ru: We think this pillar leads to treasure...

loc.en: Here are the <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming<ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: Here are the <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming<ActivityItem>.

loc.en: These look fabulous! Let's go put them in my House.
loc.ru: These look fabulous! Let's go put them in my House.

loc.en: I found this <ActivityItem>Envelope of Seeds</ActivityItem> in Merlin's library! Do they look familiar?
loc.ru: I found this <ActivityItem>Envelope of Seeds</ActivityItem> in Merlin's library! Do they look familiar?

loc.en: The seeds! Oh, I remember now! I asked Merlin to help me... There was something I needed to keep safe from harm.
loc.ru: The seeds! Oh, I remember now! I asked Merlin to help me... There was something I needed to keep safe from harm.

loc.en: I can't remember that part, but I do know it was something important.
loc.ru: I can't remember that part, but I do know it was something important.

loc.en: I'm not sure. I just know whatever the item was, it needed to be protected. So it must've been something important.
loc.ru: I'm not sure. I just know whatever the item was, it needed to be protected. So it must've been something important.

loc.en: Yes, but not just any seeds and flower pots! There's magic embedded in them.
loc.ru: Yes, but not just any seeds and flower pots! There's magic embedded in them.

loc.en: I was trying to protect something important.
loc.ru: I was trying to protect something important.

loc.en: Something important?
loc.ru: Something important?

loc.en: I'm not sure... It's just a feeling I have.
loc.ru: I'm not sure... It's just a feeling I have.

loc.en: There was a secret hidden inside an Enchanted Flower. You must have been helping to protect this secret. I just wish you remembered what it was.
loc.ru: There was a secret hidden inside an Enchanted Flower. You must have been helping to protect this secret. I just wish you remembered what it was.

loc.ru: There isn't any snow near Agrabah. So, as a child, I dreamed of cold, snowy lands to explore.

loc.ru: Oh, {PlayerName}... I don't know what to say.

loc.ru: I remember now... When I was young, it felt like everyone was telling me what to do all of the time. I never had a chance to do what I wanted, to just be myself.

loc.en: Hmm... Oh! I think I see something!
loc.ru: Hmm... Oh! I think I see something!

loc.en: Follow me!
loc.ru: Follow me!

loc.en: This petal is definitely big enough to have fallen from the Enchanted Flower. It looks like there's another one over that way.
loc.ru: This petal is definitely big enough to have fallen from the Enchanted Flower. It looks like there's another one over that way.

loc.en: Then let's <Lore>follow the giant petal trail</Lore>!
loc.ru: Then let's <Lore>follow the giant petal trail</Lore>!

loc.en: {PlayerName}, we have a problem, and I think it might be linked to your <ActivityItem>Secret Journal</ActivityItem>. I'll need your help to figure it out.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, we have a problem, and I think it might be linked to your <ActivityItem>Secret Journal</ActivityItem>. I'll need your help to figure it out.

loc.en: I'm so glad because this is very strange.
loc.ru: I'm so glad because this is very strange.

loc.en: All right. But it is rather urgent.
loc.ru: All right. But it is rather urgent.

loc.en: I was taking a walk this morning and saw Donald Duck. He seemed upset about something.
loc.ru: I was taking a walk this morning and saw Donald Duck. He seemed upset about something.

loc.en: I suppose that's true.
loc.ru: I suppose that's true.

loc.en: Well, it's very odd...
loc.ru: Well, it's very odd...

loc.en: I'll explain.
loc.ru: I'll explain.

loc.en: But I wanted to help, so I asked him what was wrong.
loc.ru: But I wanted to help, so I asked him what was wrong.

loc.en: Apparently, his House is completely covered in old fish!
loc.ru: Apparently, his House is completely covered in old fish!

loc.en: I asked Donald what was wrong, in case I could help.
loc.ru: I asked Donald what was wrong, in case I could help.

loc.en: Old fish? Where did they come from?
loc.ru: Old fish? Where did they come from?

loc.en: That's the thing... Donald had no idea. But he did tell me when they started to appear, and it's right <Lore>when we opened your Secret Journal</Lore>.
loc.ru: That's the thing... Donald had no idea. But he did tell me when they started to appear, and it's right <Lore>when we opened your Secret Journal</Lore>.

loc.en: That can't be a coincidence! I'll <Lore>talk to Donald and try to get to the bottom of this</Lore>! Can you ask around and see if anyone else has noticed anything odd?
loc.ru: That can't be a coincidence! I'll <Lore>talk to Donald and try to get to the bottom of this</Lore>! Can you ask around and see if anyone else has noticed anything odd?

loc.en: Of course. Good luck with Donald!
loc.ru: Of course. Good luck with Donald!

loc.en: I'd be happy to help!
loc.ru: I'd be happy to help!

loc.en: I don't have time right now.
loc.ru: I don't have time right now.

loc.en: Very typical of Donald.
loc.ru: Very typical of Donald.

loc.en: Oh no! What about?
loc.ru: Oh no! What about?

loc.en: I don't see how Donald is linked to the journal...
loc.ru: I don't see how Donald is linked to the journal...

loc.en: Please <Lore>talk to Donald</Lore> so we can figure out why those fish suddenly appeared in his House!
loc.ru: Please <Lore>talk to Donald</Lore> so we can figure out why those fish suddenly appeared in his House!

loc.en: Please <Lore>talk to Donald in his House</Lore> so we can figure out why those fish suddenly appeared there!
loc.ru: Please <Lore>talk to Donald in his House</Lore> so we can figure out why those fish suddenly appeared there!

loc.en: Weren't you helping <Lore>clean up the stinky fish</Lore> in Donald's House? I can't imagine how bad the smell must be.
loc.ru: Weren't you helping <Lore>clean up the stinky fish</Lore> in Donald's House? I can't imagine how bad the smell must be.

loc.en: We should <Lore>talk to Anna</Lore> and find out what's going on at her House.
loc.ru: We should <Lore>talk to Anna</Lore> and find out what's going on at her House.

loc.en: Let's go <Lore>talk to Anna</Lore> and find out if she's made any odd wishes lately.
loc.ru: Let's go <Lore>talk to Anna</Lore> and find out if she's made any odd wishes lately.

loc.en: Are you really going to <Lore>eat all the chocolate in Anna's House</Lore> to help her get rid of it?
loc.ru: Are you really going to <Lore>eat all the chocolate in Anna's House</Lore> to help her get rid of it?

loc.en: It's a big sacrifice, but I'll do what I have to do.
loc.ru: It's a big sacrifice, but I'll do what I have to do.

loc.en: It sounds like Mike has made some wishes of his own. We should <Lore>go talk to him</Lore> and see how we can help.
loc.ru: It sounds like Mike has made some wishes of his own. We should <Lore>go talk to him</Lore> and see how we can help.

loc.en: We have to <Lore>follow Mike to Mr. McDuck's store</Lore> so he can show us what the wish magic has done.
loc.ru: We have to <Lore>follow Mike to Mr. McDuck's store</Lore> so he can show us what the wish magic has done.

loc.en: Let's <Lore>listen to Mike</Lore> talk to some of the Villagers in Mr. McDuck's store and see what happens.
loc.ru: Let's <Lore>listen to Mike</Lore> talk to some of the Villagers in Mr. McDuck's store and see what happens.

loc.en: Oh dear, it seems like Mike is having a hard time. We should <Lore>check in on him</Lore>.
loc.ru: Oh dear, it seems like Mike is having a hard time. We should <Lore>check in on him</Lore>.

loc.en: I think you're right. Opening the Secret Journal has released some kind of wish magic in the Valley.
loc.ru: I think you're right. Opening the Secret Journal has released some kind of wish magic in the Valley.

loc.en: Weren't you going to <Lore>decorate a room in your House</Lore> to embrace your freedom?
loc.ru: Weren't you going to <Lore>decorate a room in your House</Lore> to embrace your freedom?

loc.en: Weren't you going to <Lore>dress up in something you want</Lore> to embrace your style?
loc.ru: Weren't you going to <Lore>dress up in something you want</Lore> to embrace your style?

loc.en: Weren't you going to <Lore>cook two of your favorite meals</Lore> to embrace your freedom?
loc.ru: Weren't you going to <Lore>cook two of your favorite meals</Lore> to embrace your freedom?

loc.en: Weren't you going to <Lore>craft something you want</Lore> to embrace your style?
loc.ru: Weren't you going to <Lore>craft something you want</Lore> to embrace your style?

loc.en: We should <Lore>visit Mike to test the wish magic</Lore>.
loc.ru: We should <Lore>visit Mike to test the wish magic</Lore>.

loc.en: I'm working on it...
loc.ru: I'm working on it...

loc.en: Have you <Lore>eaten all the chocolate in Anna's House</Lore> yet?
loc.ru: Have you <Lore>eaten all the chocolate in Anna's House</Lore> yet?

loc.en: You should <Lore>collect all of the chocolate around Anna's house</Lore> for her.
loc.ru: You should <Lore>collect all of the chocolate around Anna's house</Lore> for her.

loc.en: Well, we did it, {PlayerName}. We opened up the Secret Journal and contained the wish magic.
loc.ru: Well, we did it, {PlayerName}. We opened up the Secret Journal and contained the wish magic.

loc.en: The journal... Wow, looking at it makes me feel... a lot of things.
loc.ru: The journal... Wow, looking at it makes me feel... a lot of things.

loc.en: Not only that, I also learned...
loc.ru: Not only that, I also learned...

loc.en: Yes, that is SO important! You deserve care, {PlayerName}. Please don't ever forget that. You know, I think I understand now why you gave the journal to ME to protect.
loc.ru: Yes, that is SO important! You deserve care, {PlayerName}. Please don't ever forget that. You know, I think I understand now why you gave the journal to ME to protect.

loc.en: That's true! We can learn a lot from our past struggles.
loc.ru: That's true! We can learn a lot from our past struggles.

loc.en: Absolutely! As a matter of fact, I think it's important that you do just that.
loc.ru: Absolutely! As a matter of fact, I think it's important that you do just that.

loc.en: You should hold on to the journal.
loc.ru: You should hold on to the journal.

loc.en: Thank you, Jasmine. This journal is a part of me, a part of my history... It means a lot to have it.
loc.ru: Thank you, Jasmine. This journal is a part of me, a part of my history... It means a lot to have it.

loc.en: Oh! I have one last thing to give you. I've so loved spending this time with you, I wanted to give you something as a token of our friendship.
loc.ru: Oh! I have one last thing to give you. I've so loved spending this time with you, I wanted to give you something as a token of our friendship.

loc.en: I'm certain it's one of the Mementos you've been searching for.
loc.ru: I'm certain it's one of the Mementos you've been searching for.

loc.en: My youthful angst and wishful thinking trapped in a book. No wonder I had TWO locks on there.
loc.ru: My youthful angst and wishful thinking trapped in a book. No wonder I had TWO locks on there.

loc.en: ...it's important to take care of my own needs.
loc.ru: ...it's important to take care of my own needs.

loc.en: ...I shouldn't lock away my past pain.
loc.ru: ...I shouldn't lock away my past pain.

loc.en: ...it's okay to do what I want sometimes.
loc.ru: ...it's okay to do what I want sometimes.

loc.en: That lines up with a theory I have... In your journal, you wrote, "If only wishes really did come true"?
loc.ru: That lines up with a theory I have... In your journal, you wrote, "If only wishes really did come true"?

loc.en: I'm not sure. Do you remember the wish you wrote about in your journal?
loc.ru: I'm not sure. Do you remember the wish you wrote about in your journal?

loc.en: Perfect! Decorating's a wonderful way to embrace your personal taste.
loc.ru: Perfect! Decorating's a wonderful way to embrace your personal taste.

loc.en: Okay, I'll go <Lore>cook two of my favorite meals</Lore>, and I'll make sure they really reflect me!
loc.ru: Okay, I'll go <Lore>cook two of my favorite meals</Lore>, and I'll make sure they really reflect me!

loc.en: Okay, I'll go <Lore>decorate a room in my House</Lore>, and I'll make sure it really reflects me!
loc.ru: Okay, I'll go <Lore>decorate a room in my House</Lore>, and I'll make sure it really reflects me!

loc.en: I've spoken to Donald, Anna, and Mike. All of them made a wish that's gone a little haywire.
loc.ru: I've spoken to Donald, Anna, and Mike. All of them made a wish that's gone a little haywire.

loc.en: It's no one's fault, {PlayerName}. Opening the journal was important.
loc.ru: It's no one's fault, {PlayerName}. Opening the journal was important.

loc.en: I highly doubt it. Only fairly benign wishes are coming true.
loc.ru: I highly doubt it. Only fairly benign wishes are coming true.

loc.en: I thought you might have worked it out already.
loc.ru: I thought you might have worked it out already.

loc.en: But now we need to rein in the magic so it stops creating such chaos.
loc.ru: But now we need to rein in the magic so it stops creating such chaos.

loc.en: How do we do that?
loc.ru: How do we do that?

loc.en: Fabulous! A meal cooked just to your taste is a wonderful way to do what YOU want to do.
loc.ru: Fabulous! A meal cooked just to your taste is a wonderful way to do what YOU want to do.

loc.en: What if opening the journal caused this strange wish magic to escape?
loc.ru: What if opening the journal caused this strange wish magic to escape?

loc.en: That's right. So maybe if you do something to embrace your freedom, the wish magic can be contained again.
loc.ru: That's right. So maybe if you do something to embrace your freedom, the wish magic can be contained again.

loc.en: That's right. So maybe if you do something to showcase the real you, the wish magic can be contained again.
loc.ru: That's right. So maybe if you do something to showcase the real you, the wish magic can be contained again.

loc.en: That's right. So maybe if you do something to take care of yourself, the wish magic can be contained again.
loc.ru: That's right. So maybe if you do something to take care of yourself, the wish magic can be contained again.

loc.en: That's a good idea!
loc.ru: That's a good idea!

loc.en: I'd like to decorate a room in my House.
loc.ru: I'd like to decorate a room in my House.

loc.en: I'd like to cook my favorite meals.
loc.ru: I'd like to cook my favorite meals.

loc.en: So this is my fault?
loc.ru: So this is my fault?

loc.en: Do you think the wish magic can be dangerous?
loc.ru: Do you think the wish magic can be dangerous?

loc.en: I was thinking something similar.
loc.ru: I was thinking something similar.

loc.en: I wanted more freedom.
loc.ru: I wanted more freedom.

loc.en: I wanted to be understood for who I am.
loc.ru: I wanted to be understood for who I am.

loc.en: I wanted to take care of myself for once.
loc.ru: I wanted to take care of myself for once.

loc.en: {PlayerName}, I've been monitoring the Secret Journal very carefully. Whatever you're doing is working. But it looks like you'll have to do just a bit more.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, I've been monitoring the Secret Journal very carefully. Whatever you're doing is working. But it looks like you'll have to do just a bit more.

loc.en: That's a marvelous idea! <Lore>Get dressed up</Lore>, and make sure it embraces your personal style.
loc.ru: That's a marvelous idea! <Lore>Get dressed up</Lore>, and make sure it embraces your personal style.

loc.en: Wonderful! <Lore>Craft any item</Lore> you want; just make sure it's something you love.
loc.ru: Wonderful! <Lore>Craft any item</Lore> you want; just make sure it's something you love.

loc.en: Okay, I'll dress up however I want!
loc.ru: Okay, I'll dress up however I want!

loc.en: I can craft an item that's special to me!
loc.ru: I can craft an item that's special to me!

loc.en: You did it, {PlayerName}! The wish magic is completely contained in your journal. I can tell because it feels... calmer now. I don't know how to explain it.
loc.ru: You did it, {PlayerName}! The wish magic is completely contained in your journal. I can tell because it feels... calmer now. I don't know how to explain it.

loc.en: Doing the things that I wanted to do, just for ME, felt really good.
loc.ru: Doing the things that I wanted to do, just for ME, felt really good.

loc.en: It seems so. I suppose the journal needed to know you've made your own wish come true. You embraced your freedom and made YOURSELF happy.
loc.ru: It seems so. I suppose the journal needed to know you've made your own wish come true. You embraced your freedom and made YOURSELF happy.

loc.en: I am. I suppose the journal needed to know you've made your own wish come true. You embraced your freedom and made YOURSELF happy.
loc.ru: I am. I suppose the journal needed to know you've made your own wish come true. You embraced your freedom and made YOURSELF happy.

loc.en: I have to admit, doing the things that I wanted to do, just for ME, felt really good.
loc.ru: I have to admit, doing the things that I wanted to do, just for ME, felt really good.

loc.en: I'm so glad to hear it.
loc.ru: I'm so glad to hear it.

loc.en: Though I'd still like to make sure that the wish magic is gone for good.
loc.ru: Though I'd still like to make sure that the wish magic is gone for good.

loc.en: Maybe we should check on Mike. His wish magic didn't work on you because you're the owner of the journal, but if I go near him and can control my laughter, we'll know everything's back to normal.
loc.ru: Maybe we should check on Mike. His wish magic didn't work on you because you're the owner of the journal, but if I go near him and can control my laughter, we'll know everything's back to normal.

loc.en: Great idea! Let's <Lore>test the wish magic by talking to Mike</Lore>. He could probably use a visit anyway. He was feeling down since everyone was laughing at him.
loc.ru: Great idea! Let's <Lore>test the wish magic by talking to Mike</Lore>. He could probably use a visit anyway. He was feeling down since everyone was laughing at him.

loc.en: Hey, {PlayerName}. Aladdin told me you're putting together a marketplace. That's a pretty great idea.
loc.ru: Hey, {PlayerName}. Aladdin told me you're putting together a marketplace. That's a pretty great idea.

loc.en: I used to sell a LOT of ice at the market in Arendelle.
loc.ru: I used to sell a LOT of ice at the market in Arendelle.

loc.en: Well, when I first met Anna, Elsa had accidentally made a permanent winter in Arendelle.
loc.ru: Well, when I first met Anna, Elsa had accidentally made a permanent winter in Arendelle.

loc.en: Yeah, I'd love to have a place in your market... As long as there's room.
loc.ru: Yeah, I'd love to have a place in your market... As long as there's room.

loc.en: With snow and ice everywhere, that would pretty severely cut into my ice business.
loc.ru: With snow and ice everywhere, that would pretty severely cut into my ice business.

loc.en: People wouldn't NEED what I was selling. So, that's my advice: Sell something people really want, or need!
loc.ru: People wouldn't NEED what I was selling. So, that's my advice: Sell something people really want, or need!

loc.en: Hey, anytime!
loc.ru: Hey, anytime!

loc.en: A gem stall? That will definitely do well.
loc.ru: A gem stall? That will definitely do well.

loc.en: But hey, this is your Valley. I'll be happy with whatever you decide.
loc.ru: But hey, this is your Valley. I'll be happy with whatever you decide.

loc.en: Any advice about running a stall?
loc.ru: Any advice about running a stall?

loc.en: Can we add your stall to the marketplace?
loc.ru: Can we add your stall to the marketplace?

loc.en: Solid advice!
loc.ru: Solid advice!

loc.en: We're opening a gem stall; we'll be good.
loc.ru: We're opening a gem stall; we'll be good.

loc.en: Hey, Maui! You're good with symbols.
loc.ru: Hey, Maui! You're good with symbols.

loc.en: Well, I'm certainly COVERED in them. What's up, {PlayerName}?
loc.ru: Well, I'm certainly COVERED in them. What's up, {PlayerName}?

loc.en: Aladdin and I found a pillar covered in symbols out on Ariel's island. Do the ones in this picture mean anything to you?
loc.ru: Aladdin and I found a pillar covered in symbols out on Ariel's island. Do the ones in this picture mean anything to you?

loc.en: Hmm... Nope. I can definitely say I've never seen those exact symbols. Sorry, kid.
loc.ru: Hmm... Nope. I can definitely say I've never seen those exact symbols. Sorry, kid.

loc.en: Hey, {PlayerName}! What's going on?
loc.ru: Hey, {PlayerName}! What's going on?

loc.en: Well, Jasmine and I are looking for something that you might have some insight into...
loc.ru: Well, Jasmine and I are looking for something that you might have some insight into...

loc.en: We're looking for a <ActivityItem>Special Starfish</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: We're looking for a <ActivityItem>Special Starfish</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: Wait, not THE <ActivityItem>Special Starfish</ActivityItem>?!
loc.ru: Wait, not THE <ActivityItem>Special Starfish</ActivityItem>?!

loc.en: Only the rarest starfish from the deepest part of the ocean!
loc.ru: Only the rarest starfish from the deepest part of the ocean!

loc.en: You THINK so? {PlayerName}, the Special Starfish is â wait for it â SPECIAL!
loc.ru: You THINK so? {PlayerName}, the Special Starfish is â wait for it â SPECIAL!

loc.en: You got that right!
loc.ru: You got that right!

loc.en: Trust me; the Special Starfish is one of a kind. A unique masterpiece of a starfish!
loc.ru: Trust me; the Special Starfish is one of a kind. A unique masterpiece of a starfish!

loc.en: Kind of sounds like the Maui of starfish.
loc.ru: Kind of sounds like the Maui of starfish.

loc.en: Oh-ho-ho, you flatter me! But yes, you are correct.
loc.ru: Oh-ho-ho, you flatter me! But yes, you are correct.

loc.en: It's one of a kind. A rare masterpiece of a starfish!
loc.ru: It's one of a kind. A rare masterpiece of a starfish!

loc.en: The Special Starfish is one of a kind. A rare masterpiece of a starfish!
loc.ru: The Special Starfish is one of a kind. A rare masterpiece of a starfish!

loc.en: And I happen to be the only one who's ever caught it.
loc.ru: And I happen to be the only one who's ever caught it.

loc.en: So you have it? That's great! It's exactly what I need!
loc.ru: So you have it? That's great! It's exactly what I need!

loc.en: Not so fast! I'm happy to give you the starfish as a gift, but I say we have a little fun first.
loc.ru: Not so fast! I'm happy to give you the starfish as a gift, but I say we have a little fun first.

loc.en: Don't worry, {PlayerName}. It'll be great!
loc.ru: Don't worry, {PlayerName}. It'll be great!

loc.en: Whatever you want. I'm pretty confident I can beat you at anything!
loc.ru: Whatever you want. I'm pretty confident I can beat you at anything!

loc.en: Of course it is!
loc.ru: Of course it is!

loc.en: If you can <Lore>best me in a competition of your choosing</Lore>, I'll give it to you. What do you say?
loc.ru: If you can <Lore>best me in a competition of your choosing</Lore>, I'll give it to you. What do you say?

loc.en: All right, but I want to talk to Jasmine about this first.
loc.ru: All right, but I want to talk to Jasmine about this first.

loc.en: Fine by me. <Lore>Talk to Jasmine and decide on a competition</Lore>. I'll be waiting to hear your idea!
loc.ru: Fine by me. <Lore>Talk to Jasmine and decide on a competition</Lore>. I'll be waiting to hear your idea!

loc.en: What is THE Special Starfish?
loc.ru: What is THE Special Starfish?

loc.en: I think so...?
loc.ru: I think so...?

loc.en: There can't be more than one, can there?
loc.ru: There can't be more than one, can there?

loc.en: Oh no...
loc.ru: Oh no...

loc.en: What kind of competition?
loc.ru: What kind of competition?

loc.en: This sounds like it's going to be fun!
loc.ru: This sounds like it's going to be fun!

loc.en: Hey there, {PlayerName}! Ready to show off your sandcastle?
loc.ru: Hey there, {PlayerName}! Ready to show off your sandcastle?

loc.en: I like your confidence, kid.
loc.ru: I like your confidence, kid.

loc.en: Don't worry. I'm sure it's great.
loc.ru: Don't worry. I'm sure it's great.

loc.en: That's the spirit!
loc.ru: That's the spirit!

loc.en: I can't wait to see it.
loc.ru: I can't wait to see it.

loc.en: Absolutely!
loc.ru: Absolutely!

loc.en: Ready as I'll ever be.
loc.ru: Ready as I'll ever be.

loc.en: No time like the present, I guess.
loc.ru: No time like the present, I guess.

loc.en: Ah, {PlayerName}. Did you wish to speak with me about something?
loc.ru: Ah, {PlayerName}. Did you wish to speak with me about something?

loc.en: Hey Merlin? I found a strange object in the Valley and it made things go... wrong.
loc.ru: Hey Merlin? I found a strange object in the Valley and it made things go... wrong.

loc.en: It's a diary Jasmine and I found. I wrote it when I was younger but... I don't remember doing that at all.
loc.ru: It's a diary Jasmine and I found. I wrote it when I was younger but... I don't remember doing that at all.

loc.en: It's some sort of magical kaleidoscope... And it's started to warp everything in the Valley.
loc.ru: It's some sort of magical kaleidoscope... And it's started to warp everything in the Valley.

loc.en: It's something that was important to me when I was really young.
loc.ru: It's something that was important to me when I was really young.

loc.en: <Lore>Only you can face the feeling stored inside</Lore> and set things right again.
loc.ru: <Lore>Only you can face the feeling stored inside</Lore> and set things right again.

loc.en: I used to play with it outside with my friends.
loc.ru: I used to play with it outside with my friends.

loc.en: Ah...
loc.ru: Ah...

loc.en: Yes, I suppose you're right. But don't forget: You've become quite capable of pushing back mayhem with your Dreamlight Magic. And, well...
loc.ru: Yes, I suppose you're right. But don't forget: You've become quite capable of pushing back mayhem with your Dreamlight Magic. And, well...

loc.en: I see... What a peculiar response... And you have NO memory of this object?
loc.ru: I see... What a peculiar response... And you have NO memory of this object?

loc.en: Hmm... How curious.
loc.ru: Hmm... How curious.

loc.en: Strong and perhaps a little turbulent by the sounds of it...
loc.ru: Strong and perhaps a little turbulent by the sounds of it...

loc.en: I'm afraid not, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: I'm afraid not, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: I believe what you've found is a magical <Lore>Memento</Lore>.
loc.ru: I believe what you've found is a magical <Lore>Memento</Lore>.

loc.en: They're created when someone takes an experience â perhaps a complicated or even unpleasant one â and seals it away, where it can no longer reach them.
loc.ru: They're created when someone takes an experience â perhaps a complicated or even unpleasant one â and seals it away, where it can no longer reach them.

loc.en: And I believe, in this instance, that someone was YOU.
loc.ru: And I believe, in this instance, that someone was YOU.

loc.en: It means that before the Forgetting, you used your magic to get rid of an emotional memory.
loc.ru: It means that before the Forgetting, you used your magic to get rid of an emotional memory.

loc.en: We can assume that you did it before the Forgetting, and thus, long ago.
loc.ru: We can assume that you did it before the Forgetting, and thus, long ago.

loc.en: A beautiful, though occasionally challenging, necessity of the human condition, I'm afraid.
loc.ru: A beautiful, though occasionally challenging, necessity of the human condition, I'm afraid.

loc.en: The experience contained within the Memento is starting to push back and escape the object. Hence the, uh... odd magical chaos.
loc.ru: The experience contained within the Memento is starting to push back and escape the object. Hence the, uh... odd magical chaos.

loc.en: You used your magic to rid yourself of something difficult. Something you wanted to push away.
loc.ru: You used your magic to rid yourself of something difficult. Something you wanted to push away.

loc.en: Take heart, {PlayerName}. Whatever is ahead, know that you are dearly loved.
loc.ru: Take heart, {PlayerName}. Whatever is ahead, know that you are dearly loved.

loc.en: Well, I would imagine the object you mentioned is <Lore>not the only one of its kind hidden in the Valley</Lore>.
loc.ru: Well, I would imagine the object you mentioned is <Lore>not the only one of its kind hidden in the Valley</Lore>.

loc.en: Ah...
loc.ru: Ah...

loc.en: Feelings, after all, do not like to be denied or pushed away. They always return, often stronger, until they are dealt with. These feelings must be embraced and understood.
loc.ru: Feelings, after all, do not like to be denied or pushed away. They always return, often stronger, until they are dealt with. These feelings must be embraced and understood.

loc.en: I believe I can speak for the entire Village when I say we are here to help you weather these storms... whatever form they may take.
loc.ru: I believe I can speak for the entire Village when I say we are here to help you weather these storms... whatever form they may take.

loc.en: I handled the problem... so we're good?
loc.ru: I handled the problem... so we're good?

loc.en: We should keep our eyes and ears open for <Lore>more Mementos</Lore> and for the problems they will most certainly cause.
loc.ru: We should keep our eyes and ears open for <Lore>more Mementos</Lore> and for the problems they will most certainly cause.

loc.en: Now then, be sure to <Lore>store the Mementos you find somewhere safe</Lore>. I'm certain they will lead back to something... or someone... who was quite important to you at the time you created them.
loc.ru: Now then, be sure to <Lore>store the Mementos you find somewhere safe</Lore>. I'm certain they will lead back to something... or someone... who was quite important to you at the time you created them.

loc.en: ...I just wanted to be FREE to live my life!
loc.ru: ...I just wanted to be FREE to live my life!

loc.en: ...I remembered feeling like no one understood me.
loc.ru: ...I remembered feeling like no one understood me.

loc.en: ...I felt like a lonely teenager.
loc.ru: ...I felt like a lonely teenager.

loc.en: When I held it in my hands...
loc.ru: When I held it in my hands...

loc.en: ...I was being told I was weird.
loc.ru: ...I was being told I was weird.

loc.en: ...I'd never find a place to fit in.
loc.ru: ...I'd never find a place to fit in.

loc.en: ...Someone was laughing at my ideas.
loc.ru: ...Someone was laughing at my ideas.

loc.en: When I picked it up it felt like...
loc.ru: When I picked it up it felt like...

loc.en: ...I was embarrassed that no one else needed comfort.
loc.ru: ...I was embarrassed that no one else needed comfort.

loc.en: ...I wanted to prove how grown-up I was.
loc.ru: ...I wanted to prove how grown-up I was.

loc.en: ...Someone made fun of me for liking it.
loc.ru: ...Someone made fun of me for liking it.

loc.en: When I picked it up, I remembered I gave it up too soon because...
loc.ru: When I picked it up, I remembered I gave it up too soon because...

loc.en: Just another day in the Valley, huh?
loc.ru: Just another day in the Valley, huh?

loc.en: This sounds pretty daunting.
loc.ru: This sounds pretty daunting.

loc.en: I'm going to craft a box of tissues, ASAP.
loc.ru: I'm going to craft a box of tissues, ASAP.

loc.en: Face emotions that pre-Forgetting me magically sealed away...
loc.ru: Face emotions that pre-Forgetting me magically sealed away...

loc.en: ...the last time I ever played outside.
loc.ru: ...the last time I ever played outside.

loc.en: ...playing the make-believe games I never wanted to end.
loc.ru: ...playing the make-believe games I never wanted to end.

loc.en: ...drifting apart from childhood best friends.
loc.ru: ...drifting apart from childhood best friends.

loc.en: When I picked it up, it felt exactly like...
loc.ru: When I picked it up, it felt exactly like...

loc.en: No, but the feelings it brought up were STRONG.
loc.ru: No, but the feelings it brought up were STRONG.

loc.en: I don't think so...
loc.ru: I don't think so...

loc.en: Is this a bad practical joke?
loc.ru: Is this a bad practical joke?

loc.en: What does that mean?
loc.ru: What does that mean?

loc.en: Why don't I remember doing this?
loc.ru: Why don't I remember doing this?

loc.en: How dare it make me feel my FEELINGS!
loc.ru: How dare it make me feel my FEELINGS!

loc.en: I made this "Memento" thing?
loc.ru: I made this "Memento" thing?

loc.en: OK... What's next?
loc.ru: OK... What's next?

loc.en: I don't like the sound of this...
loc.ru: I don't like the sound of this...

loc.en: But it's over now, right?
loc.ru: But it's over now, right?

loc.en: Merlin!
loc.ru: Merlin!

loc.en: As always, my friend, I am here to guide you to the best of my ability. What can I assist you with?
loc.ru: As always, my friend, I am here to guide you to the best of my ability. What can I assist you with?

loc.en: Have I? No, now that you mention it, I haven't. Though I have enchanted the odd broomstick. However, I tend not to use such things when I travel. Why do you ask?
loc.ru: Have I? No, now that you mention it, I haven't. Though I have enchanted the odd broomstick. However, I tend not to use such things when I travel. Why do you ask?

loc.en: Am Iâ
loc.ru: Am Iâ

loc.en: Am I busy?!
loc.ru: Am I busy?!

loc.en: My friend, I am busy researching multiple subjects of the past, present, and the future at all times!
loc.ru: My friend, I am busy researching multiple subjects of the past, present, and the future at all times!

loc.en: However... I am NEVER too busy for you. What can I assist you with?
loc.ru: However... I am NEVER too busy for you. What can I assist you with?

loc.en: Aladdin and I want to make a <ActivityItem>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</ActivityItem> for me to glide around the Valley on.
loc.ru: Aladdin and I want to make a <ActivityItem>Dreamlight Magic Carpet</ActivityItem> for me to glide around the Valley on.

loc.en: What a delightful prospect, albeit one I know very little about.
loc.ru: What a delightful prospect, albeit one I know very little about.

loc.en: Though I daresay the wizards of Agrabah have it all figured out; racing over dunes and through oases must be very comfortable on a carpet.
loc.ru: Though I daresay the wizards of Agrabah have it all figured out; racing over dunes and through oases must be very comfortable on a carpet.

loc.en: Oh, I have 28 and a half ideas, but we can start with my favorite one: books.
loc.ru: Oh, I have 28 and a half ideas, but we can start with my favorite one: books.

loc.en: Stumped! Ha-ha-ha, we are not stumped yet, {PlayerName}! We've only just begun!
loc.ru: Stumped! Ha-ha-ha, we are not stumped yet, {PlayerName}! We've only just begun!

loc.en: I believe there are several books in the <Lore>Dreamlight Library</Lore> that you will find useful in this endeavor.
loc.ru: I believe there are several books in the <Lore>Dreamlight Library</Lore> that you will find useful in this endeavor.

loc.en: Specifically, I would search for books on <Lore>Fabric Enchantment, Carpet Weaving,</Lore> and <Lore>Flying Technique</Lore>.
loc.ru: Specifically, I would search for books on <Lore>Fabric Enchantment, Carpet Weaving,</Lore> and <Lore>Flying Technique</Lore>.

loc.en: Have you ever enchanted a carpet to fly?
loc.ru: Have you ever enchanted a carpet to fly?

loc.en: I need some magic help!
loc.ru: I need some magic help!

loc.en: Are you busy?
loc.ru: Are you busy?

loc.en: So you don't have any ideas?
loc.ru: So you don't have any ideas?

loc.en: I can't believe I finally stumped you.
loc.ru: I can't believe I finally stumped you.

loc.en: You put seeds in one pot, plant flowers in the other pots and <Lore>carefully tend to them so they flourish</Lore>. That will inspire the <ActivityItem>Enchanted Flower</ActivityItem> to grow. Plants do like to work together, after all.
loc.ru: You put seeds in one pot, plant flowers in the other pots and <Lore>carefully tend to them so they flourish</Lore>. That will inspire the <ActivityItem>Enchanted Flower</ActivityItem> to grow. Plants do like to work together, after all.

loc.en: We were using <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem> in our work. She's a most excellent researcher, you know.
loc.ru: We were using <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem> in our work. She's a most excellent researcher, you know.

loc.en: Hello, Merlin! Jasmine and I need some help. She found a note about how to make <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem>, but we're not sure what they're for or what that means.
loc.ru: Hello, Merlin! Jasmine and I need some help. She found a note about how to make <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem>, but we're not sure what they're for or what that means.

loc.en: Well, yes. "Enchanted" in the name rather says it all, doesn't it? And as with many things in Dreamlight Valley, they're sprinkled with very special magic.
loc.ru: Well, yes. "Enchanted" in the name rather says it all, doesn't it? And as with many things in Dreamlight Valley, they're sprinkled with very special magic.

loc.en: Perhaps. But then, you've never shied away from danger, have you?
loc.ru: Perhaps. But then, you've never shied away from danger, have you?

loc.en: Besides grow flowers, anyway.
loc.ru: Besides grow flowers, anyway.

loc.en: It is! Heh-heh. Now, let's see... I was instructing Jasmine on arcane flower magic before the Forgetting.
loc.ru: It is! Heh-heh. Now, let's see... I was instructing Jasmine on arcane flower magic before the Forgetting.

loc.en: I do know Jasmine and I were working together to keep this secret safe, andâ Oh! Yes! <Lore>There were seeds</Lore>!
loc.ru: I do know Jasmine and I were working together to keep this secret safe, andâ Oh! Yes! <Lore>There were seeds</Lore>!

loc.en: Hmm... <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem>...? Ah, yes! I remember the very things!
loc.ru: Hmm... <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem>...? Ah, yes! I remember the very things!

loc.en: You may <Lore>search the Library to find the Envelope of Seeds</Lore> if you like. The seeds are sure to help you uncover the Enchanted Flower's secret.
loc.ru: You may <Lore>search the Library to find the Envelope of Seeds</Lore> if you like. The seeds are sure to help you uncover the Enchanted Flower's secret.

loc.en: I put them in an envelope for safekeeping and hid it inside the Dreamlight Library for Jasmine's return.
loc.ru: I put them in an envelope for safekeeping and hid it inside the Dreamlight Library for Jasmine's return.

loc.en: Of course. The <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem> can be used to grow an <ActivityItem>Enchanted Flower</ActivityItem> that contains a secret.
loc.ru: Of course. The <ActivityItem>Enchanted Pots of Blooming</ActivityItem> can be used to grow an <ActivityItem>Enchanted Flower</ActivityItem> that contains a secret.

loc.en: I suppose not... but I need to know more about this before I go on.
loc.ru: I suppose not... but I need to know more about this before I go on.

loc.en: Can you tell me anything else?
loc.ru: Can you tell me anything else?

loc.en: Unfortunately, I... I can't remember anything else at the moment.
loc.ru: Unfortunately, I... I can't remember anything else at the moment.

loc.en: You do? That's great!
loc.ru: You do? That's great!

loc.en: An Enchanted Flower that contains a secret...
loc.ru: An Enchanted Flower that contains a secret...

loc.en: How can a flower contain a secret?
loc.ru: How can a flower contain a secret?

loc.en: I wonder what this secret could possibly be?
loc.ru: I wonder what this secret could possibly be?

loc.en: Who is keeping such a well-hidden secret?
loc.ru: Who is keeping such a well-hidden secret?

loc.en: Oh, I find secrets have a way of hiding in all sorts of interesting places.
loc.ru: Oh, I find secrets have a way of hiding in all sorts of interesting places.

loc.en: If you and Princess Jasmine are on the case, I suspect we'll find out soon enough!
loc.ru: If you and Princess Jasmine are on the case, I suspect we'll find out soon enough!

loc.en: Now, now, not everyone who has secrets is hiding them with ill intent.
loc.ru: Now, now, not everyone who has secrets is hiding them with ill intent.

loc.en: Do you remember ANYTHING else?
loc.ru: Do you remember ANYTHING else?

loc.en: That's mysterious.
loc.ru: That's mysterious.

loc.en: How exciting!
loc.ru: How exciting!

loc.en: Sounds suspicious...
loc.ru: Sounds suspicious...

loc.en: So they're magical?
loc.ru: So they're magical?

loc.en: Could they be dangerous?
loc.ru: Could they be dangerous?

loc.en: What do they DO?
loc.ru: What do they DO?

loc.en: Hey, Mulan. I've been feelin' really down lately. Can I talk to you about it?
loc.ru: Hey, Mulan. I've been feelin' really down lately. Can I talk to you about it?

loc.en: Oh! Ha! Ha-ha-ha...
loc.ru: Oh! Ha! Ha-ha-ha...

loc.en: I mean, if you're just gonna laugh at me, then what's the point?
loc.ru: I mean, if you're just gonna laugh at me, then what's the point?

loc.en: HA-HA-HA!!! Oh no, Mike! Stop it; I can't help it! I'm sorry! Really sorry! HA-HA-HA!
loc.ru: HA-HA-HA!!! Oh no, Mike! Stop it; I can't help it! I'm sorry! Really sorry! HA-HA-HA!

loc.en: Ahhh! This is such an isolating experience!
loc.ru: Ahhh! This is such an isolating experience!

loc.en: Hiya, Belle! Ya know, you're such a good listener. I was wonderin' if we could talk about somethin' serious?
loc.ru: Hiya, Belle! Ya know, you're such a good listener. I was wonderin' if we could talk about somethin' serious?

loc.en: Ha... Ha-ha...
loc.ru: Ha... Ha-ha...

loc.en: Belle, this is for real. I've been feelin' kind of lonely, andâ
loc.ru: Belle, this is for real. I've been feelin' kind of lonely, andâ

loc.en: HA-HA-HA! Mike, please! Stop! I'm laughing so hard it hurts! HA-HA!!!
loc.ru: HA-HA-HA! Mike, please! Stop! I'm laughing so hard it hurts! HA-HA!!!

loc.en: Ha-ha-ha! Oh dear, I can't stop laughing! I'm truly sorry. Ha-ha!!!
loc.ru: Ha-ha-ha! Oh dear, I can't stop laughing! I'm truly sorry. Ha-ha!!!

loc.en: Belle, please! I'm bein' serious!
loc.ru: Belle, please! I'm bein' serious!

loc.en: Hello, Mike! I've heard some things are going a little funny over here.
loc.ru: Hello, Mike! I've heard some things are going a little funny over here.

loc.en: {PlayerName}! Am I glad to see you!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}! Am I glad to see you!

loc.en: It's the craziest thing. I was minding my own business, thinking about being the funniest guy in the Valley, and BAM! Wherever I go, EVERYONE laughs at me!
loc.ru: It's the craziest thing. I was minding my own business, thinking about being the funniest guy in the Valley, and BAM! Wherever I go, EVERYONE laughs at me!

loc.en: Not exactly. Now everyone laughs AT me, even if I'm just standin' there. I may be hilarious, but I'm also sensitive! It's complex.
loc.ru: Not exactly. Now everyone laughs AT me, even if I'm just standin' there. I may be hilarious, but I'm also sensitive! It's complex.

loc.en: I am, aren't I? But that's beside the point! I've got a real problem here!
loc.ru: I am, aren't I? But that's beside the point! I've got a real problem here!

loc.en: It ISN'T right! Something has gone terribly WRONG!
loc.ru: It ISN'T right! Something has gone terribly WRONG!

loc.en: Now, everyone's laughing AT me, even if I'm just standing there. To tell ya the truth, it's startin' to hurt my feelings.
loc.ru: Now, everyone's laughing AT me, even if I'm just standing there. To tell ya the truth, it's startin' to hurt my feelings.

loc.en: I think I need to see this to believe it. Can you demonstrate?
loc.ru: I think I need to see this to believe it. Can you demonstrate?

loc.en: Sure. <Lore>Follow me to Mr. McDuck's store</Lore> and I'll show ya what I mean.
loc.ru: Sure. <Lore>Follow me to Mr. McDuck's store</Lore> and I'll show ya what I mean.

loc.en: So you got what you wanted!
loc.ru: So you got what you wanted!

loc.en: You were already the funniest guy here.
loc.ru: You were already the funniest guy here.

loc.en: That doesn't sound right.
loc.ru: That doesn't sound right.

loc.en: Do ya see what I mean? I can't talk to anyone about anything without 'em laughin' in my face.
loc.ru: Do ya see what I mean? I can't talk to anyone about anything without 'em laughin' in my face.

loc.en: I can see how that would feel hurtful, but I think I have an explanation.
loc.ru: I can see how that would feel hurtful, but I think I have an explanation.

loc.en: First, I need to know: Did you happen to wish out loud to be funnier?
loc.ru: First, I need to know: Did you happen to wish out loud to be funnier?

loc.en: No. I mean, I can't really get funni-ER, now can I? But I mighta wished to crack everybody up. But what's that gotta do with it?
loc.ru: No. I mean, I can't really get funni-ER, now can I? But I mighta wished to crack everybody up. But what's that gotta do with it?

loc.en: Jasmine and I opened an old journal of mine, and it seems to have released some wish magic upon the Village.
loc.ru: Jasmine and I opened an old journal of mine, and it seems to have released some wish magic upon the Village.

loc.en: I'll go <Lore>check in with Jasmine</Lore> to see if she's learned anything that can help us get it under control.
loc.ru: I'll go <Lore>check in with Jasmine</Lore> to see if she's learned anything that can help us get it under control.

loc.en: Hey, Minnie! Aladdin said you're going to help us make our very own magic carpet?
loc.ru: Hey, Minnie! Aladdin said you're going to help us make our very own magic carpet?

loc.en: Well, I can help you make a beautiful carpet, but I'll leave the magic part to you, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: Well, I can help you make a beautiful carpet, but I'll leave the magic part to you, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: I've found a lovely design and made you a list of the supplies you'll need.
loc.ru: I've found a lovely design and made you a list of the supplies you'll need.

loc.en: If you can collect them all, I'll make sure everything's ready. Aladdin told me he wants to do the actual weaving.
loc.ru: If you can collect them all, I'll make sure everything's ready. Aladdin told me he wants to do the actual weaving.

loc.en: Minnie! You're our resident art enthusiast!
loc.ru: Minnie! You're our resident art enthusiast!

loc.en: I took this photo of a pillar Aladdin and I rebuilt out on Ariel's island. Can you tell me anything about it?
loc.ru: I took this photo of a pillar Aladdin and I rebuilt out on Ariel's island. Can you tell me anything about it?

loc.en: Oh, I love a good artistic mystery!
loc.ru: Oh, I love a good artistic mystery!

loc.en: Well... I can tell you that the art on these is old. VERY old!
loc.ru: Well... I can tell you that the art on these is old. VERY old!

loc.en: So old that I'm not sure I've ever seen it before... Sorry I can't help you any more than that, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: So old that I'm not sure I've ever seen it before... Sorry I can't help you any more than that, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: Thanks anyway, Minnie!
loc.ru: Thanks anyway, Minnie!

loc.en: Thanks! Let me just put this all together...
loc.ru: Thanks! Let me just put this all together...

loc.en: Done! Now if we place this on Dazzle Beach, you and Jasmine should be able to gather the <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> you need.
loc.ru: Done! Now if we place this on Dazzle Beach, you and Jasmine should be able to gather the <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> you need.

loc.en: Moana! I could use your help with something... Jasmine and I need to make this extremely important key to open a Secret Journal, but we need some <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> for the crafting recipe.
loc.ru: Moana! I could use your help with something... Jasmine and I need to make this extremely important key to open a Secret Journal, but we need some <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> for the crafting recipe.

loc.en: <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> for a key? Hmm... That actually sparks a memory...
loc.ru: <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> for a key? Hmm... That actually sparks a memory...

loc.en: Pun definitely intended!
loc.ru: Pun definitely intended!

loc.en: Thanks! Now, about those Sea Sand Sparks...
loc.ru: Thanks! Now, about those Sea Sand Sparks...

loc.en: Right! The Sea Sand Sparks!
loc.ru: Right! The Sea Sand Sparks!

loc.en: Right. Ahem...
loc.ru: Right. Ahem...

loc.en: That means you won't need regular Sea Sand Sparks. They'll have to come from a particular sort of <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Torch</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: That means you won't need regular Sea Sand Sparks. They'll have to come from a particular sort of <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Torch</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: Do you know what kind of torch I need to make that happen?
loc.ru: Do you know what kind of torch I need to make that happen?

loc.en: Actually, I do! Merlin taught me to make a Sea Sand Torch that never goes out. We'll have to make one from scratch and include a gemstone to ensure the Sea Sand Sparks are as bright as can be.
loc.ru: Actually, I do! Merlin taught me to make a Sea Sand Torch that never goes out. We'll have to make one from scratch and include a gemstone to ensure the Sea Sand Sparks are as bright as can be.

loc.en: Great!
loc.ru: Great!

loc.en: I'm glad you asked.
loc.ru: I'm glad you asked.

loc.en: I know a giant monster crab who does too. But this isn't just for looks, you know.
loc.ru: I know a giant monster crab who does too. But this isn't just for looks, you know.

loc.en: When the <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> shine brightly, that'll bring the magic to the key, and then it'll open that <ActivityItem>Secret Journal</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: When the <ActivityItem>Sea Sand Sparks</ActivityItem> shine brightly, that'll bring the magic to the key, and then it'll open that <ActivityItem>Secret Journal</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: I remember helping with this before the Forgetting. Jasmine was trying to keep the key safe. That <ActivityItem>Secret Journal</ActivityItem> you're talking about is magical, isn't it?
loc.ru: I remember helping with this before the Forgetting. Jasmine was trying to keep the key safe. That <ActivityItem>Secret Journal</ActivityItem> you're talking about is magical, isn't it?

loc.en: Well, it grew out of an Enchanted Flower in Jasmine's House. So yes, I think it's pretty magical.
loc.ru: Well, it grew out of an Enchanted Flower in Jasmine's House. So yes, I think it's pretty magical.

loc.en: Gotcha. If you tell me what we need, I can <Lore>gather all the materials</Lore> so we can make the Sea Sand Torch and gather those sparks.
loc.ru: Gotcha. If you tell me what we need, I can <Lore>gather all the materials</Lore> so we can make the Sea Sand Torch and gather those sparks.

loc.ru: Sure! I'd be happy to.

loc.ru: Hah, good one!

loc.en: Funny! But, um, the Sea Sand Sparks...?
loc.ru: Funny! But, um, the Sea Sand Sparks...?

loc.en: There's no time for puns!
loc.ru: There's no time for puns!

loc.en: That makes sense.
loc.ru: That makes sense.

loc.en: What does the shine do?
loc.ru: What does the shine do?

loc.en: I love when things are extra shiny!
loc.ru: I love when things are extra shiny!

loc.en: Hmm, you seem pretty attached to it. Maybe I should bring you a <ActivityItem>Golden Banana</ActivityItem>...
loc.ru: Hmm, you seem pretty attached to it. Maybe I should bring you a <ActivityItem>Golden Banana</ActivityItem>...

loc.ru: Ooh! Ah ah!

loc.en: I'll get you down eventually â don't worry!

loc.ru: Oooh! Ah-ah! Oo!

loc.en: Argh, they won't hand over the gemstones!

loc.en: Would you like...
