loc.en: I kinda need that plank you've got â how about a trade for another <ActivityItem>Golden Banana</ActivityItem>?
loc.ru: I kinda need that plank you've got â how about a trade for another <ActivityItem>Golden Banana</ActivityItem>?

loc.en: Ah! Ah ah!
loc.ru: Ah! Ah ah!

loc.en: Pleasure doing business with you!
loc.ru: Pleasure doing business with you!

loc.en: {PlayerName}! What are YOU doing here?!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}! What are YOU doing here?!

loc.en: I think you know why I'm here, Mother Gothel.
loc.ru: I think you know why I'm here, Mother Gothel.

loc.en: Oh, don't be so dramatic, darling.
loc.ru: Oh, don't be so dramatic, darling.

loc.en: Oh, you're no fun at all!
loc.ru: Oh, you're no fun at all!

loc.en: Oh, that breaks my heart to hear...
loc.ru: Oh, that breaks my heart to hear...

loc.en: I was only borrowing it.
loc.ru: I was only borrowing it.

loc.en: Ugh! You take ONE child for her magical abilities and people REFUSE to forget it!
loc.ru: Ugh! You take ONE child for her magical abilities and people REFUSE to forget it!

loc.en: I'm teasing! Of course, I DON'T care.
loc.ru: I'm teasing! Of course, I DON'T care.

loc.en: Return the Enchanted Flower. Now.
loc.ru: Return the Enchanted Flower. Now.

loc.en: But I MUST know what it does! And what is this book inside? Does it have magical properties, too?
loc.ru: But I MUST know what it does! And what is this book inside? Does it have magical properties, too?

loc.en: Well?
loc.ru: Well?

loc.en: Honestly, darling, holding a grudge like that will do nothing but keep you up at night.
loc.ru: Honestly, darling, holding a grudge like that will do nothing but keep you up at night.

loc.en: But dear, some of us aren't blessed with natural magical abilities, so what choice do I have?
loc.ru: But dear, some of us aren't blessed with natural magical abilities, so what choice do I have?

loc.en: Don't be petulant, dear. It's unbecoming.
loc.ru: Don't be petulant, dear. It's unbecoming.

loc.en: How can you be certain, darling? I have ideas for magic you've never dreamed of.
loc.ru: How can you be certain, darling? I have ideas for magic you've never dreamed of.

loc.en: Study. Practice. Put in the work.
loc.ru: Study. Practice. Put in the work.

loc.en: I'm not really worried about that right now.
loc.ru: I'm not really worried about that right now.

loc.en: Actually, in this case, I can be 100% certain.
loc.ru: Actually, in this case, I can be 100% certain.

loc.en: That flower is mine, not yours. And I'm in no mood to share with you.
loc.ru: That flower is mine, not yours. And I'm in no mood to share with you.

loc.en: Fine, fine. Take your flower. It wasn't doing anything special anyway.
loc.ru: Fine, fine. Take your flower. It wasn't doing anything special anyway.

loc.en: Well, that's rather rude.
loc.ru: Well, that's rather rude.

loc.en: For example, I enjoy spending time with loved ones. You, on the other hand, enjoy STEALING from them.
loc.ru: For example, I enjoy spending time with loved ones. You, on the other hand, enjoy STEALING from them.

loc.en: Are we?
loc.ru: Are we?

loc.en: Thankfully, I'm not trying to be polite to you right now.
loc.ru: Thankfully, I'm not trying to be polite to you right now.

loc.en: Yes, that wasn't rhetorical.
loc.ru: Yes, that wasn't rhetorical.

loc.en: I'm taking my Enchanted Flower back. And I better not see you lurking around Jasmine and Aladdin's House again! Got it?
loc.ru: I'm taking my Enchanted Flower back. And I better not see you lurking around Jasmine and Aladdin's House again! Got it?

loc.en: Of course YOU would steal a magic flower!
loc.ru: Of course YOU would steal a magic flower!

loc.en: How could you do this AGAIN?
loc.ru: How could you do this AGAIN?

loc.en: I'm really disappointed in you.
loc.ru: I'm really disappointed in you.

loc.en: You really need to stop trying to steal magic.
loc.ru: You really need to stop trying to steal magic.

loc.en: What it does is none of your business.
loc.ru: What it does is none of your business.

loc.en: If it does, it's not magic that will help you.
loc.ru: If it does, it's not magic that will help you.

loc.en: Fortunately, your opinion of me is irrelevant.
loc.ru: Fortunately, your opinion of me is irrelevant.

loc.en: You and I have different ideas of fun.
loc.ru: You and I have different ideas of fun.

loc.en: We're done here.
loc.ru: We're done here.

loc.en: Hey, Mulan! Aladdin and I are putting together a marketplace right here in the Valley!
loc.ru: Hey, Mulan! Aladdin and I are putting together a marketplace right here in the Valley!

loc.en: Oh, that's right! Mushu mentioned you two were working on something big.
loc.ru: Oh, that's right! Mushu mentioned you two were working on something big.

loc.en: Well... I don't know if you remember, {PlayerName}, but we built the Tea Stall because I missed drinking tea with my friends here in the Valley.
loc.ru: Well... I don't know if you remember, {PlayerName}, but we built the Tea Stall because I missed drinking tea with my friends here in the Valley.

loc.en: If you have the space, I'd love for the Tea Stall to be included!
loc.ru: If you have the space, I'd love for the Tea Stall to be included!

loc.en: I love tea, I love my friends... So that's my advice: Make sure your stall sells something you love.
loc.ru: I love tea, I love my friends... So that's my advice: Make sure your stall sells something you love.

loc.en: I'll see what I can do. Thanks, Mulan!
loc.ru: I'll see what I can do. Thanks, Mulan!

loc.en: Any advice on running a great stall?
loc.ru: Any advice on running a great stall?

loc.en: Can we add your Tea Stall to the market?
loc.ru: Can we add your Tea Stall to the market?

loc.en: Rapunzel! You love art and books!
loc.ru: Rapunzel! You love art and books!

loc.en: I do! So much.
loc.ru: I do! So much.

loc.en: Merlin says I've made the Dreamlight Library my second home.
loc.ru: Merlin says I've made the Dreamlight Library my second home.

loc.en: Take a look at this photo I took. Have you seen anything in your art books that looks like this?
loc.ru: Take a look at this photo I took. Have you seen anything in your art books that looks like this?

loc.en: Hmm... I don't think so...
loc.ru: Hmm... I don't think so...

loc.en: But I can always go look. It might take me weeks or even months, but I'll keep searching!
loc.ru: But I can always go look. It might take me weeks or even months, but I'll keep searching!

loc.en: We accept your challenge!
loc.ru: We accept your challenge!

loc.en: Are you really worried about theft in the Valley?
loc.ru: Are you really worried about theft in the Valley?

loc.en: Hope you're ready to lose some Star Coins!
loc.ru: Hope you're ready to lose some Star Coins!

loc.en: What's next?
loc.ru: What's next?

loc.en: I guess we'll see...
loc.ru: I guess we'll see...

loc.en: Are you... excited to be robbed?
loc.ru: Are you... excited to be robbed?

loc.en: Hey, Mr. McDuck! Aladdin told me you want us to test the new security system in your shop.
loc.ru: Hey, Mr. McDuck! Aladdin told me you want us to test the new security system in your shop.

loc.en: One can never be too careful, especially with villains about.
loc.ru: One can never be too careful, especially with villains about.

loc.en: Bless me bagpipes! I knew you'd be interested, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: Bless me bagpipes! I knew you'd be interested, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: Ha! Confident are ya? Good! You're gonna need it!
loc.ru: Ha! Confident are ya? Good! You're gonna need it!

loc.en: Don't know if ya know this, but before the Forgetting, Aladdin and I used to spend whole afternoons swapping stories of the adventures we'd had and the treasures we'd found.
loc.ru: Don't know if ya know this, but before the Forgetting, Aladdin and I used to spend whole afternoons swapping stories of the adventures we'd had and the treasures we'd found.

loc.ru: He's a most resourceful lad. So, I'm certain the two of you will be unstoppable! I'd trust no one else to test my new security system.

loc.ru: That we will!

loc.ru: I want you and Aladdin to <Lore>visit my shop</Lore> and have a good look around.

loc.en: Not robbed, TESTED!
loc.ru: Not robbed, TESTED!

loc.en: Now then, to business...
loc.ru: Now then, to business...

loc.en: Any potential thieves would no doubt case the place beforehand. And I want the two of you to have every advantage.
loc.ru: Any potential thieves would no doubt case the place beforehand. And I want the two of you to have every advantage.

loc.en: Interested in adding your stall to the marketplace?
loc.ru: Interested in adding your stall to the marketplace?

loc.en: Hey, Tiana! Aladdin and I are putting together a marketplace right here in the Valley, including our new gem stall.
loc.ru: Hey, Tiana! Aladdin and I are putting together a marketplace right here in the Valley, including our new gem stall.

loc.en: Well now, that sounds marvelous!
loc.ru: Well now, that sounds marvelous!

loc.en: You can experiment and try new offerings every now and then. It'll keep your customers curious, and you get to innovate and enjoy the experience!
loc.ru: You can experiment and try new offerings every now and then. It'll keep your customers curious, and you get to innovate and enjoy the experience!

loc.en: Sure. Have fun with it! Just because it's a business doesn't mean it can't be fun.
loc.ru: Sure. Have fun with it! Just because it's a business doesn't mean it can't be fun.

loc.en: If there's room, I'd be happy to be right in the middle of things.
loc.ru: If there's room, I'd be happy to be right in the middle of things.

loc.en: Of course, you're the one putting this whole thing together. I'll leave the final decision to you, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: Of course, you're the one putting this whole thing together. I'll leave the final decision to you, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: So tell me... what's your secret?
loc.ru: So tell me... what's your secret?

loc.en: Secret?
loc.ru: Secret?

loc.en: How did you get Belle to fall for you, really? A potion? A spell?
loc.ru: How did you get Belle to fall for you, really? A potion? A spell?

loc.en: She seems so... ugh, sweet.
loc.ru: She seems so... ugh, sweet.

loc.en: Belle loves me. And I love her.
loc.ru: Belle loves me. And I love her.

loc.en: Hmm... interesting...
loc.ru: Hmm... interesting...

loc.en: Kristoff! What's a rugged ice harvester like you doing in a place like this?
loc.ru: Kristoff! What's a rugged ice harvester like you doing in a place like this?

loc.en: I'm gathering flowers and seashells for Anna!
loc.ru: I'm gathering flowers and seashells for Anna!

loc.en: How quaint, young love! Anything I can do to help?
loc.ru: How quaint, young love! Anything I can do to help?

loc.en: Ahh... I don't think so.
loc.ru: Ahh... I don't think so.

loc.en: Come on, I'm sure you need a little help getting the girl...
loc.ru: Come on, I'm sure you need a little help getting the girl...

loc.en: No way! I know what "a little help" means, coming from you!
loc.ru: No way! I know what "a little help" means, coming from you!

loc.en: No need to get so heated, dearie, you'll melt your ice.
loc.ru: No need to get so heated, dearie, you'll melt your ice.

loc.en: Everyone seems happy.
loc.ru: Everyone seems happy.

loc.en: What kind of tails?
loc.ru: What kind of tails?

loc.en: You're up to something...
loc.ru: You're up to something...

loc.en: I noticed there are so many people around Dreamlight Valley with feet.
loc.ru: I noticed there are so many people around Dreamlight Valley with feet.

loc.en: And..?
loc.ru: And..?

loc.en: You wouldn't happen to know if any wish to have tails instead?
loc.ru: You wouldn't happen to know if any wish to have tails instead?

loc.en: Yes. That's what I thought, too. How very disappointing.
loc.ru: Yes. That's what I thought, too. How very disappointing.

loc.en: Oh, whatever they'd like... fish, shark, perhaps something in the eel family.
loc.ru: Oh, whatever they'd like... fish, shark, perhaps something in the eel family.

loc.en: Ugh, no trust at all!
loc.ru: Ugh, no trust at all!

loc.en: Too bad... I could make them an offer they can't refuse! Hah!
loc.ru: Too bad... I could make them an offer they can't refuse! Hah!

loc.en: I could do it all! For the right price, of course.
loc.ru: I could do it all! For the right price, of course.

loc.en: I'm always very honest about the pros and cons in my contracts, you know.
loc.ru: I'm always very honest about the pros and cons in my contracts, you know.

loc.en: I think you should avoid messing with people's legs or tails, Ursula.
loc.ru: I think you should avoid messing with people's legs or tails, Ursula.

loc.en: Oh, you're no fun.
loc.ru: Oh, you're no fun.

loc.en: That's wonderful!
loc.ru: That's wonderful!

loc.en: I don't believe you.
loc.ru: I don't believe you.

loc.en: I'm glad I'm having a positive influence on you!
loc.ru: I'm glad I'm having a positive influence on you!

loc.en: Do good deeds and expect nothing in return.
loc.ru: Do good deeds and expect nothing in return.

loc.en: Be a good friend.
loc.ru: Be a good friend.

loc.en: Start by... not stealing souls?
loc.ru: Start by... not stealing souls?

loc.en: I have news. I've decided to turn over a new leaf.
loc.ru: I have news. I've decided to turn over a new leaf.

loc.en: Oh really?
loc.ru: Oh really?

loc.en: Yes! I only want to do good deeds from now on!
loc.ru: Yes! I only want to do good deeds from now on!

loc.en: I AM wonderful!
loc.ru: I AM wonderful!

loc.en: Well, that isn't very nice, is it?
loc.ru: Well, that isn't very nice, is it?

loc.en: I suppose you have...
loc.ru: I suppose you have...

loc.en: Now tell me, what do I do if I want to be "good"?
loc.ru: Now tell me, what do I do if I want to be "good"?

loc.en: Hah! Hilarious!
loc.ru: Hah! Hilarious!

loc.en: Oh, but I'm already a good friend!
loc.ru: Oh, but I'm already a good friend!

loc.en: Excuse me! I never STEAL anything!
loc.ru: Excuse me! I never STEAL anything!

loc.en: Wait... you're serious, aren't you?
loc.ru: Wait... you're serious, aren't you?

loc.en: I'm always around to help out... I just ask a little payment in return.
loc.ru: I'm always around to help out... I just ask a little payment in return.

loc.en: My dealings are always fair.
loc.ru: My dealings are always fair.

loc.en: Being a good person isn't hard, you just need a little practice.
loc.ru: Being a good person isn't hard, you just need a little practice.

loc.en: Maybe I was a little hasty in my decision to change myself so much.
loc.ru: Maybe I was a little hasty in my decision to change myself so much.

loc.en: If it isn't broke, don't fit it! HA!
loc.ru: If it isn't broke, don't fit it! HA!

loc.en: You already look perfect.
loc.ru: You already look perfect.

loc.en: Maybe a cool hat?
loc.ru: Maybe a cool hat?

loc.en: I'm not sure...
loc.ru: I'm not sure...

loc.en: I'm thinking of changing my look.
loc.ru: I'm thinking of changing my look.

loc.en: Any suggestions? Something fabulous, of course.
loc.ru: Any suggestions? Something fabulous, of course.

loc.en: Hmm... you do make a good point.
loc.ru: Hmm... you do make a good point.

loc.en: A hat? That's the best you can come up with?
loc.ru: A hat? That's the best you can come up with?

loc.en: Oh?
loc.ru: Oh?

loc.en: I'm a one-of-a-kind experience! Why ruin perfection?
loc.ru: I'm a one-of-a-kind experience! Why ruin perfection?

loc.en: I suppose it's hard to change what's already perfect, isn't it?
loc.ru: I suppose it's hard to change what's already perfect, isn't it?

loc.en: Never change, Ursula.
loc.ru: Never change, Ursula.

loc.en: I don't intend to!
loc.ru: I don't intend to!

loc.en: A gift? For nothing? What a quaint custom.
loc.ru: A gift? For nothing? What a quaint custom.

loc.en: For little ol' me?
loc.ru: For little ol' me?

loc.en: Is this a gift or a bargain?
loc.ru: Is this a gift or a bargain?

loc.en: Perfect.
loc.ru: Perfect.

loc.en: Why thank you, dearie!
loc.ru: Why thank you, dearie!

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Poor dear. You look AWFUL.
loc.ru: Poor dear. You look AWFUL.

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Delighted to see you.
loc.ru: Delighted to see you.

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Charmed, I'm sure.
loc.ru: Charmed, I'm sure.

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Stop lurking about and say hello, dear.
loc.ru: Stop lurking about and say hello, dear.

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Don't be a wallflower. Its unbecoming!
loc.ru: Don't be a wallflower. Its unbecoming!

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: So lovely to see you...
loc.ru: So lovely to see you...

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Staring isn't polite, you know.
loc.ru: Staring isn't polite, you know.

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Don't be coy, now. I don't bite!
loc.ru: Don't be coy, now. I don't bite!

loc.en: Sorry, I can't talk now!
loc.ru: Sorry, I can't talk now!

loc.en: Well, well, well, look who the tide brought in.
loc.ru: Well, well, well, look who the tide brought in.

loc.en: Alright then, move along.
loc.ru: Alright then, move along.

loc.en: Okay, goodbye now.
loc.ru: Okay, goodbye now.

loc.en: Run along now!
loc.ru: Run along now!

loc.en: That was fun, I suppose.
loc.ru: That was fun, I suppose.

loc.en: Farewell, dearie. Don't get lost in the tide.
loc.ru: Farewell, dearie. Don't get lost in the tide.

loc.en: Goodbye, little minnow.
loc.ru: Goodbye, little minnow.

loc.en: Don't get your fins all twisted. Let's go!
loc.ru: Don't get your fins all twisted. Let's go!

loc.en: Shall we get started?
loc.ru: Shall we get started?

loc.en: Come dearie, let's go before I get bored.
loc.ru: Come dearie, let's go before I get bored.

loc.en: Hello, my little sea urchin! What shall we do today?
loc.ru: Hello, my little sea urchin! What shall we do today?

loc.en: I'm feeling restless. Entertain me!
loc.ru: I'm feeling restless. Entertain me!

loc.en: Talk to <Lore>Tiana</Lore> about your <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: Talk to <Lore>Tiana</Lore> about your <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: Seems like Tiana's got something cooking...
loc.ru: Seems like Tiana's got something cooking...

loc.en: Slow and Steady
loc.ru: Slow and Steady

loc.en: Talk to {TargetNPC}.
loc.ru: Talk to {TargetNPC}.

loc.en: {ItemName}.
loc.ru: {ItemName}.

loc.en: {ItemName}.
loc.ru: {ItemName}.

loc.en: {ItemName}.
loc.ru: {ItemName}.

loc.en: {ItemName}.
loc.ru: {ItemName}.

loc.en: Gather the materials needed to craft a <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: Gather the materials needed to craft a <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: Craft a {ItemName}.
loc.ru: Craft a {ItemName}.

loc.en: Place your {ItemName} in the Valley.
loc.ru: Place your {ItemName} in the Valley.

loc.en: Cook {ItemName} with your {MachineName}.
loc.ru: Cook {ItemName} with your {MachineName}.

loc.en:
Collect your meals from the {MachineName}.
(It will take some time for the {MachineName} to finish!)
loc.ru:
Collect your meals from the {MachineName}.
(It will take some time for the {MachineName} to finish!)

loc.en: You wanted to talk to me about something?
loc.ru: You wanted to talk to me about something?

loc.en: If you want to build your own <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>, you'll have to get materials from around the Valley first.
loc.ru: If you want to build your own <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>, you'll have to get materials from around the Valley first.

loc.en: After you build it, just <Lore>put it anywhere you like</Lore> and start cooking!
loc.ru: After you build it, just <Lore>put it anywhere you like</Lore> and start cooking!

loc.en: I got all the materials I need for my <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>!
loc.ru: I got all the materials I need for my <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>!

loc.en: That's marvelous!
loc.ru: That's marvelous!

loc.en: Now you just have to put it all together at one of those <Lore>Crafting Stations</Lore>...
loc.ru: Now you just have to put it all together at one of those <Lore>Crafting Stations</Lore>...

loc.en: The <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem> is complete!
loc.ru: The <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem> is complete!

loc.en: Well, that's certainly exciting! You should <Lore>place it somewhere quick and start cooking</Lore>!
loc.ru: Well, that's certainly exciting! You should <Lore>place it somewhere quick and start cooking</Lore>!

loc.en: I hear you set up your new <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: I hear you set up your new <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: I'm going to put it to the test and <Lore>batch-cook some meals with it</Lore>!
loc.ru: I'm going to put it to the test and <Lore>batch-cook some meals with it</Lore>!

loc.en: Tiana, my <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem> is all done!
loc.ru: Tiana, my <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem> is all done!

loc.en: I thought something smelled delicious! Well, what are you waiting for? Go <Lore>collect your meals</Lore>, so you can see how they turned out.
loc.ru: I thought something smelled delicious! Well, what are you waiting for? Go <Lore>collect your meals</Lore>, so you can see how they turned out.

loc.en: I'd say this has been a success, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: I'd say this has been a success, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: The food smells wonderful, and you're all set up to batch-cook whenever you like.
loc.ru: The food smells wonderful, and you're all set up to batch-cook whenever you like.

loc.en: I look forward to trying some of your new dishes!
loc.ru: I look forward to trying some of your new dishes!

loc.en: This thing will cook FOR me?
loc.ru: This thing will cook FOR me?

loc.en: I like the sound of this.
loc.ru: I like the sound of this.

loc.en: Easiest meal prep EVER.
loc.ru: Easiest meal prep EVER.

loc.en: {PlayerName}, you're just who I was thinking about!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, you're just who I was thinking about!

loc.en: I was going through my favorite cookbooks and recipe diaries and found plans for something called a <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>?
loc.ru: I was going through my favorite cookbooks and recipe diaries and found plans for something called a <ActivityItem>Slow Cooker</ActivityItem>?

loc.en: Seems that you and I used to prepare loads of dishes in <Lore>large batches</Lore> with this machine.
loc.ru: Seems that you and I used to prepare loads of dishes in <Lore>large batches</Lore> with this machine.

loc.en: I thought you might!
loc.ru: I thought you might!

loc.en: All you need to do is choose the recipe and add the Ingredients! It'll take some time, but that just means you can do other things while you wait.
loc.ru: All you need to do is choose the recipe and add the Ingredients! It'll take some time, but that just means you can do other things while you wait.

loc.en: That's certainly true!
loc.ru: That's certainly true!

loc.en: I must've gotten them from Merlin or WALLÂ·E before the Forgetting.
loc.ru: I must've gotten them from Merlin or WALLÂ·E before the Forgetting.

loc.en: Now, I'm sure you can <Lore>build one yourself</Lore> with things found right here in the Valley.
loc.ru: Now, I'm sure you can <Lore>build one yourself</Lore> with things found right here in the Valley.

loc.en: I'll give you the list for what you'll need and <Lore>my famous Gumbo recipe</Lore> for you to try out when the Slow Cooker is finished.
loc.ru: I'll give you the list for what you'll need and <Lore>my famous Gumbo recipe</Lore> for you to try out when the Slow Cooker is finished.

loc.en: Be sure to drop by and let me know how it went!
loc.ru: Be sure to drop by and let me know how it went!

loc.en: Hey! Watch where you're going!
loc.ru: Hey! Watch where you're going!

loc.en: Gee, I'm sorry!
loc.ru: Gee, I'm sorry!

loc.en: Are you okay? You seem kinda anxious. Do ya need to relax?
loc.ru: Are you okay? You seem kinda anxious. Do ya need to relax?

loc.en: WHAT?! That's ridiculous! I AM relaxed.
loc.ru: WHAT?! That's ridiculous! I AM relaxed.

loc.en: Oh.
loc.ru: Oh.

loc.en: 'Cause I know a great swimming hole where you can just float and relâ
loc.ru: 'Cause I know a great swimming hole where you can just float and relâ

loc.en: WAK!!! I'm EXTREMELY RELAXED! *grumble* What'sthebigidea? Whodoesthisguythinkheis?! *grumble*
loc.ru: WAK!!! I'm EXTREMELY RELAXED! *grumble* What'sthebigidea? Whodoesthisguythinkheis?! *grumble*

loc.en: Marvelous! You are now free to explore the Aladdin Realm!
loc.ru: Marvelous! You are now free to explore the Aladdin Realm!

loc.en: Oh dear, I'm afraid you'll have to gather more Dreamlight to open this door.
loc.ru: Oh dear, I'm afraid you'll have to gather more Dreamlight to open this door.

loc.en: Remember: Only YOU have the power to open these doors and bring our friends back to the Valley.
loc.ru: Remember: Only YOU have the power to open these doors and bring our friends back to the Valley.

loc.en: Now then, {PlayerName}, behind this door is the city of Agrabah! A splendid place where you'll find a prince who was not always so, and a princess who wished to do much more...
loc.ru: Now then, {PlayerName}, behind this door is the city of Agrabah! A splendid place where you'll find a prince who was not always so, and a princess who wished to do much more...

loc.en: Let's open the door. (Use {UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencyDreamlight" index=0>)
loc.ru: Let's open the door. (Use {UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencyDreamlight" index=0>)

loc.en: Perhaps some other time.
loc.ru: Perhaps some other time.

loc.en: From April 2 through April 22, you'll have the opportunity to find all kinds of bright-colored eggs. (Search everywhere in the Valley AND in Realms you've unlocked!) These will help you earn exclusive rewards!<lw>You'll also complete daily missions with WALLÂ·E for even more seasonal prizes!<lw>Let's make this a spring to remember, full of joy and fun. Happy egg hunting, Valley Villagers!

loc.en: From March 10 to March 17, our Lucky You! event will take place in the Valley.<lw>Search for Three-Leaf Clovers and rare Four-Leaf Clovers. You can use them to craft items that bring a touch of luck and whimsy to your Valley and wardrobe!<lw>Good luck!

loc.en: And that can apply to everything! You could <Lore>decorate with Halloween items</Lore> or even <Lore>include Halloween-themed food</Lore>!
loc.ru: And that can apply to everything! You could <Lore>decorate with Halloween items</Lore> or even <Lore>include Halloween-themed food</Lore>!

loc.en: Hey Daisy, can we talk for a moment?
loc.ru: Hey Daisy, can we talk for a moment?

loc.en: Of course! What do you want to talk about?
loc.ru: Of course! What do you want to talk about?

loc.en: Romance!
loc.ru: Romance!

loc.en: Oooh, I'm always happy to talk about that!
loc.ru: Oooh, I'm always happy to talk about that!

loc.en: So I'm trying to help Sally and Jack get comfortable with each other again.
loc.ru: So I'm trying to help Sally and Jack get comfortable with each other again.

loc.en: They were apart for a while, and I think they need a little help to get back on the same page.
loc.ru: They were apart for a while, and I think they need a little help to get back on the same page.

loc.en: I understand. Did you have anything in mind?
loc.ru: I understand. Did you have anything in mind?

loc.en: But a date needs more than just snacks. You could... <Lore>decorate with Halloween items</Lore> or even <Lore>include a variety of Halloween-themed food</Lore>!
loc.ru: But a date needs more than just snacks. You could... <Lore>decorate with Halloween items</Lore> or even <Lore>include a variety of Halloween-themed food</Lore>!

loc.en: Minnie suggested that I make some treats for them to share.
loc.ru: Minnie suggested that I make some treats for them to share.

loc.en: No, you're the first Villager I came to see.
loc.ru: No, you're the first Villager I came to see.

loc.en: Well, aren't you smart? Coming to the best advice-giver in the Valley first!
loc.ru: Well, aren't you smart? Coming to the best advice-giver in the Valley first!

loc.en: Now, let me think... Oh, I know! You could give them something they'll both like that they can share together.
loc.ru: Now, let me think... Oh, I know! You could give them something they'll both like that they can share together.

loc.en: And for Jack and Sally, it should involve frightening imagery!
loc.ru: And for Jack and Sally, it should involve frightening imagery!

loc.en: Like a skull, or something Halloween-y.
loc.ru: Like a skull, or something Halloween-y.

loc.en: Well, that's a great start! As long as it's the kind of treat that Jack and Sally both like.
loc.ru: Well, that's a great start! As long as it's the kind of treat that Jack and Sally both like.

loc.en: Hmm, not sure about that... I guess gingerbread isn't the most Halloween-y of treats.
loc.ru: Hmm, not sure about that... I guess gingerbread isn't the most Halloween-y of treats.

loc.en: Well, there's an easy way to fix that â make the cookies in the shape of a skull!
loc.ru: Well, there's an easy way to fix that â make the cookies in the shape of a skull!

loc.en: Perfect! Thanks, Daisy. I'll <Lore>see what Minnie has to say next</Lore>.
loc.ru: Perfect! Thanks, Daisy. I'll <Lore>see what Minnie has to say next</Lore>.

loc.en: Great ideas, Daisy. I'll get started on that now!
loc.ru: Great ideas, Daisy. I'll get started on that now!

loc.en: Hey, Daisy!
loc.ru: Hey, Daisy!

loc.en: As a matter of fact, I do! Minnie and I are planning a new project for "Dots & Daisies," but it's a little ambitious for just the two of us...
loc.ru: As a matter of fact, I do! Minnie and I are planning a new project for "Dots & Daisies," but it's a little ambitious for just the two of us...

loc.en: Oh, "Dots & Daisies" is doing fabulously! We're just about to start a big new project!
loc.ru: Oh, "Dots & Daisies" is doing fabulously! We're just about to start a big new project!

loc.en: Why, of course. I have dozens! A purple and pink tartan skirt with a back bow, an entire athleisure set with lace trim... I could go on.
loc.ru: Why, of course. I have dozens! A purple and pink tartan skirt with a back bow, an entire athleisure set with lace trim... I could go on.

loc.en: Why do you ask?
loc.ru: Why do you ask?

loc.en: Sally's looking for a new sewing project. I thought you and Minnie might have some ideas for her.
loc.ru: Sally's looking for a new sewing project. I thought you and Minnie might have some ideas for her.

loc.en: But enough about me; what was it you wanted to talk about?
loc.ru: But enough about me; what was it you wanted to talk about?

loc.en: We're thinking: home decor. You know â throw pillows, curtains, the whole works.
loc.ru: We're thinking: home decor. You know â throw pillows, curtains, the whole works.

loc.en: I'm sure Minnie will agree that you and Sally would be the perfect collaborators!
loc.ru: I'm sure Minnie will agree that you and Sally would be the perfect collaborators!

loc.en: Well, I'm thrilled! Sally has such fantastic style. I'm sure we'll come up with something unforgettable.
loc.ru: Well, I'm thrilled! Sally has such fantastic style. I'm sure we'll come up with something unforgettable.

loc.en: I'll give you a list of supplies. Would you mind <Lore>collecting them for us</Lore>?
loc.ru: I'll give you a list of supplies. Would you mind <Lore>collecting them for us</Lore>?

loc.en: Sometimes. If Donald's being especially frustrating. *giggle*
loc.ru: Sometimes. If Donald's being especially frustrating. *giggle*

loc.en: Now, there's lots of work to do!
loc.ru: Now, there's lots of work to do!

loc.en: In the meantime, I need to grab my design sketches. Then we'll <Lore>meet at Minnie's place</Lore>!
loc.ru: In the meantime, I need to grab my design sketches. Then we'll <Lore>meet at Minnie's place</Lore>!

loc.en: Actually, I have an even BETTER thought! Why don't you and Sally join Minnie and me on our next project?
loc.ru: Actually, I have an even BETTER thought! Why don't you and Sally join Minnie and me on our next project?

loc.en: Do you have any sewing project ideas?
loc.ru: Do you have any sewing project ideas?

loc.en: Need any sewing help?
loc.ru: Need any sewing help?

loc.en: How's your fashion line coming?
loc.ru: How's your fashion line coming?

loc.en: What do we need to get started?
loc.ru: What do we need to get started?

loc.en: Sally will be so happy!
loc.ru: Sally will be so happy!

loc.en: Do you actually THROW throw pillows?
loc.ru: Do you actually THROW throw pillows?

loc.en: {PlayerName}, thanks again for helping with the materials but...
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, thanks again for helping with the materials but...

loc.en: I'm not sure it's the best time for Sally to collaborate with Minnie and me.
loc.ru: I'm not sure it's the best time for Sally to collaborate with Minnie and me.

loc.en: Oh, definitely! We all love Halloween, so I'm SURE we'll have a haunted house collection soon!
loc.ru: Oh, definitely! We all love Halloween, so I'm SURE we'll have a haunted house collection soon!

loc.en: You absolutely must! She has SO many unique ideas... I'm just not sure they're right for the first EVER home decor line for "Dots & Daisies."
loc.ru: You absolutely must! She has SO many unique ideas... I'm just not sure they're right for the first EVER home decor line for "Dots & Daisies."

loc.en: Exactly! This first one really has to have our established style. But I'd love to collaborate with her in the future!
loc.ru: Exactly! This first one really has to have our established style. But I'd love to collaborate with her in the future!

loc.en: Anyway, I'll give the materials back to Sally. I just know the two of you will come up with something fun for them!
loc.ru: Anyway, I'll give the materials back to Sally. I just know the two of you will come up with something fun for them!

loc.en: We'll find something different for Sally.
loc.ru: We'll find something different for Sally.

loc.en: Maybe something in the future?
loc.ru: Maybe something in the future?

loc.en: Because it's your first home collection?
loc.ru: Because it's your first home collection?

loc.en: Any suggestions for the Village?
loc.ru: Any suggestions for the Village?

loc.en: Orange or black?
loc.ru: Orange or black?

loc.en: What do you think of Christmas?
loc.ru: What do you think of Christmas?

loc.en: Which Biome do you like best?
loc.ru: Which Biome do you like best?

loc.en: Does the rain bother you?
loc.ru: Does the rain bother you?

loc.en: How did you learn to sew?
loc.ru: How did you learn to sew?

loc.en: Hiya, Donald! Do you have any Valley food memories to share? I'm putting together a spread for a theme party with Sally and the Fairy Godmother.
loc.ru: Hiya, Donald! Do you have any Valley food memories to share? I'm putting together a spread for a theme party with Sally and the Fairy Godmother.

loc.en: Umm... Oh, I know! Remember that time Kristoff got stuck in the Dark Portal? And I was there to help him out, but I didn't need help at all?
loc.ru: Umm... Oh, I know! Remember that time Kristoff got stuck in the Dark Portal? And I was there to help him out, but I didn't need help at all?

loc.en: And the two of us went fishing?
loc.ru: And the two of us went fishing?

loc.en: I knew you'd remember!
loc.ru: I knew you'd remember!

loc.en: Don't be ridiculous. I wasn't stuck! Anyway...
loc.ru: Don't be ridiculous. I wasn't stuck! Anyway...

loc.en: I made a fantastic <ActivityItem>Fish Salad</ActivityItem> with that fish we caught. It was delicious!
loc.ru: I made a fantastic <ActivityItem>Fish Salad</ActivityItem> with that fish we caught. It was delicious!

loc.en: Hmm... Okay. Thanks for sharing, Donald.
loc.ru: Hmm... Okay. Thanks for sharing, Donald.

loc.en: You were STUCK in the portal too...
loc.ru: You were STUCK in the portal too...

loc.en: Yep, it's ringing a bell!
loc.ru: Yep, it's ringing a bell!

loc.en: What a splendid project! But what sort of a quilt? Is there a pattern or a color theme?
loc.ru: What a splendid project! But what sort of a quilt? Is there a pattern or a color theme?

loc.en: Hmm... Let me think... Magic... Dreamlight Magic...
loc.ru: Hmm... Let me think... Magic... Dreamlight Magic...

loc.en: Hello, Fairy Godmother! Sally and I were hoping you might like to help us with a sewing project.
loc.ru: Hello, Fairy Godmother! Sally and I were hoping you might like to help us with a sewing project.

loc.en: Magic touch? Oh, (ha-ha), yes, I suppose I do. What did you have in mind?
loc.ru: Magic touch? Oh, (ha-ha), yes, I suppose I do. What did you have in mind?

loc.en: Oh, you're such a dear. Why, I'd be thrilled to lend a hand... or a wand!
loc.ru: Oh, you're such a dear. Why, I'd be thrilled to lend a hand... or a wand!

loc.en: Different and wonderful, I imagine. Just like Sally. Well, {PlayerName}, I would love to assist!
loc.ru: Different and wonderful, I imagine. Just like Sally. Well, {PlayerName}, I would love to assist!

loc.en: She mentioned the idea of a quilt.
loc.ru: She mentioned the idea of a quilt.

loc.en: I know! A patchwork piece to bring back fond Valley memories. But for a quilt... well, we'll need cloth scraps, of course.
loc.ru: I know! A patchwork piece to bring back fond Valley memories. But for a quilt... well, we'll need cloth scraps, of course.

loc.en: Oh, my! How interesting. Though... I suppose that might not appeal to everyone. Yet, the idea of cloth from a unique source is marvelous!
loc.ru: Oh, my! How interesting. Though... I suppose that might not appeal to everyone. Yet, the idea of cloth from a unique source is marvelous!

loc.en: Goofy sells fine pumpkins, but not fabric. Not to worry. I have some magic we might try.
loc.ru: Goofy sells fine pumpkins, but not fabric. Not to worry. I have some magic we might try.

loc.en: Not to worry, {PlayerName}. My magic will handle the fabric part.
loc.ru: Not to worry, {PlayerName}. My magic will handle the fabric part.

loc.en: Goodness, no, dear! I have some magic that will keep your wardrobe intact.
loc.ru: Goodness, no, dear! I have some magic that will keep your wardrobe intact.

loc.en: If you <Lore>bring me memorabilia of your special moments in the Valley</Lore>, I'll turn them into scraps of fabric that Sally and I can sew together.
loc.ru: If you <Lore>bring me memorabilia of your special moments in the Valley</Lore>, I'll turn them into scraps of fabric that Sally and I can sew together.

loc.en: Our quilting has begun. We're off to have such fun!
loc.ru: Our quilting has begun. We're off to have such fun!

loc.en: Yes, yes... I think that could work...
loc.ru: Yes, yes... I think that could work...

loc.en: Oh! Like an <Lore>ancient Crystal from the Mystical Cave</Lore>!
loc.ru: Oh! Like an <Lore>ancient Crystal from the Mystical Cave</Lore>!

loc.en: Guess I'll start treasure hunting!
loc.ru: Guess I'll start treasure hunting!

loc.en: And I had such a good time making some <Lore>Fruit Salad with Mickey</Lore>...
loc.ru: And I had such a good time making some <Lore>Fruit Salad with Mickey</Lore>...

loc.en: Precisely! Items full of wonderful memories!
loc.ru: Precisely! Items full of wonderful memories!

loc.en: Or that feather of Donald's I found <Lore>in the Forest of Valor</Lore>.
loc.ru: Or that feather of Donald's I found <Lore>in the Forest of Valor</Lore>.

loc.en: It would mean a lot to her.
loc.ru: It would mean a lot to her.

loc.en: You have the magic touch.
loc.ru: You have the magic touch.

loc.en: Her ideas were a little too different for Daisy and Minnie's current project.
loc.ru: Her ideas were a little too different for Daisy and Minnie's current project.

loc.en: Where would we get scrap material?
loc.ru: Where would we get scrap material?

loc.en: We could ask Goofy!
loc.ru: We could ask Goofy!

loc.en: I could cut up some clothes?
loc.ru: I could cut up some clothes?

loc.en: Maybe... Dreamlight Valley-inspired?
loc.ru: Maybe... Dreamlight Valley-inspired?

loc.en: Can we magically find an idea?
loc.ru: Can we magically find an idea?

loc.ru: She said a quilt "of dried cobwebs" to Daisy?

loc.en: Jack, you look awful today.
loc.ru: Jack, you look awful today.

loc.en: Do I?
loc.ru: Do I?

loc.en: You really do.
loc.ru: You really do.

loc.en: Sally, that's so kind of you to say. Thank you.
loc.ru: Sally, that's so kind of you to say. Thank you.

loc.en: You're welcome!
loc.ru: You're welcome!

loc.en: To understand more, I'll need more webs.
loc.ru: To understand more, I'll need more webs.

loc.en: Hey, Jack. You were right. There were tons of spiders invading Anna's Castle!
loc.ru: Hey, Jack. You were right. There were tons of spiders invading Anna's Castle!

loc.en: Oh, how wonderful! I'm so pleased that they've taken a Halloween approach to decoration.
loc.ru: Oh, how wonderful! I'm so pleased that they've taken a Halloween approach to decoration.

loc.en: It says "Dearâ ...helpful spâ ...making a porâ ...give them whaâ ...missâ..."

loc.en: Do you know where these spiders might have come from?
loc.ru: Do you know where these spiders might have come from?

loc.en: Hmm... I'm not sure, but let me examine them closer...
loc.ru: Hmm... I'm not sure, but let me examine them closer...

loc.en: *gasp* Look at this! This spiderweb has a message inside it!
loc.ru: *gasp* Look at this! This spiderweb has a message inside it!

loc.en: Wow! From whom?
loc.ru: Wow! From whom?

loc.en: I can't tell. The message is fragmented. I can only make out part of it.
loc.ru: I can't tell. The message is fragmented. I can only make out part of it.

loc.ru: That, my friend, is a rare form of Halloween magic. You need a special affinity for thread to use it.

loc.en: I'm as surprised as you!
loc.ru: I'm as surprised as you!

loc.ru: Could you <Lore>fetch more web pieces</Lore>? I heard that they've been seen in other Villagers' Houses.

loc.ru: Wonderful!

loc.ru: Okay, I know that YOU would like that...

loc.en: I like it, but I don't think the Arendellians do...
loc.ru: I like it, but I don't think the Arendellians do...

loc.ru: Sorry, the spiders have gotta go.

loc.ru: How do you... leave a message inside spiderwebs?

loc.en: WHAT?!

loc.en: No problem.

loc.en: I'll try, but spiderwebs are icky.
loc.ru: I'll try, but spiderwebs are icky.

loc.en: Just this once...
loc.ru: Just this once...

loc.en: How are our little spider friends?
loc.ru: How are our little spider friends?

loc.en: On my way to Anna's Castle to gather them up!
loc.ru: On my way to Anna's Castle to gather them up!

loc.en: How are the spiders? Hopefully, Anna's Castle isn't too cold for them...
loc.ru: How are the spiders? Hopefully, Anna's Castle isn't too cold for them...

loc.en: Well, I've removed them all from Anna's Castle. Just touching base with Kristoff next.
loc.ru: Well, I've removed them all from Anna's Castle. Just touching base with Kristoff next.

loc.en: Have you found more webs for me, {PlayerName}? The secret message awaits!
loc.ru: Have you found more webs for me, {PlayerName}? The secret message awaits!

loc.en: I know there are webs in other Houses too. I'll fetch those to make sure we get all of the pieces of the message.
loc.ru: I know there are webs in other Houses too. I'll fetch those to make sure we get all of the pieces of the message.

loc.en: Oh, I hope Sally is all right...
loc.ru: Oh, I hope Sally is all right...

loc.ru: Well, once I manage to make that potion for you, we'll find out!

loc.en: How is the <ActivityItem>Arachnid Rejuvenation Potion</ActivityItem> coming along, {PlayerName}?
loc.ru: How is the <ActivityItem>Arachnid Rejuvenation Potion</ActivityItem> coming along, {PlayerName}?

loc.en: Got all the Ingredients I need â about to craft it!
loc.ru: Got all the Ingredients I need â about to craft it!

loc.en: {PlayerName}! How fares the potion for our eight-legged friends?
loc.ru: {PlayerName}! How fares the potion for our eight-legged friends?

loc.en: All done! I'll bring it to your place in a moment.
loc.ru: All done! I'll bring it to your place in a moment.

loc.en: Whenever you're ready, toss the <ActivityItem>Arachnid Rejuvenation Potion</ActivityItem> into the cauldron.
loc.ru: Whenever you're ready, toss the <ActivityItem>Arachnid Rejuvenation Potion</ActivityItem> into the cauldron.

loc.en: Now that you've added the potion, we simply wait for them to bring Sally to us!
loc.ru: Now that you've added the potion, we simply wait for them to bring Sally to us!

loc.en: She's back! It worked! Thank you so much, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: She's back! It worked! Thank you so much, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: Happy to help! Let's make sure the transit was okay.
loc.ru: Happy to help! Let's make sure the transit was okay.

loc.en: Please, {PlayerName}; just a moment. I must say hello to Sally!
loc.ru: Please, {PlayerName}; just a moment. I must say hello to Sally!

loc.en: Of course!
loc.ru: Of course!

loc.en: Do you have the potion to help our spider friends?
loc.ru: Do you have the potion to help our spider friends?

loc.en: Yeah! Just... now where did I leave that potion?
loc.ru: Yeah! Just... now where did I leave that potion?

loc.en: Have you checked <Lore>Remy's, Vanellope's, and Mirabel's Houses</Lore> for more of our spider friends?
loc.ru: Have you checked <Lore>Remy's, Vanellope's, and Mirabel's Houses</Lore> for more of our spider friends?

loc.en: How are you feeling, Jack?
loc.ru: How are you feeling, Jack?

loc.en: Elated! Excited! Like it's Halloween Eve and energy is COURSING through me!
loc.ru: Elated! Excited! Like it's Halloween Eve and energy is COURSING through me!

loc.en: I couldn't be more so.
loc.ru: I couldn't be more so.

loc.en: Yes! The anticipation for all the frights, chills, tricks, and treats just grows and grows as midnight approaches before Halloween. Now then...
loc.ru: Yes! The anticipation for all the frights, chills, tricks, and treats just grows and grows as midnight approaches before Halloween. Now then...

loc.en: Oh, so many!
loc.ru: Oh, so many!

loc.en: Thank you, {PlayerName}. I didn't realize how much I missed Sally until the spiders arrived.
loc.ru: Thank you, {PlayerName}. I didn't realize how much I missed Sally until the spiders arrived.

loc.en: I'd been so busy throwing myself into my research.
loc.ru: I'd been so busy throwing myself into my research.

loc.en: But it will all be that much better now that I can share it with Sally!
loc.ru: But it will all be that much better now that I can share it with Sally!

loc.en: Thank you again. But please, check back later. I'm sure Sally would love some help settling in.
loc.ru: Thank you again. But please, check back later. I'm sure Sally would love some help settling in.

loc.en: Will do! Now you two love-bats have some fun together!
loc.ru: Will do! Now you two love-bats have some fun together!

loc.en: Well, I'm happy that you're happy.
loc.ru: Well, I'm happy that you're happy.

loc.en: Halloween Eve?
loc.ru: Halloween Eve?

loc.en: Bet you've got some plans in mind already!
loc.ru: Bet you've got some plans in mind already!

loc.en: Always happy to help a couple get back together!
loc.ru: Always happy to help a couple get back together!

loc.en: I'm happy that you're happy.
loc.ru: I'm happy that you're happy.

loc.en: I bet the two of you could use some space now.
loc.ru: I bet the two of you could use some space now.

loc.en: Now, to examine the webbing...
loc.ru: Now, to examine the webbing...

loc.en: Precisely!
loc.ru: Precisely!

loc.en: So do I, {PlayerName}...
loc.ru: So do I, {PlayerName}...

loc.en: I see. You don't like spiders?
loc.ru: I see. You don't like spiders?

loc.en: Nooooooooo.
loc.ru: Nooooooooo.

loc.en: Well, I'll tell them not to wander.
loc.ru: Well, I'll tell them not to wander.

loc.en: Isn't that wonderful?! Oh, but look â these poor spiders are quite tired. I suppose travel between worlds must be taxing.
loc.ru: Isn't that wonderful?! Oh, but look â these poor spiders are quite tired. I suppose travel between worlds must be taxing.

loc.en: Oh no! Is there anything I can do to help them feel better?
loc.ru: Oh no! Is there anything I can do to help them feel better?

loc.en: Hmm, let me think... Ah, yes! An <ActivityItem>Arachnid Rejuvenation Potion</ActivityItem>!
loc.ru: Hmm, let me think... Ah, yes! An <ActivityItem>Arachnid Rejuvenation Potion</ActivityItem>!

loc.en: After one of those, I'm certain the spiders will be eager to weave a portal bridging us to Sally.
loc.ru: After one of those, I'm certain the spiders will be eager to weave a portal bridging us to Sally.

loc.en: Well, let me get started then!
loc.ru: Well, let me get started then!

loc.en: Oh my! {PlayerName}... Sally sent these spiders!
loc.ru: Oh my! {PlayerName}... Sally sent these spiders!

loc.en: Not just amazing, it's inspired!
loc.ru: Not just amazing, it's inspired!

loc.en: There you go, Jack â all the remaining spider visitors and their web homes!
loc.ru: There you go, Jack â all the remaining spider visitors and their web homes!

loc.en: Well, come along, my little eight-legged friends. I'll set up a new home for you when I'm back in my lab.
loc.ru: Well, come along, my little eight-legged friends. I'll set up a new home for you when I'm back in my lab.

loc.en: Let me examine the message more closely...
loc.ru: Let me examine the message more closely...

loc.en: Ah yes, now I see the full message! It says...
loc.ru: Ah yes, now I see the full message! It says...

loc.en: "Dear Jack, These helpful spiders have promised to assist in making a portal to bring me to you, but they may need your help. Please give them whatever they need. I miss you! â Love, Sally"
loc.ru: "Dear Jack, These helpful spiders have promised to assist in making a portal to bring me to you, but they may need your help. Please give them whatever they need. I miss you! â Love, Sally"

loc.en: Incredible! So the spiders are going to make a portal to bring Sally here?
loc.ru: Incredible! So the spiders are going to make a portal to bring Sally here?

loc.en: It will match the dÃ©cor.
loc.ru: It will match the dÃ©cor.

loc.en: Hope you can read the full message now!
loc.ru: Hope you can read the full message now!

loc.en: Better there than my House.
loc.ru: Better there than my House.

loc.en: That's amazing!
loc.ru: That's amazing!

loc.en: Where could she be?
loc.ru: Where could she be?

loc.en: Is she going to come back to the Valley?
loc.ru: Is she going to come back to the Valley?

loc.en: Excellent! Now it just needs a little pinch of dried autumn leaves and a light dusting of powder from a death-moth's wings...
loc.ru: Excellent! Now it just needs a little pinch of dried autumn leaves and a light dusting of powder from a death-moth's wings...

loc.en: Here's the potion!
loc.ru: Here's the potion!

loc.en: And there we are! Now, I would never recommend feeding coffee to spiders...
loc.ru: And there we are! Now, I would never recommend feeding coffee to spiders...

loc.en: But this should have the same effect as coffee has on humans!
loc.ru: But this should have the same effect as coffee has on humans!

loc.en: Why don't you drop the potion into the cauldron I've prepared?
loc.ru: Why don't you drop the potion into the cauldron I've prepared?

loc.en: The solution inside it should waft rejuvenating vapors over our web-weaving friends!
loc.ru: The solution inside it should waft rejuvenating vapors over our web-weaving friends!

loc.en: Here you go, Jack.
loc.ru: Here you go, Jack.

loc.en: Perfect! Sally will love her new needle!
loc.ru: Perfect! Sally will love her new needle!

loc.en: Let's head over to see her now.
loc.ru: Let's head over to see her now.

loc.en: Hey, Jack! What are you up to?
loc.ru: Hey, Jack! What are you up to?

loc.en: {PlayerName}, it's fascinating! You must take a look. Here...
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, it's fascinating! You must take a look. Here...

loc.en: Some... rocks?
loc.ru: Some... rocks?

loc.en: But not just any rocks â a variant of flint! When you strike it, instead of sparks, you'll get a forlorn wail like the cry of a lost spirit.
loc.ru: But not just any rocks â a variant of flint! When you strike it, instead of sparks, you'll get a forlorn wail like the cry of a lost spirit.

loc.en: Why, thank you!
loc.ru: Why, thank you!

loc.en: Oh, it's merely an imitation. A little trick.
loc.ru: Oh, it's merely an imitation. A little trick.

loc.en: Not to worry. No actual ghosts are involved.
loc.ru: Not to worry. No actual ghosts are involved.

loc.en: I think I'll give it to Sally on our date. Is she ready?
loc.ru: I think I'll give it to Sally on our date. Is she ready?

loc.en: She's just finishing up. But she said there was something missing. She seemed unsure of herself in a way that doesn't feel usual at all.
loc.ru: She's just finishing up. But she said there was something missing. She seemed unsure of herself in a way that doesn't feel usual at all.

loc.en: Ahhh, I think I know the problem. Sally is naturally a bit shy. And I suspect she still feels out of sorts from being stuck in the holiday travel path for so long.
loc.ru: Ahhh, I think I know the problem. Sally is naturally a bit shy. And I suspect she still feels out of sorts from being stuck in the holiday travel path for so long.

loc.en: Oh no! What can we do to help?
loc.ru: Oh no! What can we do to help?

loc.en: I wonder... Yes, that could be it! If Sally's lost her favorite needle in her travels, she'd feel very out of sorts. She always keeps it with her for any repairs she might need.
loc.ru: I wonder... Yes, that could be it! If Sally's lost her favorite needle in her travels, she'd feel very out of sorts. She always keeps it with her for any repairs she might need.

loc.en: Can you grab me some <ActivityItem>Night Shards</ActivityItem>? I know she and I can make her a new needle out of them.
loc.ru: Can you grab me some <ActivityItem>Night Shards</ActivityItem>? I know she and I can make her a new needle out of them.

loc.en: And this one will be even better since it will contain the magic of the Shards. Then she can be assured that the ability to fix any rips or tears is right at her fingertips!
loc.ru: And this one will be even better since it will contain the magic of the Shards. Then she can be assured that the ability to fix any rips or tears is right at her fingertips!

loc.en: Sure, Jack! I'll head out now.
loc.ru: Sure, Jack! I'll head out now.

loc.en: Thank you, {PlayerName}. There are still a few wrinkles in the design of my phantom flint, and I could use a moment to iron them out.
loc.ru: Thank you, {PlayerName}. There are still a few wrinkles in the design of my phantom flint, and I could use a moment to iron them out.

loc.en: It suits you!
loc.ru: It suits you!

loc.en: Where did the spirit come from?
loc.ru: Where did the spirit come from?

loc.en: That's... pretty creepy.
loc.ru: That's... pretty creepy.

loc.en: Talk to Jack.
loc.ru: Talk to Jack.

loc.en: Strange spiderwebs have been appearing around the Valley. What could it mean?
loc.ru: Strange spiderwebs have been appearing around the Valley. What could it mean?

loc.en: With your help, Jack's scientific knowledge and the goodwill of some spiders, you successfully brought Sally back to the Valley!
loc.ru: With your help, Jack's scientific knowledge and the goodwill of some spiders, you successfully brought Sally back to the Valley!

loc.en: The spiderwebs contain a message from Sally â she's trying to return to the Valley! But the spiders will need a little jolt of energy before they can weave a portal to bring her back.
loc.ru: The spiderwebs contain a message from Sally â she's trying to return to the Valley! But the spiders will need a little jolt of energy before they can weave a portal to bring her back.

loc.ru: Place the <ActivityItem>Arachnid Rejuvenation Potion</ActivityItem> in the cauldron.

loc.en: Could that be... Sally?
loc.ru: Could that be... Sally?

loc.en: Talk to {TargetNPC} about her return to the Valley.
loc.ru: Talk to {TargetNPC} about her return to the Valley.

loc.en: Listen to Jack and Sally's reunion.
loc.ru: Listen to Jack and Sally's reunion.

loc.en: Okay Kristoff, I'm on the case of the spider infestation!
loc.ru: Okay Kristoff, I'm on the case of the spider infestation!

loc.en: That's great news! Thanks, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: That's great news! Thanks, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: They're kind of everywhere, and it's starting to make things pretty difficult.
loc.ru: They're kind of everywhere, and it's starting to make things pretty difficult.

loc.en: I was gonna make some chocolate cookies, but then I got worried that I'd set the webs on fire.
loc.ru: I was gonna make some chocolate cookies, but then I got worried that I'd set the webs on fire.

loc.en: Well, soon enough you should be fine to cook away to your heart's content!
loc.ru: Well, soon enough you should be fine to cook away to your heart's content!

loc.en: I really appreciate it. And you know, I've heard some other Villagers have also been having trouble with spiders.
loc.ru: I really appreciate it. And you know, I've heard some other Villagers have also been having trouble with spiders.

loc.en: Others too?! Wow, I should probably <Lore>fetch those for Jack as well</Lore>. Which Houses have been invaded?
loc.ru: Others too?! Wow, I should probably <Lore>fetch those for Jack as well</Lore>. Which Houses have been invaded?

loc.en: I think it's <Lore>Remy's, Vanellope's, and Mirabel's Houses</Lore>.
loc.ru: I think it's <Lore>Remy's, Vanellope's, and Mirabel's Houses</Lore>.

loc.en: Guess I have my next stops after I've spoken to Jack then!
loc.ru: Guess I have my next stops after I've spoken to Jack then!

loc.en: Hey Kristoff, do you have any good Valley cooking memories to share? I'm working on a project with Sally and the Fairy Godmother.
loc.ru: Hey Kristoff, do you have any good Valley cooking memories to share? I'm working on a project with Sally and the Fairy Godmother.

loc.en: Huh... Well, how about the time you pulled Donald out of that Dark Portal, and you made some <ActivityItem>Carrot Soap</ActivityItem>.
loc.ru: Huh... Well, how about the time you pulled Donald out of that Dark Portal, and you made some <ActivityItem>Carrot Soap</ActivityItem>.

loc.en: That's a good one! But uh... I guess I was looking for a food memory. I'll use carrots as inspiration, though!
loc.ru: That's a good one! But uh... I guess I was looking for a food memory. I'll use carrots as inspiration, though!

loc.en: Hey, anytime.
loc.ru: Hey, anytime.

loc.en: What? No! That would beâ ...
loc.ru: What? No! That would beâ ...

loc.en: *sigh* Okay, maybe I TRIED it. Just a little â to see if it tasted like carrots.
loc.ru: *sigh* Okay, maybe I TRIED it. Just a little â to see if it tasted like carrots.

loc.en: It didn't. It really, really didn't.
loc.ru: It didn't. It really, really didn't.

loc.en: Thanks for sharing, Kristoff!
loc.ru: Thanks for sharing, Kristoff!

loc.en: You didn't eat the soap, right?
loc.ru: You didn't eat the soap, right?

loc.en: Hey, Mickey! Sally, the Fairy Godmother, and I are putting together a party to show everyone our new sewing project. I'm in charge of food.
loc.ru: Hey, Mickey! Sally, the Fairy Godmother, and I are putting together a party to show everyone our new sewing project. I'm in charge of food.

loc.en: Do you have a favorite food memory here in the Valley?
loc.ru: Do you have a favorite food memory here in the Valley?

loc.en: Gosh, I have lots!
loc.ru: Gosh, I have lots!

loc.en: But one of my favorites was when you helped bring Minnie back from the Here and There.
loc.ru: But one of my favorites was when you helped bring Minnie back from the Here and There.

loc.en: We had a picnic to celebrate with <ActivityItem>Fish Sandwiches</ActivityItem>. That was the best sandwich and the best picnic I can remember!
loc.ru: We had a picnic to celebrate with <ActivityItem>Fish Sandwiches</ActivityItem>. That was the best sandwich and the best picnic I can remember!

loc.en: Gosh, that... that was close.
loc.ru: Gosh, that... that was close.

loc.en: I gotta thank you and Sally for saving us!
loc.ru: I gotta thank you and Sally for saving us!

loc.en: I don't wanna think about what kinda trouble we'd have been in if you two didn't show up.
loc.ru: I don't wanna think about what kinda trouble we'd have been in if you two didn't show up.

loc.en: Yeah. I'm fine now. But we'd have been in big trouble if you two hadn't been there.
loc.ru: Yeah. I'm fine now. But we'd have been in big trouble if you two hadn't been there.

loc.en: You bet! We'd have been in big trouble if you two hadn't been there.
loc.ru: You bet! We'd have been in big trouble if you two hadn't been there.

loc.en: Well, I'm happy that you're all right, Mickey.
loc.ru: Well, I'm happy that you're all right, Mickey.

loc.en: Talk to you later, okay?
loc.ru: Talk to you later, okay?

loc.en: Sure! And actually... could <Lore>you and Sally come by my House later</Lore>?
loc.ru: Sure! And actually... could <Lore>you and Sally come by my House later</Lore>?

loc.en: No problem!
loc.ru: No problem!

loc.en: Happy to help!
loc.ru: Happy to help!

loc.en: Are you all right?
loc.ru: Are you all right?

loc.en: Are you going to believe Sally next time?
loc.ru: Are you going to believe Sally next time?

loc.en: Hiya, {PlayerName}! How are ya?
loc.ru: Hiya, {PlayerName}! How are ya?

loc.en: Well, I'm actually coming to talk to you about something rather serious.
loc.ru: Well, I'm actually coming to talk to you about something rather serious.

loc.en: Uh-oh. What's the matter?
loc.ru: Uh-oh. What's the matter?

loc.en: Well... have you been in contact with Ursula at all recently?
loc.ru: Well... have you been in contact with Ursula at all recently?

loc.en: Actually, I have! It was kinda odd. She said she was getting a present ready for me.
loc.ru: Actually, I have! It was kinda odd. She said she was getting a present ready for me.

loc.en: Are ya sure?
loc.ru: Are ya sure?

loc.en: Oh. But I wouldn't wanna be rude for no reason.
loc.ru: Oh. But I wouldn't wanna be rude for no reason.

loc.en: Well, no. Presents are supposed to be a surprise.
loc.ru: Well, no. Presents are supposed to be a surprise.

loc.en: I'm gonna level with you, Mickey. Sally has been having visions, and we think that Ursula is up to something.
loc.ru: I'm gonna level with you, Mickey. Sally has been having visions, and we think that Ursula is up to something.

loc.en: Visions? Like... dreams?
loc.ru: Visions? Like... dreams?

loc.en: Sort of?
loc.ru: Sort of?

loc.en: Oh... Well, that doesn't mean whatever Sally saw is certain to come true, right?
loc.ru: Oh... Well, that doesn't mean whatever Sally saw is certain to come true, right?

loc.en: Seriously, Mickey, we're trying to warn you about something dire!
loc.ru: Seriously, Mickey, we're trying to warn you about something dire!

loc.en: Thanks, pal. It sure is nice of you and Sally to worry about me. But until we know something for sure, I don't wanna assume anything bad.
loc.ru: Thanks, pal. It sure is nice of you and Sally to worry about me. But until we know something for sure, I don't wanna assume anything bad.

loc.en: It's a trap!
loc.ru: It's a trap!

loc.en: I'd stay away from her for the time being...
loc.ru: I'd stay away from her for the time being...

loc.en: Do you know anything about this present?
loc.ru: Do you know anything about this present?

loc.en: You're not a raccoon!
loc.ru: You're not a raccoon!

loc.en: Mike?!
loc.ru: Mike?!

loc.en: No kidding!
loc.ru: No kidding!

loc.en: ...your auto-mat's broken! I'm stuck and I can't get out!
loc.ru: ...your auto-mat's broken! I'm stuck and I can't get out!

loc.en: Yeah? An automated food delivery machine? What do you call it?
loc.ru: Yeah? An automated food delivery machine? What do you call it?

loc.en: Oh no, clearly I want to stay here until the end of time.
loc.ru: Oh no, clearly I want to stay here until the end of time.

loc.en: Yes, I need help!
loc.ru: Yes, I need help!

loc.en: Again, no!
loc.ru: Again, no!

loc.en: Why do you keep telling me things I'm not?
loc.ru: Why do you keep telling me things I'm not?

loc.en: That's... not what this is.
loc.ru: That's... not what this is.

loc.en: Hold on a sec; let me get you out of there...
loc.ru: Hold on a sec; let me get you out of there...

loc.en: Ahh, much better. Thanks, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: Ahh, much better. Thanks, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: So, can you explain why you were nabbed trying to get into Sally's <ActivityItem>Compost Bin</ActivityItem>?
loc.ru: So, can you explain why you were nabbed trying to get into Sally's <ActivityItem>Compost Bin</ActivityItem>?

loc.en: Who said anything about compost? I'm here for the food!
loc.ru: Who said anything about compost? I'm here for the food!

loc.en: I was minding my own business when I picked up the delectable scent of some five-star seasoning!
loc.ru: I was minding my own business when I picked up the delectable scent of some five-star seasoning!

loc.en: It's clearly the best flavoring available in the Valley. Though I have no idea why it was completely unattended.
loc.ru: It's clearly the best flavoring available in the Valley. Though I have no idea why it was completely unattended.

loc.en: It was just sittin' there, so I thought I'd help myself. But then... well, I was trapped.
loc.ru: It was just sittin' there, so I thought I'd help myself. But then... well, I was trapped.

loc.en: Okay, I think I see the problem here. This is not a dispenser for seasoning!
loc.ru: Okay, I think I see the problem here. This is not a dispenser for seasoning!

loc.en: ... You feeling all right, {PlayerName}? There is clearly fabulous seasoning inside that container, and I'm NOT supposed to eat it?!
loc.ru: ... You feeling all right, {PlayerName}? There is clearly fabulous seasoning inside that container, and I'm NOT supposed to eat it?!

loc.en: Oof, okay, maybe Sally should explain this to you...
loc.ru: Oof, okay, maybe Sally should explain this to you...

loc.en: You mean the seasoning. And yeah. Why wouldn't I?
loc.ru: You mean the seasoning. And yeah. Why wouldn't I?

loc.en: Yes, very dirt forward! And yet, with notes of rot and vegetable miasma.
loc.ru: Yes, very dirt forward! And yet, with notes of rot and vegetable miasma.

loc.en: I agree! It's like you don't know me at all...
loc.ru: I agree! It's like you don't know me at all...

loc.en: You're not a raven!
loc.ru: You're not a raven!

loc.en: You're not a turtle!
loc.ru: You're not a turtle!

loc.en: But more importantly...
loc.ru: But more importantly...

loc.en: ... Auto-mat?
loc.ru: ... Auto-mat?

loc.en: Do you need some help?
loc.ru: Do you need some help?

loc.en: You're not a critter!
loc.ru: You're not a critter!

loc.en: You're... EATING the compost?
loc.ru: You're... EATING the compost?

loc.en: Smells kinda like dirt to me.
loc.ru: Smells kinda like dirt to me.

loc.en: I should have known...
loc.ru: I should have known...

loc.en: You know, some <ActivityItem>Candy Apples</ActivityItem> would also be a fun Halloween-y treat.
loc.ru: You know, some <ActivityItem>Candy Apples</ActivityItem> would also be a fun Halloween-y treat.

loc.en: Hey, Minnie! Can I get some advice about rekindling a romance?
loc.ru: Hey, Minnie! Can I get some advice about rekindling a romance?

loc.en: Certainly! I'd love to help.
loc.ru: Certainly! I'd love to help.

loc.en: What seems to be the trouble?
loc.ru: What seems to be the trouble?

loc.en: Well, Jack and Sally have spent a lot of time apart and need something to connect them again.
loc.ru: Well, Jack and Sally have spent a lot of time apart and need something to connect them again.

loc.en: I'm trying to help them plan a fun date, but well... those two aren't your typical romantics.
loc.ru: I'm trying to help them plan a fun date, but well... those two aren't your typical romantics.

loc.en: Yes, I see what you mean. Let me think for a moment...
loc.ru: Yes, I see what you mean. Let me think for a moment...

loc.en: Oh! I have an idea!
loc.ru: Oh! I have an idea!

loc.en: Mickey and I always feel close when we share an experience. What if you make them a tasty treat to share?
loc.ru: Mickey and I always feel close when we share an experience. What if you make them a tasty treat to share?

loc.en: I have a lovely recipe for <Lore>Gingerbread Cookies</Lore> that you're welcome to use.
loc.ru: I have a lovely recipe for <Lore>Gingerbread Cookies</Lore> that you're welcome to use.

loc.en: That's a great idea!
loc.ru: That's a great idea!

loc.en: Daisy gave me similar advice. She suggested that I make something in a Halloween-themed shape.
loc.ru: Daisy gave me similar advice. She suggested that I make something in a Halloween-themed shape.

loc.en: I think getting some more Halloween-themed foods and arranging a picnic should be perfect!
loc.ru: I think getting some more Halloween-themed foods and arranging a picnic should be perfect!

loc.en: Oh, they'll love it! And, you know, some <ActivityItem>Candy Apples</ActivityItem> would go wonderfully with that.
loc.ru: Oh, they'll love it! And, you know, some <ActivityItem>Candy Apples</ActivityItem> would go wonderfully with that.

loc.en: Thanks, Minnie. I'm going to ask Daisy too, but this is excellent advice.
loc.ru: Thanks, Minnie. I'm going to ask Daisy too, but this is excellent advice.

loc.en: I'm always happy to help!
loc.ru: I'm always happy to help!

loc.en: Ooo! I have one last idea! If you really want to make the date special, you can have Sally and Jack <Lore>gather by the Holiday Tree Portal</Lore> that Jack first came through!
loc.ru: Ooo! I have one last idea! If you really want to make the date special, you can have Sally and Jack <Lore>gather by the Holiday Tree Portal</Lore> that Jack first came through!

loc.en: Hey Minnie? What do you think of Sally's ideas?
loc.ru: Hey Minnie? What do you think of Sally's ideas?

loc.en: They're so wonderfully chilling! Even if we don't collaborate on a collection right NOW, I think we should work together on a Halloween project soon!
loc.ru: They're so wonderfully chilling! Even if we don't collaborate on a collection right NOW, I think we should work together on a Halloween project soon!

loc.en: Me too! Oh, this makes me want to start pulling swatches for orange already!
loc.ru: Me too! Oh, this makes me want to start pulling swatches for orange already!

loc.en: I'm glad you agree.
loc.ru: I'm glad you agree.

loc.en: I'll add it to my design bulletin board right now!
loc.ru: I'll add it to my design bulletin board right now!

loc.en: That's a great idea!
loc.ru: That's a great idea!

loc.en: I love it!
loc.ru: I love it!

loc.en: Dots and daisies and spiders!
loc.ru: Dots and daisies and spiders!

loc.en: I've never been so excited by potato peels!
loc.ru: I've never been so excited by potato peels!

loc.en: They're... not already rotting, are they?
loc.ru: They're... not already rotting, are they?

loc.en: Do I get paid as your new garbage-removal person?
loc.ru: Do I get paid as your new garbage-removal person?

loc.en: Hey Remy, got a bit of an unusual question for you.
loc.ru: Hey Remy, got a bit of an unusual question for you.

loc.en: Sure, {PlayerName}. What's up?
loc.ru: Sure, {PlayerName}. What's up?

loc.en: I'm helping Sally build a <ActivityItem>Compost Bin</ActivityItem>, and we need some <ActivityItem>Vegetable Trimmings</ActivityItem> to get things going.
loc.ru: I'm helping Sally build a <ActivityItem>Compost Bin</ActivityItem>, and we need some <ActivityItem>Vegetable Trimmings</ActivityItem> to get things going.

loc.en: Do you have any that we could take off of your hands?
loc.ru: Do you have any that we could take off of your hands?

loc.en: Absolutely!
loc.ru: Absolutely!

loc.en: Don't get me wrong, {PlayerName} â I do my best to reduce food waste here.
loc.ru: Don't get me wrong, {PlayerName} â I do my best to reduce food waste here.

loc.en: But even at my most efficient, I still end up with piles of rinds, skins, and produce trimmings.
loc.ru: But even at my most efficient, I still end up with piles of rinds, skins, and produce trimmings.

loc.en: Here you go. <ActivityItem>Vegetable Trimmings</ActivityItem> for you and Sally!
loc.ru: Here you go. <ActivityItem>Vegetable Trimmings</ActivityItem> for you and Sally!

loc.en: Awesome, thanks Remy!
loc.ru: Awesome, thanks Remy!

loc.en: There are actually a lot of things you can do with potato skins in the kitchen.
loc.ru: There are actually a lot of things you can do with potato skins in the kitchen.

loc.en: No, no. These are just from the last day or so.
loc.ru: No, no. These are just from the last day or so.

loc.en: But these carrot skins and other stuff are all yours.
loc.ru: But these carrot skins and other stuff are all yours.

loc.en: Sure! As long as you're happy getting paid in food.
loc.ru: Sure! As long as you're happy getting paid in food.

loc.ru: And I you! My heart was emptier than a carved pumpkin.

loc.ru: But I'm back now. I hope we can spend some time together.

loc.ru: Don't you worry. I have so much to show you!

loc.ru: Hey there, Sally! Need to do some shopping?

loc.ru: Gawrsh. I can help with the salt and pepper, but I don't carry that other stuff. Sorry.

loc.ru: Do you mean potions? Like deadly nightshade?

loc.ru: Yes. Let us discuss... potions.

loc.ru: Merlin, you've seen the future, haven't you?

loc.ru: Yes, my dear. You see, I've been there.

loc.ru: I believe you have a bit of future knowledge as well, don't you?

loc.ru: Perhaps you have. Or perhaps you will! Heh-heh.

loc.ru: Mike, you were eating the compost?

loc.ru: Yeah, it's great on sushi, burgers, salads â you name it! My compliments to the chef!

loc.ru: But Mike... I need that compost for my garden. My plants won't grow without it.

loc.ru: Wait... you're telling me you're NOT eating this?!

loc.ru: No. It's fine if you want a bit of it, but please leave some for the garden too.

loc.ru: Okay. Your loss. But sure, I can share!

loc.ru: You come from a place... made of candy?

loc.ru: Sure do!

loc.ru: May I ask... are you made of candy as well?

loc.ru: Nope! I'm all bits and bytes. What about you?

loc.ru: Oh you know, leaves, thread, fabric...

loc.ru: Is everything all right, Woody?

loc.ru: Well, I snagged my arm on a bramble. I could use a stitch or two.

loc.ru: Wait here. I'll get my tiniest needle and thread!

loc.ru: Just a moment, Sheriff.

loc.ru: Could you make a costume?

loc.en: Could you repair something?
loc.ru: Could you repair something?

loc.en: I think so. I certainly get a lot of practice.
loc.ru: I think so. I certainly get a lot of practice.

loc.ru: Yes. I've made many costumes. Most of them for Jack.

loc.ru: I would offer to make something for you, but I know you don't need help.

loc.ru: Your wardrobe is already so impressive.

loc.ru: Certainly. I'm very good at repairing tears in... well, anything.

loc.ru: Please let me know if you'd like anything fixed.

loc.ru: Is it scary?

loc.en: Is it useful?
loc.ru: Is it useful?

loc.en: Can you tell my fortune?
loc.ru: Can you tell my fortune?

loc.en: Oh. I don't... well, not exactly.
loc.ru: Oh. I don't... well, not exactly.

loc.en: Sometimes I have visions that show me things that might happen.
loc.ru: Sometimes I have visions that show me things that might happen.

loc.en: At times. Sometimes it's sad. Sometimes it's worrying.
loc.ru: At times. Sometimes it's sad. Sometimes it's worrying.

loc.en: Not as useful as I'd like. Often, people won't listen.
loc.ru: Not as useful as I'd like. Often, people won't listen.

loc.en: I've never been able to command the visions.
loc.ru: I've never been able to command the visions.

loc.en: And sometimes it's hopeful.
loc.ru: And sometimes it's hopeful.

loc.en: It can be anything the future can be, I suppose.
loc.ru: It can be anything the future can be, I suppose.

loc.en: But Jack promised the next time I saw something, he would believe me.
loc.ru: But Jack promised the next time I saw something, he would believe me.

loc.en: I hope that means I can help him.
loc.ru: I hope that means I can help him.

loc.en: But if I see anything that's about you, I'll be sure to tell you.
loc.ru: But if I see anything that's about you, I'll be sure to tell you.

loc.ru: Are you okay?

loc.ru: Does it hurt?

loc.ru: That seems inconvenient.

loc.ru: Am I? Oh, one of my arm threads must have caught on something.

loc.en: It's not that bad. I can fix it.
loc.ru: It's not that bad. I can fix it.

loc.ru: I'll be fine. But thank you for asking. And for pointing it out.

loc.ru: No. Not at all. It just feels a little loose.

loc.en: It's not that bad. Everyone has little things they have to deal with.
loc.ru: It's not that bad. Everyone has little things they have to deal with.

loc.ru: If you hadn't said anything, my arm might have come completely unstitched.

loc.en: And I can fix it in a moment with a needle and thread.
loc.ru: And I can fix it in a moment with a needle and thread.

loc.ru: Luckily, I'm handy with a needle and thread.

loc.ru: Are you in love?

loc.ru: Summer is a delight.

loc.ru: ...you could put up some bat boxes or perhaps build a belfry to invite some new winged friends.

loc.ru: I'm so glad he found happiness with himself as the Pumpkin King again.

loc.ru: But I think we all crave a little change now and then. So I understand why it interested him so much.

loc.en: That's wonderful. You DO keep things interesting here.
loc.ru: That's wonderful. You DO keep things interesting here.

loc.ru: I understand. The unknown can be rather daunting. I've found it helps to have a friend along. So know that you can always come to me.

loc.ru: I love decorating there!

loc.en: They're too gloomy for me.
loc.ru: They're too gloomy for me.

loc.ru: They speak to my soul.

loc.ru: Well, I suppose I feel most at home in the Forgotten Lands.

loc.ru: I love visiting with the Fairy Godmother. We discuss sewing, and she serves the most delicious pumpkin tea.

loc.ru: I understand. After Jack returned from Christmas Town, we learned that everyone has different tastes.

loc.ru: Basically, the clouds get saturated with teeny water droplets. The droplets bump into each other and join together, getting bigger and bigger until...

loc.ru: ...they get too heavy to stay in the clouds and they fall. Rain!

loc.ru: Well, thank you to you and Jack!

loc.ru: I'm so glad that the spiders I sent were able to give you the message.

loc.ru: I helped a bit too.
