loc.ru: I thought you'd like it!

loc.en: Daisy will be happy!
loc.ru: Daisy will be happy!

loc.en: To each their own...
loc.ru: To each their own...

loc.en: I am. Shall we go?
loc.ru: I am. Shall we go?

loc.en: Okay, there you are â some nice treats for you and Jack! What do you think?
loc.ru: Okay, there you are â some nice treats for you and Jack! What do you think?

loc.en: They're perfect. The skull-shaped cookies are a wonderful reminder of when we were together in Halloween Town. Our friend Wolfman is a very good baker, and he makes ones that look just like this.
loc.ru: They're perfect. The skull-shaped cookies are a wonderful reminder of when we were together in Halloween Town. Our friend Wolfman is a very good baker, and he makes ones that look just like this.

loc.en: So, are you now feeling ready for a frighteningly lovely date with Jack?
loc.ru: So, are you now feeling ready for a frighteningly lovely date with Jack?

loc.en: Made sure not to touch my bare skin with it.
loc.ru: Made sure not to touch my bare skin with it.

loc.en: I live on the edge, Sally.
loc.ru: I live on the edge, Sally.

loc.en: I think my Dreamlight Magic protects me.
loc.ru: I think my Dreamlight Magic protects me.

loc.en: One bundle of deadly nightshade, as ordered!
loc.ru: One bundle of deadly nightshade, as ordered!

loc.en: Oh, thank you! I hope you were careful when harvesting it.
loc.ru: Oh, thank you! I hope you were careful when harvesting it.

loc.en: Good. My cloth is immune, but I wasn't sure about you.
loc.ru: Good. My cloth is immune, but I wasn't sure about you.

loc.en: Well, I hope you have excellent balance.
loc.ru: Well, I hope you have excellent balance.

loc.en: That's good. I was worried.
loc.ru: That's good. I was worried.

loc.en: Oh... This is just what I needed. It will make a lovely perfume.
loc.ru: Oh... This is just what I needed. It will make a lovely perfume.

loc.en: Somehow, I always feel more confident when I wear it.
loc.ru: Somehow, I always feel more confident when I wear it.

loc.en: I'm happy that you're happy.
loc.ru: I'm happy that you're happy.

loc.en: Now, do you think you could get Jack for me? He gets so lost in his experiments sometimes...
loc.ru: Now, do you think you could get Jack for me? He gets so lost in his experiments sometimes...

loc.en: Sure! What are you going to do in the meantime?
loc.ru: Sure! What are you going to do in the meantime?

loc.en: Well, I need to make the perfume and get ready. And there's one more thing... I have this aching feeling that something's still missing. I feel nervous â yet excited? I wonder why that is...
loc.ru: Well, I need to make the perfume and get ready. And there's one more thing... I have this aching feeling that something's still missing. I feel nervous â yet excited? I wonder why that is...

loc.en: Okay, while you think about that, I'll pay Jack a visit and yank him out of whatever science he's currently up to his neck bones in.
loc.ru: Okay, while you think about that, I'll pay Jack a visit and yank him out of whatever science he's currently up to his neck bones in.

loc.en: I would be delighted!
loc.ru: I would be delighted!

loc.en: In the middle of something, but I'll come back later!
loc.ru: In the middle of something, but I'll come back later!

loc.en: Well, I do always feel better when I wear deadly nightshade perfume. But I've had trouble growing deadly nightshade here. There's something about the soil...
loc.ru: Well, I do always feel better when I wear deadly nightshade perfume. But I've had trouble growing deadly nightshade here. There's something about the soil...

loc.en: I can give you a hand with that!
loc.ru: I can give you a hand with that!

loc.en: But it's been so long... Do you think you could help me plan a special date for us?
loc.ru: But it's been so long... Do you think you could help me plan a special date for us?

loc.en: Hey Sally, what's up?
loc.ru: Hey Sally, what's up?

loc.en: Well, I was hoping... now that I'm back... that I could reconnect with Jack.
loc.ru: Well, I was hoping... now that I'm back... that I could reconnect with Jack.

loc.en: So how can I help?
loc.ru: So how can I help?

loc.en: Try to avoid touching them with your bare hands. It can be poisonous to some.
loc.ru: Try to avoid touching them with your bare hands. It can be poisonous to some.

loc.en: It's been AGES since Jack and I had a proper date...
loc.ru: It's been AGES since Jack and I had a proper date...

loc.en: And I missed him terribly. But... I'm a little hesitant. I spent so much time alone that I feel awkward around others again.
loc.ru: And I missed him terribly. But... I'm a little hesitant. I spent so much time alone that I feel awkward around others again.

loc.en: Ahhh, no problem; let's get your gothic groove back!
loc.ru: Ahhh, no problem; let's get your gothic groove back!

loc.en: Is there something that made you feel more confident in the past?
loc.ru: Is there something that made you feel more confident in the past?

loc.en: Oh, thank you, {PlayerName}! Once planted, the deadly nightshade seedlings should take about 15 minutes to properly sprout.
loc.ru: Oh, thank you, {PlayerName}! Once planted, the deadly nightshade seedlings should take about 15 minutes to properly sprout.

loc.en: Sally, dearest, I have a gift for you. We can use them to make you a new needle!
loc.ru: Sally, dearest, I have a gift for you. We can use them to make you a new needle!

loc.en: ...or you lose your limbs, and if you didn't have your favorite needle, you'd...
loc.ru: ...or you lose your limbs, and if you didn't have your favorite needle, you'd...

loc.en: {PlayerName} said you were feeling unsure. So, I assumed that was because of how often your seams get ripped...
loc.ru: {PlayerName} said you were feeling unsure. So, I assumed that was because of how often your seams get ripped...

loc.en: "How often"? Are you saying I'm clumsy, Jack?
loc.ru: "How often"? Are you saying I'm clumsy, Jack?

loc.en: Well, you must admit that you do end up in pieces rather frequently.
loc.ru: Well, you must admit that you do end up in pieces rather frequently.

loc.en: Yes... When I'm trying to help you. I jumped out of the tower just to bring you dinner.
loc.ru: Yes... When I'm trying to help you. I jumped out of the tower just to bring you dinner.

loc.en: That WAS you! Oh Sally, don't you see, when you have the new needle, your brave feats can continue without worry.
loc.ru: That WAS you! Oh Sally, don't you see, when you have the new needle, your brave feats can continue without worry.

loc.en: You want me to jump out of another tower for you?!
loc.ru: You want me to jump out of another tower for you?!

loc.en: No, no, that's not what I meant! I just thought... Oh dear.
loc.ru: No, no, that's not what I meant! I just thought... Oh dear.

loc.en: Shall we get this date started properly?
loc.ru: Shall we get this date started properly?

loc.en: I'd like that very much.
loc.ru: I'd like that very much.

loc.en: Thank you, Jack. I suppose we're both just a little unsure around each other after being apart for so long.
loc.ru: Thank you, Jack. I suppose we're both just a little unsure around each other after being apart for so long.

loc.en: Sally, my dearest, I'm so sorry about before. I have the utmost respect for you, and I would never want to hurt you.
loc.ru: Sally, my dearest, I'm so sorry about before. I have the utmost respect for you, and I would never want to hurt you.

loc.ru: Oh, Jack! This is the most romantic thing you've ever given me... That wail is so chilling.

loc.en: Sally, I care for you so much. Remember how close we were when we used to sit on Spiral Hill and gaze up at the night sky?
loc.ru: Sally, I care for you so much. Remember how close we were when we used to sit on Spiral Hill and gaze up at the night sky?

loc.en: I do, Jack. I remember just how that felt. Like we simply belonged together.
loc.ru: I do, Jack. I remember just how that felt. Like we simply belonged together.

loc.ru: You're right. And to celebrate our reunion, I've made you this...

loc.ru: I hope the other Villagers have some good advice.

loc.ru: Oh, they're the best! I'll be back soon once I'm done.

loc.ru: Did you get some good suggestions, {PlayerName}?

loc.ru: I did! It's gonna be a surprise, but I'll give you a hint â I'm baking it now.

loc.en: Oh, I hope Jack and I can find an ease with each other again...
loc.ru: Oh, I hope Jack and I can find an ease with each other again...

loc.en: Let me go grab your surprise, and then I'm sure your romance will be burning bright!
loc.ru: Let me go grab your surprise, and then I'm sure your romance will be burning bright!

loc.ru: Have you ever smelled deadly nightshade perfume? It's lovely...

loc.ru: Well, let me cultivate some for you and I can give it a whiff!

loc.ru: Is Jack ready for our date?

loc.en: You know, he probably got distracted trying to extract holiday magic from a snow globe or something. I'll go fetch him.
loc.ru: You know, he probably got distracted trying to extract holiday magic from a snow globe or something. I'll go fetch him.

loc.ru: Oh, I just can't seem to put myself together for my date with Jack...

loc.ru: Hang in there. I'll be back soon with something that should get you feeling back to normal!

loc.ru: Oh, do you think I'm ready?

loc.ru: Totally! Let's go find Jack!

loc.ru: I'm still a little nervous...

loc.en: Maybe just try to let things come naturally.
loc.ru: Maybe just try to let things come naturally.

loc.ru: We're having a wonderful time. Thank you, {PlayerName}. Could you take a picture of us so we can remember this moment?

loc.en: Of course!
loc.ru: Of course!

loc.en: I hope the deadly nightshade is growing well here.
loc.ru: I hope the deadly nightshade is growing well here.

loc.en: The harvest was great! I'll be back with it for you soon.
loc.ru: The harvest was great! I'll be back with it for you soon.

loc.en: Did you find a good place for our picnic?
loc.ru: Did you find a good place for our picnic?

loc.en: Give me a moment. I want to find the PERFECT spot.
loc.ru: Give me a moment. I want to find the PERFECT spot.

loc.en: Perfect!
loc.ru: Perfect!

loc.en: You two are so iconic.
loc.ru: You two are so iconic.

loc.en: Spark re-ignited!
loc.ru: Spark re-ignited!

loc.en: How are you feeling, Sally?
loc.ru: How are you feeling, Sally?

loc.en: Much better. Thank you. It's like I'm back in the moonlight on Spiral Hill with Jack.
loc.ru: Much better. Thank you. It's like I'm back in the moonlight on Spiral Hill with Jack.

loc.en: Jack may have a bit of a Dreamlight aura now, but he's still the same skeleton I fell in love with.
loc.ru: Jack may have a bit of a Dreamlight aura now, but he's still the same skeleton I fell in love with.

loc.en: Thank you. I think?
loc.ru: Thank you. I think?

loc.en: Oh, yes.
loc.ru: Oh, yes.

loc.en: I was worried for a moment, but you helped put those fears to rest.
loc.ru: I was worried for a moment, but you helped put those fears to rest.

loc.en: That's what I'm here for!
loc.ru: That's what I'm here for!

loc.en: Now, I think the two of you have a date to enjoy, so I'll give you some space.
loc.ru: Now, I think the two of you have a date to enjoy, so I'll give you some space.

loc.en: Goodbye, {PlayerName}. Thank you again.
loc.ru: Goodbye, {PlayerName}. Thank you again.

loc.ru: Whoa, slow down there.

loc.en: I don't think it's that serious...
loc.ru: I don't think it's that serious...

loc.en: Okay, that whole thing was awkward.
loc.ru: Okay, that whole thing was awkward.

loc.en: *sigh* It's never been so difficult for me to talk to Jack before.
loc.ru: *sigh* It's never been so difficult for me to talk to Jack before.

loc.en: Why is it hard now? What if this is a bad sign?
loc.ru: Why is it hard now? What if this is a bad sign?

loc.en: Clearly, you're both just feeling a little awkward.
loc.ru: Clearly, you're both just feeling a little awkward.

loc.en: But that's nobody's fault, and I'm going to help you both out, okay?
loc.ru: But that's nobody's fault, and I'm going to help you both out, okay?

loc.en: Thank you, {PlayerName}. I'm getting worried that maybe we've lost our... connection.
loc.ru: Thank you, {PlayerName}. I'm getting worried that maybe we've lost our... connection.

loc.en: No way! And you wouldn't be the first couple here that needed some help. Everyone does from time to time.
loc.ru: No way! And you wouldn't be the first couple here that needed some help. Everyone does from time to time.

loc.en: How about if I go talk to some of the other Villagers? Maybe they have some suggestions for how you two can reconnect.
loc.ru: How about if I go talk to some of the other Villagers? Maybe they have some suggestions for how you two can reconnect.

loc.en: That's very kind of you, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: That's very kind of you, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: That's what I'm here for! Now I bet <Lore>Daisy and Minnie</Lore> would both be overjoyed to give some suggestions here. I'll go <Lore>talk to them</Lore>!
loc.ru: That's what I'm here for! Now I bet <Lore>Daisy and Minnie</Lore> would both be overjoyed to give some suggestions here. I'll go <Lore>talk to them</Lore>!

loc.en: More spiders!
loc.ru: More spiders!

loc.en: Pumpkin carving?
loc.ru: Pumpkin carving?

loc.en: A visit from Santa?
loc.ru: A visit from Santa?

loc.en: Well, that seemed to go better than last time!
loc.ru: Well, that seemed to go better than last time!

loc.en: It did! But we need one last thing to enjoy our date...
loc.ru: It did! But we need one last thing to enjoy our date...

loc.en: No. Not this time. But thank you.
loc.ru: No. Not this time. But thank you.

loc.en: Not this time, but that's a very good idea for next time.
loc.ru: Not this time, but that's a very good idea for next time.

loc.en: Oh, certainly not!
loc.ru: Oh, certainly not!

loc.en: There's a <ActivityItem>Halloween Picnic Kit</ActivityItem> that Mickey gave me. I think it would be perfect to mark the spot of our date.
loc.ru: There's a <ActivityItem>Halloween Picnic Kit</ActivityItem> that Mickey gave me. I think it would be perfect to mark the spot of our date.

loc.en: Sure!
loc.ru: Sure!

loc.en: Do you think you could <Lore>find a good spot for it near the Holiday Tree Portal<Lore>?
loc.ru: Do you think you could <Lore>find a good spot for it near the Holiday Tree Portal<Lore>?

loc.en: {PlayerName}, the bin looks like it will work perfectly.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, the bin looks like it will work perfectly.

loc.en: Jack has been showing me the Mines, and I think we've found a very good spot for it.
loc.ru: Jack has been showing me the Mines, and I think we've found a very good spot for it.

loc.en: It has the right ambient temperature and humidity.
loc.ru: It has the right ambient temperature and humidity.

loc.en: Awesome! Lead the way!
loc.ru: Awesome! Lead the way!

loc.en: Gotta be a raccoon.
loc.ru: Gotta be a raccoon.

loc.en: Maybe a raven?
loc.ru: Maybe a raven?

loc.en: I'd laugh if it was a turtle.
loc.ru: I'd laugh if it was a turtle.

loc.en: There you go, Sally. One prime <ActivityItem>Critter Trap</ActivityItem>!
loc.ru: There you go, Sally. One prime <ActivityItem>Critter Trap</ActivityItem>!

loc.en: Thank you! Now we just have to place it...
loc.ru: Thank you! Now we just have to place it...

loc.en: There. That should help us find our troublesome visitor.
loc.ru: There. That should help us find our troublesome visitor.

loc.en: Do you have any ideas which kind of animal is after the compost?
loc.ru: Do you have any ideas which kind of animal is after the compost?

loc.en: That makes sense. I have heard that they like to dig in trash and rubbish.
loc.ru: That makes sense. I have heard that they like to dig in trash and rubbish.

loc.en: Hmm, they do like to scavenge things...
loc.ru: Hmm, they do like to scavenge things...

loc.en: So far from Dazzle Beach? That would be rather odd.
loc.ru: So far from Dazzle Beach? That would be rather odd.

loc.en: Well, we won't catch anything by staying here.
loc.ru: Well, we won't catch anything by staying here.

loc.en: I'm going to work on refilling the bin. Could you help me fetch some <ActivityItem>worms</ActivityItem>?
loc.ru: I'm going to work on refilling the bin. Could you help me fetch some <ActivityItem>worms</ActivityItem>?

loc.en: Sure! But... why?
loc.ru: Sure! But... why?

loc.en: Oh, worms love compost! They eat it, and that helps make soil quicker.
loc.ru: Oh, worms love compost! They eat it, and that helps make soil quicker.

loc.en: I'm sure you'll find some if you <Lore>dig in the Glade of Trust</Lore>.
loc.ru: I'm sure you'll find some if you <Lore>dig in the Glade of Trust</Lore>.

loc.en: Cool, I'll start looking.
loc.ru: Cool, I'll start looking.

loc.en: I'm happy for the worms!
loc.ru: I'm happy for the worms!

loc.en: Phew, you had me worried there.
loc.ru: Phew, you had me worried there.

loc.en: Better them than me. I like my home free of worm food.
loc.ru: Better them than me. I like my home free of worm food.

loc.en: Oh... {PlayerName}...
loc.ru: Oh... {PlayerName}...

loc.en: Is it okay? Did I bring you the right worms?
loc.ru: Is it okay? Did I bring you the right worms?

loc.en: Yes, these will do nicely. I think they'll like their new home. It's filled with worm food!
loc.ru: Yes, these will do nicely. I think they'll like their new home. It's filled with worm food!

loc.en: Just wait. After a night in the compost, they'll be the happiest and healthiest worms you've ever seen.
loc.ru: Just wait. After a night in the compost, they'll be the happiest and healthiest worms you've ever seen.

loc.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
loc.ru: Oh, I'm sorry.

loc.en: *giggle* So do I. But we won't tell them that.
loc.ru: *giggle* So do I. But we won't tell them that.

loc.en: Why don't you <Lore>meet me in the Vitalys Mines</Lore>? We can introduce the worms to their new home and see if our trap caught anything.
loc.ru: Why don't you <Lore>meet me in the Vitalys Mines</Lore>? We can introduce the worms to their new home and see if our trap caught anything.

loc.en: Sure!
loc.ru: Sure!

loc.en: Absolutely!
loc.ru: Absolutely!

loc.en: Uhh, lemme go think about that for a while...
loc.ru: Uhh, lemme go think about that for a while...

loc.en: Cool, what kind of herbs?
loc.ru: Cool, what kind of herbs?

loc.en: The deadly nightshade wasn't enough?
loc.ru: The deadly nightshade wasn't enough?

loc.en: Do they grow here easily?
loc.ru: Do they grow here easily?

loc.en: Hey Sally, what's going on?
loc.ru: Hey Sally, what's going on?

loc.en: {PlayerName}, I was wondering... would you consider yourself an experimental gardener?
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, I was wondering... would you consider yourself an experimental gardener?

loc.en: What kind of experimental gardening have you been thinking about?
loc.ru: What kind of experimental gardening have you been thinking about?

loc.en: Well, I've seen the lovely gardening projects the other Villagers have...
loc.ru: Well, I've seen the lovely gardening projects the other Villagers have...

loc.en: ...and I thought it would be nice to cultivate some more herbs from Halloween Town.
loc.ru: ...and I thought it would be nice to cultivate some more herbs from Halloween Town.

loc.en: Oh, maybe some henbane, witch hazel, a little worm's wort...
loc.ru: Oh, maybe some henbane, witch hazel, a little worm's wort...

loc.en: Well, it's nice to have other flavors for balance and some herbs have other uses. Also, deadly nightshade isn't good for everyone. Besides, a few more herbs would bring more of a Halloween touch to the Valley.
loc.ru: Well, it's nice to have other flavors for balance and some herbs have other uses. Also, deadly nightshade isn't good for everyone. Besides, a few more herbs would bring more of a Halloween touch to the Valley.

loc.en: Unfortunately, no...
loc.ru: Unfortunately, no...

loc.en: I tried growing the herbs myself, but they don't seem to want to grow the way they would back home.
loc.ru: I tried growing the herbs myself, but they don't seem to want to grow the way they would back home.

loc.en: Oh no! Do they need some kind of special treatment to grow properly?
loc.ru: Oh no! Do they need some kind of special treatment to grow properly?

loc.en: Perhaps. I do know that the soil in Halloween Town is naturally more rich than the soil here.
loc.ru: Perhaps. I do know that the soil in Halloween Town is naturally more rich than the soil here.

loc.ru: Please ask her about making a quilt. While you do that, I'm going to borrow a few things from Minnie and Daisy.

loc.ru: This place is so magical. I'd love to learn from someone who understands the magic here.

loc.ru: And perhaps we could even get a third person to join us.

loc.ru: I'm so glad. Now, all we need is the Fairy Godmother to say yes too!

loc.ru: Jack is wonderful at many things, but I'm afraid sewing isn't one of them.

loc.ru: I'm glad you're excited. I hope the Fairy Godmother is too.

loc.ru: Okay, all your Ingredients have been gathered!

loc.ru: What's the next step? Are you going to help Ursula brew up the potion?

loc.ru: Well, no sign of Ursula or her in-the-works potion, but I did find this...

loc.ru: A picture of Mickey?

loc.ru: Well, one... but it's too horrible to consider!

loc.ru: Oh, I hope so... but I'm starting to doubt it.

loc.ru: I wonder if anyone else is involved in this, or if it's just Mickey...

loc.ru: You sure she's not using you?

loc.ru: I'm trying to do something nice for her. Do you think you could help me with an errand?

loc.ru: Who's your new friend?

loc.ru: Ursula. We started talking about plants and potions and discovered that we have a lot in common.

loc.ru: She was so complimentary about the herbs I grow here.

loc.ru: Careful? Why?

loc.ru: Using me? No, we're friends!

loc.ru: Well, Ursula has done some shady things in the past.

loc.ru: Not saying she's up to something now, just... maybe be on your toes a little.

loc.ru: Well, thank you for the warning, but I don't think it's necessary.

loc.ru: But there's one plant that I'm having trouble finding more than one of â an <ActivityItem>Arcane Sprout</ActivityItem>.

loc.ru: I was about to go see Ursula to ask for more information on where to find it. Would you like to come?

loc.ru: Might also be good to make sure she's dealing with you honestly...

loc.ru: Ursula! You have to stop this!

loc.ru: My poor little doll â do you regret sharing your herbs with me?

loc.en: I never should have trusted you!
loc.ru: I never should have trusted you!

loc.en: But you were lonely, weren't you? It's just too easy to manipulate the naÃ¯ve, like you!
loc.ru: But you were lonely, weren't you? It's just too easy to manipulate the naÃ¯ve, like you!

loc.en: Well, now my eyes are open, and I see you for who you truly are. You're worse than Oogie Boogie!
loc.ru: Well, now my eyes are open, and I see you for who you truly are. You're worse than Oogie Boogie!

loc.ru: I... well... you think hurting my feelings is going to stop me? Think again!

loc.ru: And that's what makes you a fantastic friend!

loc.ru: And we love those differences! That's why we wanted to make a Halloween-themed meal to share with ya!

loc.ru: And apologize for not believing your warnings. We promise, that won't ever happen again.

loc.ru: You're right... But I still think everyone deserves a second chance.

loc.ru: Thank you, {PlayerName}, for reminding me that I do have friends here who enjoy my company.

loc.ru: Hmm...

loc.ru: In a trance?

loc.ru: No!

loc.ru: Yes!

loc.ru: Oh, I'm so worried about them. What if this is all my fault?

loc.ru: I just wanted to make friends with everyone here, but now I'm responsible for them getting hurt?!

loc.ru: So let's try to head this off before it happens! How does that sound?

loc.ru: Well, I've never been able to avoid the events of a vision... but we have to try!

loc.en: Thank Sally!
loc.ru: Thank Sally!

loc.en: I'll always be here to help.
loc.ru: I'll always be here to help.

loc.en: It was a group effort, to be honest.
loc.ru: It was a group effort, to be honest.

loc.en: {PlayerName}! I... I'm not sure what I'm doin' here.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}! I... I'm not sure what I'm doin' here.

loc.en: It was Ursula! You almost fell under the effects of her potion!
loc.ru: It was Ursula! You almost fell under the effects of her potion!

loc.en: What?! That villain! She'll be hearin' from me. You can count on that!
loc.ru: What?! That villain! She'll be hearin' from me. You can count on that!

loc.en: As for you... Thank you, {PlayerName}, for the kind rescue.
loc.ru: As for you... Thank you, {PlayerName}, for the kind rescue.

loc.en: Aye, I'll be sure to!
loc.ru: Aye, I'll be sure to!

loc.en: And we are all grateful for that!
loc.ru: And we are all grateful for that!

loc.en: Well, I'm grateful to ya both.
loc.ru: Well, I'm grateful to ya both.

loc.en: So, next time Sally has a vision, are you going to give her the benefit of the doubt?
loc.ru: So, next time Sally has a vision, are you going to give her the benefit of the doubt?

loc.en: Most certainly!
loc.ru: Most certainly!

loc.en: Now tell me: Has Sally ever had visions about the stock market?
loc.ru: Now tell me: Has Sally ever had visions about the stock market?

loc.en: That... you may need to discuss with her later.
loc.ru: That... you may need to discuss with her later.

loc.en: They're all true!
loc.ru: They're all true!

loc.en: I know it's hard to believe...
loc.ru: I know it's hard to believe...

loc.en: Nobody ever believes her...
loc.ru: Nobody ever believes her...

loc.en: No... or rather... I don't think so...
loc.ru: No... or rather... I don't think so...

loc.en: If I say yes will you take me seriously?
loc.ru: If I say yes will you take me seriously?

loc.en: Worse than that!
loc.ru: Worse than that!

loc.en: Why {PlayerName}, what can I do for you today?
loc.ru: Why {PlayerName}, what can I do for you today?

loc.en: I'm here on a serious mission, I'm afraid. You need to be careful about Ursula!
loc.ru: I'm here on a serious mission, I'm afraid. You need to be careful about Ursula!

loc.en: Ursula, eh? What's she up to now? Tryin' to steal furniture from my shop?
loc.ru: Ursula, eh? What's she up to now? Tryin' to steal furniture from my shop?

loc.en: Well, is she stealin' from somewhere else?
loc.ru: Well, is she stealin' from somewhere else?

loc.en: Again, I'm not sure, but...
loc.ru: Again, I'm not sure, but...

loc.en: Och! Spit it out, {PlayerName}!
loc.ru: Och! Spit it out, {PlayerName}!

loc.en: Sally had a vision! We're still figuring out the specifics, but you're in danger!
loc.ru: Sally had a vision! We're still figuring out the specifics, but you're in danger!

loc.en: Vision? Not sure I set much stock in that fortune-telling stuff. Though, I have seen some mighty incredible things on my adventures.
loc.ru: Vision? Not sure I set much stock in that fortune-telling stuff. Though, I have seen some mighty incredible things on my adventures.

loc.en: But you cannae know for certain.
loc.ru: But you cannae know for certain.

loc.en: Maybe. Maybe not.
loc.ru: Maybe. Maybe not.

loc.en: Well, that's a shame. But in this case, we just cannae be sure.
loc.ru: Well, that's a shame. But in this case, we just cannae be sure.

loc.en: Now, I'm not sayin' that Ursula has never done anything shady.
loc.ru: Now, I'm not sayin' that Ursula has never done anything shady.

loc.en: But give your Uncle Scrooge some credit. I know how to handle myself!
loc.ru: But give your Uncle Scrooge some credit. I know how to handle myself!

loc.en: Now, if you'll excuse me, I've some business to attend to...
loc.ru: Now, if you'll excuse me, I've some business to attend to...

loc.en: That depends. Have ya got any proof?
loc.ru: That depends. Have ya got any proof?

loc.en: Yeah! Care to share?
loc.ru: Yeah! Care to share?

loc.en: Are you psychic?
loc.ru: Are you psychic?

loc.en: I hear things from the ravens...
loc.ru: I hear things from the ravens...

loc.en: Let me guess: You want a food memory from me for your party with Sally and the Fairy Godmother.
loc.ru: Let me guess: You want a food memory from me for your party with Sally and the Fairy Godmother.

loc.en: Okay, fine. Sally told me.
loc.ru: Okay, fine. Sally told me.

loc.en: Ha. No... I'm still getting used to my own thoughts, let alone everyone else's.
loc.ru: Ha. No... I'm still getting used to my own thoughts, let alone everyone else's.

loc.en: I guess one of my good food memories is you cooking <Lore>Bouillabaisse</Lore>.
loc.ru: I guess one of my good food memories is you cooking <Lore>Bouillabaisse</Lore>.

loc.en: After the awful one I â you... we? â cooked for Goofy... there was nothing as delicious as the fresh kind.
loc.ru: After the awful one I â you... we? â cooked for Goofy... there was nothing as delicious as the fresh kind.

loc.en: Thanks! I'll add that to my list.
loc.ru: Thanks! I'll add that to my list.

loc.en: Thanks for including me, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: Thanks for including me, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: Don't you angelfish me!
loc.ru: Don't you angelfish me!

loc.en: Oh, do tell.
loc.ru: Oh, do tell.

loc.en: I don't believe that for an instant.
loc.ru: I don't believe that for an instant.

loc.en: So... do you have anything to say for yourself?
loc.ru: So... do you have anything to say for yourself?

loc.en: Why angelfish, this was all just an unfortunate misunderstanding!
loc.ru: Why angelfish, this was all just an unfortunate misunderstanding!

loc.en: We are way past pet names now.
loc.ru: We are way past pet names now.

loc.en: I was... merely trying to help Mickey and Scrooge.
loc.ru: I was... merely trying to help Mickey and Scrooge.

loc.en: There's a sickness going around, and my potion would have healed them!
loc.ru: There's a sickness going around, and my potion would have healed them!

loc.en: ... Well, it was worth a shot.
loc.ru: ... Well, it was worth a shot.

loc.en: That is a complete lie.
loc.ru: That is a complete lie.

loc.en: This is low, even for you, Ursula.
loc.ru: This is low, even for you, Ursula.

loc.en: Sally really thought that she could be friends with you, and you just threw that away for a shot at a scheme.
loc.ru: Sally really thought that she could be friends with you, and you just threw that away for a shot at a scheme.

loc.en: When's the last time someone actually wanted to be real friends with you?
loc.ru: When's the last time someone actually wanted to be real friends with you?

loc.en: I... it was an opportunity I couldn't pass up. If it helps, I was never going to overthrow YOU. I just wanted more influence in the Valley.
loc.ru: I... it was an opportunity I couldn't pass up. If it helps, I was never going to overthrow YOU. I just wanted more influence in the Valley.

loc.en: You should have said so. But, you picked schemes over friendship, and now you have neither.
loc.ru: You should have said so. But, you picked schemes over friendship, and now you have neither.

loc.en: You're going to have to live with the consequences of that choice.
loc.ru: You're going to have to live with the consequences of that choice.

loc.en: Yes, that much is clear...
loc.ru: Yes, that much is clear...

loc.en: It's so nice that you're making friends with Sally!
loc.ru: It's so nice that you're making friends with Sally!

loc.en: What are you going to use the potion for?
loc.ru: What are you going to use the potion for?

loc.en: You better not be plotting anything here...
loc.ru: You better not be plotting anything here...

loc.en: Okay, that doesn't sound too wild.
loc.ru: Okay, that doesn't sound too wild.

loc.en: Well, you do both have hair...
loc.ru: Well, you do both have hair...

loc.en: I don't believe that for a second!
loc.ru: I don't believe that for a second!

loc.en: Hey Ursula, can we have a little chat?
loc.ru: Hey Ursula, can we have a little chat?

loc.en: Why, angelfish, of course! And what would you like to discuss? Oh hello, Sally dear!
loc.ru: Why, angelfish, of course! And what would you like to discuss? Oh hello, Sally dear!

loc.en: I'm trying to help Sally out with gathering the Ingredients for the potion you two are working on.
loc.ru: I'm trying to help Sally out with gathering the Ingredients for the potion you two are working on.

loc.en: Well, aren't you the helpful little guppy?
loc.ru: Well, aren't you the helpful little guppy?

loc.en: I was having a hard time finding more of that <ActivityItem>Arcane Sprout</ActivityItem> you need. Do you know in which Biome we can find it?
loc.ru: I was having a hard time finding more of that <ActivityItem>Arcane Sprout</ActivityItem> you need. Do you know in which Biome we can find it?

loc.en: Certainly! That one's typically found in <Lore>the Forgotten Lands</Lore>.
loc.ru: Certainly! That one's typically found in <Lore>the Forgotten Lands</Lore>.

loc.en: Now if that's all, I have some important work to attendâ
loc.ru: Now if that's all, I have some important work to attendâ

loc.en: Actually, there is one more thing I wanted to discuss.
loc.ru: Actually, there is one more thing I wanted to discuss.

loc.en: Oh, I adore her. She's such a doll!
loc.ru: Oh, I adore her. She's such a doll!

loc.en: I mean... yeah â literally.
loc.ru: I mean... yeah â literally.

loc.en: So kind, sweet, gullible...
loc.ru: So kind, sweet, gullible...

loc.en: ... Gullible?
loc.ru: ... Gullible?

loc.en: What? No. Did I say that? I meant flexible! She can change potion strategies in the blink of an eye! She's really quite talented.
loc.ru: What? No. Did I say that? I meant flexible! She can change potion strategies in the blink of an eye! She's really quite talented.

loc.en: Oh, nothing much, I assure you. It's for... a hair tonic.
loc.ru: Oh, nothing much, I assure you. It's for... a hair tonic.

loc.en: How are you finding working with Sally?
loc.ru: How are you finding working with Sally?

loc.en: Me? Plotting something with Sally? I'd never!
loc.ru: Me? Plotting something with Sally? I'd never!

loc.en: I was more concerned about you plotting something involving Sally, to be honest.
loc.ru: I was more concerned about you plotting something involving Sally, to be honest.

loc.en: But I simply adore working with her!
loc.ru: But I simply adore working with her!

loc.en: That's nice of you to say, Ursula. I think we'll get back to hunting for those plants now.
loc.ru: That's nice of you to say, Ursula. I think we'll get back to hunting for those plants now.

loc.en: Ta-ta, my two angelfish!
loc.ru: Ta-ta, my two angelfish!

loc.en: Hello, Ursula!
loc.ru: Hello, Ursula!

loc.en: Oh, {PlayerName}...
loc.ru: Oh, {PlayerName}...

loc.en: You see? She's my friend!
loc.ru: You see? She's my friend!

loc.en: {PlayerName}, if you find the sprout before me, could you <Lore>bring it to my House</Lore>? I need to use Jack's cauldron for some preparations.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, if you find the sprout before me, could you <Lore>bring it to my House</Lore>? I need to use Jack's cauldron for some preparations.

loc.en: Sure!
loc.ru: Sure!

loc.en: Indeed! And mine's in salt water most of the time. It needs some extra care.
loc.ru: Indeed! And mine's in salt water most of the time. It needs some extra care.

loc.en: Please, {PlayerName}, it's all right. I trust Ursula.
loc.ru: Please, {PlayerName}, it's all right. I trust Ursula.

loc.en: Hmm, one last question...
loc.ru: Hmm, one last question...

loc.en: Ursula, what's it like working with Sally?
loc.ru: Ursula, what's it like working with Sally?

loc.en: Then... what are you doing?
loc.ru: Then... what are you doing?

loc.en: You're definitely not helping them.
loc.ru: You're definitely not helping them.

loc.en: How could you do this to Sally?
loc.ru: How could you do this to Sally?

loc.en: Well, well. Look who's decided to show up for my grand finale!
loc.ru: Well, well. Look who's decided to show up for my grand finale!

loc.en: Ursula! What are you doing?!
loc.ru: Ursula! What are you doing?!

loc.en: What am *I* doing? I'm finally taking my rightful place... as co-ruler!
loc.ru: What am *I* doing? I'm finally taking my rightful place... as co-ruler!

loc.en: I can't let you hurt Mickey and Scrooge! He JUST let me start calling him Uncle!
loc.ru: I can't let you hurt Mickey and Scrooge! He JUST let me start calling him Uncle!

loc.en: Hurt? Who said anything about hurting them?
loc.ru: Hurt? Who said anything about hurting them?

loc.en: Oh, just a little potion to put them COMPLETELY under my control... ensuring that my rule will be respected! With two pillars of the community in my pocket, I'm guaranteed to have the influence I deserve here.
loc.ru: Oh, just a little potion to put them COMPLETELY under my control... ensuring that my rule will be respected! With two pillars of the community in my pocket, I'm guaranteed to have the influence I deserve here.

loc.en: Oh, but I AM helping them. After the potion finishes doing its work, they'll be perfect subjects!
loc.ru: Oh, but I AM helping them. After the potion finishes doing its work, they'll be perfect subjects!

loc.en: When I join you in ruling Dreamlight Valley, we'll need everyone to be good little guppies, or else I may have to repopulate my garden...
loc.ru: When I join you in ruling Dreamlight Valley, we'll need everyone to be good little guppies, or else I may have to repopulate my garden...

loc.en: Oh, it was a snap, dearie!
loc.ru: Oh, it was a snap, dearie!

loc.en: She SO wanted a friend, and people like that are just SO easy to bend to your will, aren't they?
loc.ru: She SO wanted a friend, and people like that are just SO easy to bend to your will, aren't they?

loc.en: And it's all thanks to Sally. I wouldn't have been able to do it without her precious little plants.
loc.ru: And it's all thanks to Sally. I wouldn't have been able to do it without her precious little plants.

loc.en: I won't let you pull this off, Ursula. Sally and I will find a way to stop you.
loc.ru: I won't let you pull this off, Ursula. Sally and I will find a way to stop you.

loc.en: Let's build a home for Jasmine and Aladdin! (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>
loc.ru: Let's build a home for Jasmine and Aladdin! (Use <nobr>{UpgradePrice} <sprite="iconCurrencySoft" index=0>)</nobr>

loc.en: Perhaps some other time.
loc.ru: Perhaps some other time.

loc.en: Why {PlayerName}, do my eyes deceive me, or are Jasmine and Aladdin comin' back to the Valley? I'd be pleased as punch to help ya get their House together again!
loc.ru: Why {PlayerName}, do my eyes deceive me, or are Jasmine and Aladdin comin' back to the Valley? I'd be pleased as punch to help ya get their House together again!

loc.en: This might not be a whole palace like in Agrabah, but it's in a neighborhood full of friendly faces!
loc.ru: This might not be a whole palace like in Agrabah, but it's in a neighborhood full of friendly faces!

loc.en: Och, you haven't got enough Star Coins to cover even the materials for Aladdin and Jasmine's home! Come back when ya have sufficient funds.
loc.ru: Och, you haven't got enough Star Coins to cover even the materials for Aladdin and Jasmine's home! Come back when ya have sufficient funds.

loc.en: Don't wait too long, {PlayerName}. Jasmine needs a home soon or she'll be stuck sleepin' out under the stars.
loc.ru: Don't wait too long, {PlayerName}. Jasmine needs a home soon or she'll be stuck sleepin' out under the stars.

loc.en: Ah, {PlayerName}! I have some rather exciting news to share with you!
loc.ru: Ah, {PlayerName}! I have some rather exciting news to share with you!

loc.en: Now then, have you noticed the curious islands floating above the Valley?
loc.ru: Now then, have you noticed the curious islands floating above the Valley?

loc.en: Well, these Floating Islands have long been suspended in our sky, unreachable by magic or flying machine!
loc.ru: Well, these Floating Islands have long been suspended in our sky, unreachable by magic or flying machine!

loc.en: I believe I've found a way for us to visit them at last!
loc.ru: I believe I've found a way for us to visit them at last!

loc.en: Heh-heh. Your astute sense of observation is quite refreshing, you know.
loc.ru: Heh-heh. Your astute sense of observation is quite refreshing, you know.

loc.en: As you've duly noted, the Floating Islands have long hovered over the Valley, out of reach.
loc.ru: As you've duly noted, the Floating Islands have long hovered over the Valley, out of reach.

loc.en: Using magical calculations, I've connected the islands to our <Lore>Wishing Wells</Lore>.
loc.ru: Using magical calculations, I've connected the islands to our <Lore>Wishing Wells</Lore>.

loc.en: So, if we <Lore>go to any of the Wishing Wells, we'll activate the travel enchantment</Lore>. Then we can <Lore>visit the first island</Lore>.
loc.ru: So, if we <Lore>go to any of the Wishing Wells, we'll activate the travel enchantment</Lore>. Then we can <Lore>visit the first island</Lore>.

loc.en: Let us embark on this journey of discovery together!
loc.ru: Let us embark on this journey of discovery together!

loc.en: Yes, what about them?
loc.ru: Yes, what about them?

loc.en: No... But go on!
loc.ru: No... But go on!

loc.en: I've been WAITING for this day!
loc.ru: I've been WAITING for this day!

loc.en: {PlayerName}, we must visit the first of the Floating Islands together. Please, <Lore>go to a Wishing Well</Lore> to access your travel enchantment and meet me there!
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, we must visit the first of the Floating Islands together. Please, <Lore>go to a Wishing Well</Lore> to access your travel enchantment and meet me there!

loc.en: You accessed the first Floating Island? Well then, return there, and I'll meet you!
loc.ru: You accessed the first Floating Island? Well then, return there, and I'll meet you!

loc.en: You can now visit the Floating Islands above the Valley, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: You can now visit the Floating Islands above the Valley, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: All you need to do is <Lore>visit any Wishing Well</Lore> and choose your destination.
loc.ru: All you need to do is <Lore>visit any Wishing Well</Lore> and choose your destination.

loc.en: Once there, you can <Lore>decorate</Lore> and... ahem... <Lore>relocate my Library</Lore>, perhaps?
loc.ru: Once there, you can <Lore>decorate</Lore> and... ahem... <Lore>relocate my Library</Lore>, perhaps?

loc.en: You can now visit the Floating Islands above the Valley, {PlayerName}.
loc.ru: You can now visit the Floating Islands above the Valley, {PlayerName}.

loc.en: All you need to do is <Lore>visit any Wishing Well</Lore> and choose your destination.
loc.ru: All you need to do is <Lore>visit any Wishing Well</Lore> and choose your destination.

loc.en: Once there, you can <Lore>decorate</Lore> and... ahem... <Lore>relocate my Library</Lore>, perhaps?
loc.ru: Once there, you can <Lore>decorate</Lore> and... ahem... <Lore>relocate my Library</Lore>, perhaps?

loc.en: Marvelous, {PlayerName}! I cannot wait to finally get in some quiet study on the Plaza Floating Island!
loc.ru: Marvelous, {PlayerName}! I cannot wait to finally get in some quiet study on the Plaza Floating Island!

loc.en: Now remember, there are additional Floating Islands that mirror the other Biomes of the Valley.
loc.ru: Now remember, there are additional Floating Islands that mirror the other Biomes of the Valley.

loc.en: Don't forget: If you want to return to the Valley proper, <Lore>use the Wishing Well</Lore>.
loc.ru: Don't forget: If you want to return to the Valley proper, <Lore>use the Wishing Well</Lore>.

loc.en: With enough <Lore>Dreamlight</Lore>, you can access them all to decorate however you please. Your imagination is the only limit!
loc.ru: With enough <Lore>Dreamlight</Lore>, you can access them all to decorate however you please. Your imagination is the only limit!

loc.en: Well, I'm sure they will certainly enjoy a place to freely wreak havoc... And the rest of us will most definitely enjoy the respite from their schemes!
loc.ru: Well, I'm sure they will certainly enjoy a place to freely wreak havoc... And the rest of us will most definitely enjoy the respite from their schemes!

loc.en: Really? Well, heh-heh, I certainly look forward to that!
loc.ru: Really? Well, heh-heh, I certainly look forward to that!

loc.en: Pah! There's no such thing as too many plans, my friend!
loc.ru: Pah! There's no such thing as too many plans, my friend!

loc.en: I cannot wait to see what you create with so much open space at your disposal!
loc.ru: I cannot wait to see what you create with so much open space at your disposal!

loc.en: I'll leave you to it! Farewell!
loc.ru: I'll leave you to it! Farewell!

loc.en: I'm going to make my own theme park!
loc.ru: I'm going to make my own theme park!

loc.en: I'll make a domain for the Villains.
loc.ru: I'll make a domain for the Villains.

loc.en: I've got TOO many plans for this space!
loc.ru: I've got TOO many plans for this space!

loc.en: How remarkable! THIS island has the same greenery and climate as our beloved <Lore>Plaza</Lore>.
loc.ru: How remarkable! THIS island has the same greenery and climate as our beloved <Lore>Plaza</Lore>.

loc.en: Although... it IS rather bare by comparison. That's because it hasn't had the benefit of your <Lore>designer's touch</Lore>.
loc.ru: Although... it IS rather bare by comparison. That's because it hasn't had the benefit of your <Lore>designer's touch</Lore>.

loc.en: And you'll do a splendid job!
loc.ru: And you'll do a splendid job!

loc.en: Think of these islands as a place away from the commotion of the Valley below, where you can manifest your design dreams without obstacle.
loc.ru: Think of these islands as a place away from the commotion of the Valley below, where you can manifest your design dreams without obstacle.

loc.en: Why, with this much space, you could <Lore>relocate many Villagers' homes here</Lore>.
loc.ru: Why, with this much space, you could <Lore>relocate many Villagers' homes here</Lore>.

loc.en: You might even move myâ oh! Oh, my...
loc.ru: You might even move myâ oh! Oh, my...

loc.en: {PlayerName}, would you <Lore>relocate my Library here</Lore>? Then I could finally have peace and quiet to get some reading done.
loc.ru: {PlayerName}, would you <Lore>relocate my Library here</Lore>? Then I could finally have peace and quiet to get some reading done.

loc.en: The rest of the design, of course, is up to you.
loc.ru: The rest of the design, of course, is up to you.

loc.en: I can decorate EVERYTHING out here!
loc.ru: I can decorate EVERYTHING out here!

loc.en: It does seem a little empty.
loc.ru: It does seem a little empty.

loc.en: Return to Merlin.
loc.ru: Return to Merlin.

loc.en: Talk to Merlin.
loc.ru: Talk to Merlin.

loc.en: You decorate the Dreamlight Library and relocate it to the floating Plaza Island. Merlin encourages you to access and decorate every Floating Island, and to make them your own.
loc.ru: You decorate the Dreamlight Library and relocate it to the floating Plaza Island. Merlin encourages you to access and decorate every Floating Island, and to make them your own.

loc.en:
Hey {PlayerName},

Could I talk to you about my friends, Timon and Pumbaa? I had a really weird dream about them last night...

- Simba

(A small addendum from Merlin: I volunteered myself to take down dictation from Simba on his behalf.)

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

Thank you again. You helped reunite me with Jack and helped us recall all we are to each other. I'll always remember your kindness.

Your friend,

Sally
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

Thank you again. You helped reunite me with Jack and helped us recall all we are to each other. I'll always remember your kindness.

Your friend,

Sally

loc.en: It's been so long...
loc.ru: It's been so long...

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

The Compost Bin is doing very well and my witch hazel is about to bloom! Mike has been true to his word and is only taking a cup here and there from the bin, which leaves me plenty for my garden. Thank you again for your help.

Wishing you the best,

Sally
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

The Compost Bin is doing very well and my witch hazel is about to bloom! Mike has been true to his word and is only taking a cup here and there from the bin, which leaves me plenty for my garden. Thank you again for your help.

Wishing you the best,

Sally

loc.en: My plants are happy now!
loc.ru: My plants are happy now!

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

The quilt makes me think of myself a little â how I'm also a patchwork. But I know that I'm much more than the sum of my patches. I hope you enjoy the quilt.

Thank you.

- Sally
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

The quilt makes me think of myself a little â how I'm also a patchwork. But I know that I'm much more than the sum of my patches. I hope you enjoy the quilt.

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

I was so worried about Mr. McDuck and Mickey, but knowing that they're all right because I helped? It... makes me feel like I can truly contribute here. Thank you for helping me see that.

Your friend,

Sally
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

loc.en:
{PlayerName},

I couldn't have asked for a better partner to test the defenses in Mr. McDuck's shop! Right after, he and I sat down for tea and talked treasure hunts and adventures, just like old times! He even gave me a clue for a treasure he found in the Valley... Could be something fun in the future.

Your friend,

Aladdin

loc.en:
{PlayerName},

I'm so glad we built the gem stall and the marketplace for everyone to enjoy. It reminded me of what I love most about being a part of the Village. I'll keep the stall stocked from here on out. Thanks again for all the fun and adventure!

â Aladdin

loc.en: The marketplace is a success!
loc.ru: The marketplace is a success!

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

I'm working through the code on the front of the journal we found. I'm certain I'm close to cracking it. I wonder what secrets we'll find inside. I get the funny feeling I've seen this journal before...

Your friend,

Jasmine
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

I'm working through the code on the front of the journal we found. I'm certain I'm close to cracking it. I wonder what secrets we'll find inside. I get the funny feeling I've seen this journal before...

Your friend,

Jasmine

loc.en: I'll keep working on it.
loc.ru: I'll keep working on it.

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

I had a wonderful time building our sandcastle on the Beach. And luckily, it helped us unlock the first lock on that journal. I'm so surprised that it's yours! Who knows what we'll find inside?

Best wishes,

Princess Jasmine
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

I had a wonderful time building our sandcastle on the Beach. And luckily, it helped us unlock the first lock on that journal. I'm so surprised that it's yours! Who knows what we'll find inside?

Best wishes,

Princess Jasmine

loc.en: One lock down...
loc.ru: One lock down...

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

I think it's good that we unlocked the secret journal, though I know it's the source of some rather difficult feelings for you. Now I'm worried about that pulse we felt when you read the words aloud. Let's keep our eyes open for anything else strange and magical. That won't be difficult in the Valley, will it?

Your friend,

Jasmine
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

I think it's good that we unlocked the secret journal, though I know it's the source of some rather difficult feelings for you. Now I'm worried about that pulse we felt when you read the words aloud. Let's keep our eyes open for anything else strange and magical. That won't be difficult in the Valley, will it?

Your friend,

Jasmine

loc.en: I'm a little worried...
loc.ru: I'm a little worried...

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

Who knew that your old journal contained wish magic? I remember you gave it to me before the Forgetting, and asked me to hide it away. I must have forgotten all about it when Aladdin and I returned to our Realm...

I asked Merlin, and he said it's likely your younger self wanted freedom so much that you manifested extra magic in those pages. How fascinating... I'm just glad things are back to normal.

Your friend,

Jasmine
loc.ru:
Dear {PlayerName},

Who knew that your old journal contained wish magic? I remember you gave it to me before the Forgetting, and asked me to hide it away. I must have forgotten all about it when Aladdin and I returned to our Realm...

I asked Merlin, and he said it's likely your younger self wanted freedom so much that you manifested extra magic in those pages. How fascinating... I'm just glad things are back to normal.

Your friend,

Jasmine

loc.en: One mystery solved.
loc.ru: One mystery solved.

loc.en:
Dear {PlayerName},

Kristoff has told me that spiders are visiting Anna's Castle! It would be fantastic if you could bring them to me! I don't think the Arendellians are quite comfortable with them...

Your friend,

Jack Skellington

loc.en: Tranquil Tokens
loc.ru: Tranquil Tokens

loc.en: You work hard to look after your Valley: decorating Biomes to perfection, harvesting Pumpkins, and helping your Villagers. Now it's time to make time to relax with the Oasis Retreat Star Path. First, you'll unwind with some relaxing Valley hobbies, including picking fresh fruit, chatting with Villagers, gardening, and whipping up culinary delights. After that, you'll gain exclusive rewards, including resort-inspired fashions, a critter companion bath, decorative palm trees, and more! Make your Valley the oasis of your dreams, where elegance meets tranquility.

loc.en: Greetings Valley Villager!<lw><lw>With the release of update 14, you can now unlock Sally from Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas for your Village!<lw><lw>A few helpful hints to find Halloween Town's favorite rag doll:<lw>- Unlock Jack Skellington in your Valley. Keep an eye out for Matryoshka Dolls...<lw>- Once you've unlocked Jack Skellington, make sure you've also finished Mirabel's first quest, and have unlocked a sweet and sassy racer.<lw>- You may also need to tie up some "Odds & Ends" in a quest with Merlin.<lw>- Keep an eye out for spiderwebs!<lw><lw>Good luck!
loc.ru: Greetings Valley Villager!<lw><lw>With the release of update 14, you can now unlock Sally from Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas for your Village!<lw><lw>A few helpful hints to find Halloween Town's favorite rag doll:<lw>- Unlock Jack Skellington in your Valley. Keep an eye out for Matryoshka Dolls...<lw>- Once you've unlocked Jack Skellington, make sure you've also finished Mirabel's first quest, and have unlocked a sweet and sassy racer.<lw>- You may also need to tie up some "Odds & Ends" in a quest with Merlin.<lw>- Keep an eye out for spiderwebs!<lw><lw>Good luck!

loc.en: Mother always said that fortune favors the prepared. Can't forget to get a supply of Fine Rope, Timber Stacks and Bolts of Silk in case anything happens to the stall.
loc.ru: Mother always said that fortune favors the prepared. Can't forget to get a supply of Fine Rope, Timber Stacks and Bolts of Silk in case anything happens to the stall.

loc.en: This is my chance. I need to take that loan and get myself a new stall! What could go wrong?
loc.ru: This is my chance. I need to take that loan and get myself a new stall! What could go wrong?

loc.en: The South Market merchants aren't exactly welcoming. They'll see â fertilizer is a valuable commodity! Maybe I should buy them some clothespins for their noses...
loc.ru: The South Market merchants aren't exactly welcoming. They'll see â fertilizer is a valuable commodity! Maybe I should buy them some clothespins for their noses...

loc.en: One day, my business will do well enough that I can hire one of the people from the Artisans' District to make me a new cart!
loc.ru: One day, my business will do well enough that I can hire one of the people from the Artisans' District to make me a new cart!

loc.en: I heard the strangest rumor today... Under Agrabah, there lurks treasures AND dangers. Hah! My discount fertilizer stall is the real treasure.
loc.ru: I heard the strangest rumor today... Under Agrabah, there lurks treasures AND dangers. Hah! My discount fertilizer stall is the real treasure.

loc.en: This is my time! Say goodbye to Hakim's Discount Fertilizer and hello to Hakim's PREMIUM Fertilizer!
loc.ru: This is my time! Say goodbye to Hakim's Discount Fertilizer and hello to Hakim's PREMIUM Fertilizer!

loc.en: Mother always said to be careful and keep some money in reserve. But my new stall is too good of an opportunity to miss. I'd regret it if I DIDN'T spend all my money!
loc.ru: Mother always said to be careful and keep some money in reserve. But my new stall is too good of an opportunity to miss. I'd regret it if I DIDN'T spend all my money!

loc.en: I've heard rumors that the water in this quicksand flows from an oasis. I wonder what new forms of fertilizer I can find there...
loc.ru: I've heard rumors that the water in this quicksand flows from an oasis. I wonder what new forms of fertilizer I can find there...

loc.en: There are always treasures to be found behind the dunes of the desert... or so they say.
loc.ru: There are always treasures to be found behind the dunes of the desert... or so they say.

loc.en: These dust devils are the last straw! The whole reason I got into the fertilizer business was to retire from the caravans and never deal with sandstorms again...
loc.ru: These dust devils are the last straw! The whole reason I got into the fertilizer business was to retire from the caravans and never deal with sandstorms again...

loc.en:
{PlayerName},

Listen, normally I wouldn't reward a minion when they give me something that basically ruins my plans, but your minion work hasn't been a total disaster. Thanks for tidying up Mythopia for me. Couldn't have done it better myself! (Well, I could have. But I wasn't going to.)

â Hades

Another day, another drachma! Maybe I let my temper get the better of me, but I can appreciate when a worshipper does me a solid and stops a fire from getting out of hand.

loc.en:
No time to rest, {PlayerName}! As a fabulous manager, I've arranged an endorsement deal for Hades with Goofy. I'll be in touch with more details later, but for now I need you to craft a Hades Kiosk so he has somewhere to address his fans. I've attached a list of the resources you'll need to gather.

Talk soon,

Daisy
